; Color constants (Some duplications) using RGB color scheme. Three byte constant, each byte value range 0-FF. #define STARTBINDING ##continue n SMWCStr,SMWCLParentAddress,SMWCIndex ##continue s SMWCStr="",SMWCIndex=1 ##continue s SMWCLParentAddress=$s(initvalue="":0,1:$lg(initvalue,2,0))
#define CREATECONTROL(%classname,%controlname,%parentname,%parentaddress,%createcontrol) ##continue #if %createcontrol=1 ##continue s %controlname=##class(%classname).%New("") ##continue #endif ##continue s:($l($g(SMWCStr(SMWCIndex)))>=32000) SMWCIndex=$I(SMWCIndex) ##continue s SMWCStr(SMWCIndex)=$g(SMWCStr(SMWCIndex))_##class(%TMPersistent).CreateControl(%controlname,%parentname,%parentaddress)
#define FINISHBINDING ##continue n i,k,SMWCCommand,SMWCClearList,SMWCControl ##continue f k=1:1:SMWCIndex d ##continue . s SMWCClearList=(k=1) ##continue . s SMWCCommand=$$CallBack^%ZMRASD($lb("cac",SMWCClearList,SMWCStr(k))) ##continue . f i=1:3:$ll(SMWCCommand) d ##continue . . s SMWCControl=##class(%TMPersistent).GetObjOref($lg(SMWCCommand,i)) ##continue . . d SMWCControl.Bind($lg(SMWCCommand,i+1,0),$lg(SMWCCommand,i+2,0))

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Description:
This callback method is invoked by the %New method to provide notification that a new instance of an object is being created.

If this method returns an error then the object will not be created.

Method.name: Clear
Method.Implementation: s ..HelpFile="" s ..HookRoutine="" s ..Icon="" s ..Locale="" s ..LogoImage="" s ..LogoTime=0 s ..MainForm="" s ..PrePostRoutine="" s ..SingleInstance="False" s ..Title="" d ..AutoCreateForms.Clear() d ..Classes.Clear() d ..Routines.Clear() d ..Includes.Clear() d ..CSPs.Clear() d ..Globals.Clear() d ..StringTables.Clear() q

Method.name: Delete
Method.Implementation:
n key,BLOBIndex
s key="",BLOBIndex=-1 s key=$o(^SMProject(ProjectName,"Images",key)) f q:key="" d . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(ProjectName_"."_key,"")) . d:BLOBIndex'="" DeleteBLOB^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex) . s key=$o(^SMProject(ProjectName,"Images",key))
s key="",BLOBIndex=-1 s key=$o(^SMProject(ProjectName,"Icons",key)) f q:key="" d . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(ProjectName_"."_key,"")) . d:BLOBIndex'="" DeleteBLOB^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex) . s key=$o(^SMProject(ProjectName,"Icons",key))
k key,BLOBIndex k ^SMProject(ProjectName) q

Method.name: GetCSPApplications
Method.Implementation: n url,urls s urls="" #if $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<5.1 s url=$o($$$CSPAPP("")) f q:(url="") d . i $$$CSPAPPnamespace($$$CSPAPP(url))=$$$GETNS d . . i ($$$GETNS'="%CACHELIB") || ((url'="/csp/broker") && (url'="/apps/documatic")) d . . . s urls=urls_$lb(url) . s url=$order($$$CSPAPP(url)) #else ; we cannot use CSP applications in %CACHELIB namespace i $znspace="%CACHELIB" q:$Q urls q n savens,result,sc s savens=$znspace ; we use query from %sys namespace with nonpercent classname zn "%sys" Set result=##class(%ResultSet).%New("Security.Applications:Detail") Set sc=result.Execute("*") If $$$ISERR(sc) Quit f q:'result.Next(.sc) d . If $$$ISERR(sc) Quit . ; if application type ends with "CSP" . ; and exist in our work namespace . i (result.Data("Type")?.E1"CSP")&(result.Data("NameSpace")=savens) d . . s urls=urls_$lb(result.Data("Name")) ; we must kill object with nonpercent classname from %sys namespace in %sys namespace k result zn savens #endif q:$Q urls q

Method.name: GetCSPFiles
Method.Implementation:
#define CSPAppDirDoesNotExist 5956
n dir,path,setting,recurse,count,f,files,isdir i $e(url,$L(url))="/"!($e(url,$L(url))="\") s url=$e(url,1,$l(url)-1) ; s setting=$$getapp^%cspServer(url_"/",.path) ; i setting="" q $$$ERROR($$$CSPApplicationDoesNotExist,url) ; s recurse=$lg(setting,3,0) s recurse=1 s dir=##class(%File).NormalizeDirectory($$GetFilename^%apiCSP(url_"/")) i '##class(%File).DirectoryExists(dir) q $$$ERROR($$$CSPAppDirDoesNotExist,dir,url) s files="" s f=$zsearch(dir_"*"),count=1 f q:f="" d s f=$zsearch("") . s isdir=##class(%File).DirectoryExists(f) . i 'recurse,isdir q . i isdir,$e($tr(f,"\","/"),$l(f)-2,32767)="/.."!($e($tr(f,"\","/"),$l(f)-1,32767)="/.") Quit . s ext=$zcvt($p(f,".",$l(f,".")),"l") . i (ext="csp") ! (ext="csr") ! isdir s files=files_$lb(f),count=count+1 q:$Q files q

Method.name: GetCSPGlobal
Method.Implementation:
#define CSPAppDirDoesNotExist 5956
n dir,path,setting,recurse,count,f,files,isdir i $e(url,$L(url))="/"!($e(url,$L(url))="\") s url=$e(url,1,$l(url)-1) ; s setting=$$getapp^%cspServer(url_"/",.path) ; i setting="" q $$$ERROR($$$CSPApplicationDoesNotExist,url) ; s recurse=$lg(setting,3,0) s recurse=1 s dir=##class(%File).NormalizeDirectory($$GetFilename^%apiCSP(url_"/")) i '##class(%File).DirectoryExists(dir) q $$$ERROR($$$CSPAppDirDoesNotExist,dir,url) s files="" s f=$zsearch(dir_"*"),count=0 f q:f="" d s f=$zsearch("") . s isdir=##class(%File).DirectoryExists(f) . i 'recurse,isdir q . i isdir,$e($tr(f,"\","/"),$l(f)-2,32767)="/.."!($e($tr(f,"\","/"),$l(f)-1,32767)="/.") Quit . s ext=$zcvt($p(f,".",$l(f,".")),"l") . i (ext="csp") ! (ext="csr") ! isdir s count=count+1 s @gl@(count)=f q gl

Method.name: GetFileContent
Method.Implementation: n fileContent,file s file=##class(%File).%New(FileName) q:'file.Exists(FileName) "File does not exists" d file.Open("R") n buffer s (buffer,fileContent)="" f q:file.AtEnd d . s buffer=file.Read(16000) . i ($l(buffer)<16000) s fileContent=fileContent_$C(13,10)_buffer . e s fileContent=fileContent_buffer d file.Close() d file.%Close() q:$q fileContent q

Method.name: GetFileNameByUrl
Method.Implementation:
#define cTableDefault 1 #define tableDefaultGet(%cat,%key) $g(^%qCacheObjectKey($$$cTableDefault,%cat,%key)) #define defMemberKeyGet(%class,%ckey,%member,%mkey) $g(^oddDEF(%class,%ckey,%member,%mkey),$$$tableDefaultGet(%ckey,%mkey)) #define comMemberKeyGet(%class,%ckey,%member,%mkey) $g(^oddCOM(%class,%ckey,%member,%mkey),$g(^oddCOM($g(^oddCOM(%class,%ckey,%member,$$$cXXXXorigin),%class),%ckey,%member,%mkey),$$$defMemberKeyGet($g(^oddCOM(%class,%ckey,%member,$$$cXXXXorigin),%class),%ckey,%member,%mkey))) #define comMemberKeyGetLvar(%lvar,%class,%ckey,%member,%mkey) s %lvar=$$$comMemberKeyGet(%class,%ckey,%member,%mkey)
i url="" q "" n filename,version,type s version=$piece(url,";",2,32767),url=$piece(url,";") i version'="" d . s type=$zconvert($piece(url,".",$length(url,".")),"U") . q $data(^rBACKUP(url,type,##class(%RoutineMgr).ConvertVersion(url,type,version))) i $extract(url)'="/" s url="/"_url s filename=$$GetFilename^%apiCSP(url) i filename'="" q filename s cls=$$GetCSPClassName^%cspServer(url) i cls="" q "" $$$comMemberKeyGetLvar(cspfile,cls,$$$cCLASSparameter,"CSPFILE",$$$cPARAMdefault) i cspfile=filename||(cspfile="") q "" q cspfile

Method.name: GetGlobalNodeAsBitString
Method.Implementation: s et=$ztrap s $ztrap="ERR" n i n Result n BitCount n TotalBitCount s Result="" s TotalBitCount=$bitcount(Node) f i=1:1:$bitcount(Node) d . s BitCount=i . s:($l(Result)<32768) Result=Result_$bit(Node,i) ;w Result s $ztrap=et q $lb(TotalBitCount, BitCount,Result) ERR s $ztrap=et s Result="<INVALID BIT STRING>" s TotalBitCount=0 s BitCount=0 q $lb(TotalBitCount, BitCount,Result)

Method.name: Load
Method.Implementation:
q:'$d(^SMProject(..Name)) s ..MainForm=$lg(^SMProject(..Name,"MainForm"),1) s ..Title=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"AppTitle"),"") s ..HelpFile=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"HelpFile"),"") s ..Icon=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"MainIcon"),"") s ..Locale=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"MainLocale"),"") s ..LogoImage=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"AppLogo"),"") s ..LogoTime=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"AppLogoTime"),"") s ..SingleInstance=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"RunSingleCopy"),"") s ..PrePostRoutine=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"PrePostRoutine"),"") s ..HookRoutine=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"HookRoutine"),"")
n key,value,name d ..AutoCreateForms.Clear() s value="" s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"AUTO","")) f q:key="" d . s value=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"AUTO",key),"") . d ..AutoCreateForms.SetAt(value,key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"AUTO",key))
d ..Classes.Clear() s value="" s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Classes","")) f q:key="" d . s value=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"Classes",key),"") . d ..Classes.SetAt(value,key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Classes",key))
d ..Includes.Clear() s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Includes","")) f q:key="" d . d ..Includes.SetAt("",key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Includes",key))
d ..Routines.Clear() s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Routines","")) f q:key="" d . d ..Routines.SetAt("",key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Routines",key))
d ..Globals.Clear() s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Globals","")) f q:key="" d . d ..Globals.SetAt("",key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Globals",key))
d ..CSPs.Clear() s value="" s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"CSP pages","")) f q:key="" d . s value=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"CSP pages",key),"") . d ..CSPs.SetAt(value,key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"CSP pages",key))
n stream,BLOBIndex,idx d ..Images.Clear() s key="",BLOBIndex="",idx="" s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Images",key)) f q:key="" d . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(..Name_"."_key,"")) . i BLOBIndex'="" d . . s stream=##class(%GlobalCharacterStream).%New() . . s idx=$o(^BLOB(BLOBIndex,"")) . . f q:idx="" d . . . d stream.Write(^BLOB(BLOBIndex,idx)) . . . s idx=$o(^BLOB(BLOBIndex,idx)) . . d ..Images.SetAt(stream,key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Images",key))
d ..Icons.Clear() s key="",BLOBIndex="",idx="" s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Icons",key)) f q:key="" d . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(..Name_"."_key,"")) . i BLOBIndex'="" d . . s stream=##class(%GlobalCharacterStream).%New() . . s idx=$o(^BLOB(BLOBIndex,"")) . . f q:idx="" d . . . d stream.Write(^BLOB(BLOBIndex,idx)) . . . s idx=$o(^BLOB(BLOBIndex,idx)) . . d ..Icons.SetAt(stream,key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Icons",key))
d ..StringTables.Clear() s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"StringTables","")) f q:key="" d . s arr=##class(%ArrayOfDataTypes).%New() . s name="" . s name=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"StringTables",key,"")) . f q:name="" d . . s value=$g(^SMProject(..Name,"StringTables",key,name),"") . . d arr.SetAt(value,name) . . s name=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"StringTables",key,name)) . d ..StringTables.SetAt(arr,key) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"StringTables",key)) k name,key,value q

Method.name: Save
Method.Description: Saves current project. Method returns 1 in case of success and 0 otherwise. If method is called inside
Method.Implementation:
n zt s zt=$ztrap s $zt="ZT" n TL s TL=$tlevel i TL = 0 TS
n key ,BLOBIndex s key="",BLOBIndex=-1 s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Images",key)) f q:key="" d . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(..Name_"."_key,"")) . d:BLOBIndex'="" DeleteBLOB^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Images",key))
n key ,BLOBIndex s key="",BLOBIndex=-1 s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Icons",key)) f q:key="" d . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(..Name_"."_key,"")) . d:BLOBIndex'="" DeleteBLOB^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex) . s key=$o(^SMProject(..Name,"Icons",key))
k ^SMProject(..Name) n key s MainFormOref=""
s key="" s key=..AutoCreateForms.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s:key=..MainForm MainFormOref=..AutoCreateForms.GetAt(key) . s key=..AutoCreateForms.Next(key)
s ^SMProject(..Name)=$LB("SMWP",..Name) s ^SMProject(..Name,"MainForm")=$LB(..MainForm,MainFormOref) s ^SMProject(..Name,"AppTitle")=..Title s ^SMProject(..Name,"HelpFile")=..HelpFile s ^SMProject(..Name,"MainIcon")=..Icon s ^SMProject(..Name,"MainLocale")=..Locale s ^SMProject(..Name,"AppLogo")=..LogoImage s ^SMProject(..Name,"AppLogoTime")=..LogoTime s ^SMProject(..Name,"RunSingleCopy")=..SingleInstance s ^SMProject(..Name,"PrePostRoutine")=..PrePostRoutine s ^SMProject(..Name,"HookRoutine")=..HookRoutine
s key="" s key=..AutoCreateForms.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"AUTO",key)=..AutoCreateForms.GetAt(key) . s key=..AutoCreateForms.Next(key)
s key="" s key=..Classes.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"Classes",key)=..Classes.GetAt(key) . s key=..Classes.Next(key)
s key="" s key=..Includes.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"Includes",key)="" . s key=..Includes.Next(key)
s key="" s key=..Routines.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"Routines",key)="" . s key=..Routines.Next(key)
s key="" s key=..Globals.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"Globals",key)="" . s key=..Globals.Next(key)
s key="" s key=..CSPs.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"CSP pages",key)=..CSPs.GetAt(key) . s key=..CSPs.Next(key)
n stream,BLOBIndex,name,bufSize,bufStr,i s key="",BLOBIndex="" s key=..Images.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"Images",key)="" . s name=..Name_"."_key . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(name,"")) . s:BLOBIndex="" BLOBIndex=$$CreateBLOB^%ZMRASD(name) . d ClearBLOB^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex,0) . s stream=..Images.GetAt(key) . d stream.Rewind() . f q:stream.AtEnd=1 d . . s bufSize=2048,bufStr="" . . s bufStr=stream.Read(.bufSize) . . d AddBLOBBlock^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex,bufStr) . s key=..Images.Next(key)
s key="",BLOBIndex="" s key=..Icons.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"Icons",key)="" . s name=..Name_"."_key . s BLOBIndex=$o(^BLOB(name,"")) . s:BLOBIndex="" BLOBIndex=$$CreateBLOB^%ZMRASD(name) . d ClearBLOB^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex,0) . s stream=..Icons.GetAt(key) . d stream.Rewind() . f q:stream.AtEnd=1 d . . s bufSize=2048,bufStr="" . . s bufStr=stream.Read(.bufSize) . . d AddBLOBBlock^%ZMRASD(BLOBIndex,bufStr) . s key=..Icons.Next(key) k stream,BLOBIndex,name,bufSize,bufStr
n intkey,arr s key="" s key=..StringTables.Next(key) f q:key="" d . s ^SMProject(..Name,"StringTables",key)="" . s arr=..StringTables.GetAt(key) . s intkey="" . s intkey=arr.Next(intkey) . f q:intkey="" d . . s value=arr.GetAt(intkey) . . s ^SMProject(..Name,"StringTables",key,intkey)=value . . s intkey=arr.Next(intkey) . s key=..StringTables.Next(key)
i (..Name'=..OldName) d ##class(%SMProject).Delete(..OldName) i TL = 0 TC s $ztrap=zt q 1
ZT i TL = 0 TRO s $ztrap=zt q 0

Method.name: TS
DrawClassInfo
Method.Implementation:
s Classobj=##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%OpenId(ClassName) q:Classobj="" "" ; | (ColIndex(1)) = "Name" w "Name="_ClassName_"" ; | (ColIndex(2)) = "Super" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,60)) w ",Super="_$tr(^oddDEF(ClassName,60),",","|")_"" e w ",Super="_"" ; | (ColIndex(3)) = "Hidden" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,32)),^oddDEF(ClassName,32)="1" w " ,Hidden=Hidden" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,32)),^oddDEF(ClassName,32)="0" w " ,Hidden=Not_Hidden" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,32)) w " ,Hidden=" ; | (ColIndex(4)) = "Datatype" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,23)) w ",Datatype="_^oddDEF(ClassName,23)_"" e w ",Datatype="_"" ; | (ColIndex(6)) = "Final" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,7)),^oddDEF(ClassName,7)="1" w " ,Final=Final" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,7)),^oddDEF(ClassName,7)="0" w " ,Final=Not_Final" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,7)) w " ,Final=" ; | (ColIndex(7)) = "Persistent" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,23)),^oddDEF(ClassName,23)="Persistent" w ",Persistent=Persistent" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,23)),^oddDEF(ClassName,23)'="Persistent" w ",Persistent=Not_Persistent" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,23)) w " ,Persistent=" ; | (ColIndex(8)) = "Serial" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,23)),^oddDEF(ClassName,23)="Serial" w ",Serial=Serial" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,23)),^oddDEF(ClassName,23)'="Serial" w ",Serial=Not_Serial" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,23)) w ",Serial=" ; | (ColIndex(9)) = "TimeChanged" ; if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,64)) w " ,TimeChanged="_^oddDEF(ClassName,64)_"" ; e w " ,TimeChanged="_$h_"" ; | (ColIndex(10)) = "SqlTableName" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,58)) w " ,SqlTableName="_^oddDEF(ClassName,58)_"" e w " ,SqlTableName=" ; | (ColIndex(11)) = "ProcedureBlock" s sect=46 if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)),^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)="1" w ",ProcedureBlock=ProcedureBlock" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)),^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)="0" w ",ProcedureBlock=Not_ProcedureBlock" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)) w ",ProcedureBlock=" ; | (ColIndex(12)) = "ClassType" s sect=23 if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)) w ",ClassType="_^oddDEF(ClassName,sect) if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)) w ",ClassType=" ; | (ColIndex(13)) = "Abstract" s sect=21 if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)),^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)="1" w ",Abstract=Abstract" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)),^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)="0" w ",Abstract=Not_Abstract" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)) w ",Abstract=" ; | (ColIndex(14)) = "NoContext" s sect=42 ; if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)), ^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)="1" w ",NoContext=NoContext" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)), ^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)="0" w ",NoContext=Not_NoContext" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,sect)) w ",NoContext="
w ",CodeInc="_Classobj.IncludeCode w ",IsClassDataType=" w ",GeneratorInc="_Classobj.IncludeGenerator w ",CompileAfter="_$tr(Classobj.CompileAfter ,",","|") w ",FStorageStrategy="_Classobj.StorageStrategy ; | "System" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,61)),^oddDEF(ClassName,61)="1" w " ,IsSystem=System" if $d(^oddDEF(ClassName,61)),^oddDEF(ClassName,61)="0" w " ,IsSystem=Not_System" if '$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,61)) w " ,IsSystem=" w ",FSqlCategory="_Classobj.SqlCategory w ",FSqlRowIdName="_Classobj.SqlRowIdName w ",FSqlRowIdPrivate="_Classobj.SqlRowIdPrivate w ",FSqlTableName="_Classobj.SqlTableName w ",FIsDDLAllowed="_Classobj.DdlAllowed w ",Owner="_Classobj.Owner w ",PCount="_Classobj.Properties.Count() w ",MCount="_Classobj.Methods.Count() w ",QCount="_Classobj.Queries.Count() w ",PrCount="_Classobj.Parameters.Count() w ",ICount="_Classobj.Indices.Count() w ",StCount="_Classobj.Storages.Count() w ",TrCount="_Classobj.Triggers.Count() w ",FCount="_Classobj.ForeignKeys.Count() w ",XCount="_Classobj.XDatas.Count() w ",Language="_Classobj.Language w ",ClientDataType="_Classobj.ClientDataType w ",ODBCType="_Classobj.OdbcType w ",SQLRoutinePrefix="_Classobj.SqlRoutinePrefix w ",ViewQuery="_Classobj.ViewQuery w ",ClassDefinitionError="_Classobj.ClassDefinitionError w ",Import="_Classobj.Import w ",ModificationAuxiliary="_Classobj.ModificationAuxiliary w ",Name="_Classobj.Name w ",PropertyClass="_Classobj.PropertyClass w ",TimeChanged="_$Replace(Classobj.TimeChanged," ","_") w ",TimeCreated="_$Replace(Classobj.TimeCreated," ","_") w ",ProjectionsCount="_Classobj.Projections.Count() w ",UDLTextsCount="_Classobj.UDLTexts.Count() w ",IsClassDynamic="_Classobj.Dynamic w ",SoapBindingStyle="_Classobj.SoapBindingStyle w ",SoapBodyUse="_Classobj.SoapBodyUse
w ",IncludeCode="_$tr(Classobj.IncludeCode,",","|") w ",IncludeGenerator="_$tr(Classobj.IncludeGenerator,",","|") w ",Import="_$tr(Classobj.Import,",","|") w ",CompileAfter="_$tr(Classobj.CompileAfter,",","|")
q Classobj

Method.name: DrawMethodInfo
Method.Implementation: q:ClassObj="" "" q:'$isObject(ClassObj) "" w ",Name="_ClassObj.Name w ",IsMethodClassMethod="_ClassObj.ClassMethod w ",IsMethodPrivate="_ClassObj.Private w ",IsMethodFinal="_ClassObj.Final w ",IsMethodSQLProc="_ClassObj.SqlProc w ",ReturnType="_ClassObj.ReturnType w ",FormalSpec="_$REPLACE(ClassObj.FormalSpec," ","_") w ",CodeMode="_ClassObj.CodeMode w ",IsMethodClientMethod="_ClassObj.ClientMethod w ",AbstractMethod="_ClassObj.Abstract if ClassObj.ProcedureBlock=1 { w ",isProcedureBlock=ProcedureBlock" } elseif ClassObj.ProcedureBlock=0 { w ",isProcedureBlock=Not_ProcedureBlock" } else { w ",isProcedureBlock=" } w ",AbstractMethod="_ClassObj.Abstract w ",AbstractMethod="_ClassObj.Abstract w ",SequenceNumber="_ClassObj.SequenceNumber w ",ServerOnly="_ClassObj.ServerOnly w ",SoapBindingStyle="_ClassObj.SoapBindingStyle w ",SoapBodyUse="_ClassObj.SoapBodyUse w ",SqlProc="_ClassObj.SqlProc w ",SoapNameSpace="_ClassObj.SoapNameSpace w ",GenerateAfter="_ClassObj.GenerateAfter w ",NotForProperty="_ClassObj.NotForProperty w ",NotInheritable="_ClassObj.NotInheritable w ",SQLName="_ClassObj.SqlName w ",PlaceAfter="_ClassObj.PlaceAfter w ",Language="_ClassObj.Language w ",ClientName="_ClassObj.ClientNam w ",WebMethod="_ClassObj.WebMethod w ",PublicList="_ClassObj.PublicList w ",Internal="_ClassObj.Internal q ""

Method.name: IsSMWrapForm
IsWebForm
DrawHierarchy
Method.Implementation: q:'$d(^oddDEF(ClassName)) s ClassNameTmp="",CountRaw=0 for { s ClassNameTmp=$o(^oddDEF(ClassNameTmp)) q:ClassNameTmp="" continue:'$d(^oddDEF(ClassNameTmp,60)) s Super=^oddDEF(ClassNameTmp,60) if $l(","_Super,","_ClassName)>1 { s CountRaw=CountRaw+1 w:CountRaw'=1 $c(13,10) w ClassNameTmp } } q

Method.name: IsClassPersistent
SaveRelationshipMethod
Method.Implementation: ; s RelationshipTypeHron =$zcvt(%request.Get("RelationshipTypeHron",""),"I","URL") ; s Internal =$zcvt(%request.Get("Internal",""),"I","URL") ; s ttSub=##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%OpenId(RelationshipTable) if 'ttSub { w "Table "_RelationshipTable_" not found" q} s isFoundPole=0 for i=1:1:ttSub.Properties.Count() q:isFoundPole=1 d . q:ttSub.Properties.GetAt(i).Name'=RelationshipTablePole . s isFoundPole=1 if isFoundPole=0 { w "Property "_RelationshipTablePole_" not found in table "_RelationshipTable_" " q } s tt=##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%OpenId(ClassName) if 'tt { w "Table "_RelationshipTable_" not found" q} for i=1:1:tt.Properties.Count() d . q:tt.Properties.GetAt(i).Name'=SelectRelationshipName . s tt.Properties.GetAt(i).Collection="" . s tt.Properties.GetAt(i).Cardinality = RelationshipSvyazSrc . s tt.Properties.GetAt(i).Inverse = RelationshipTablePole . s tt.Properties.GetAt(i).Type=RelationshipTable . . for j=1:1:ttSub.Properties.Count() d . . q:ttSub.Properties.GetAt(j).Name'=RelationshipTablePole . . s ttSub.Properties.GetAt(j).Collection="" . . s ttSub.Properties.GetAt(j).Cardinality=RelationshipSvyazDst . . s ttSub.Properties.GetAt(j).Inverse = SelectRelationshipName . . s ttSub.Properties.GetAt(j).Relationship=1 . . s ttSub.Properties.GetAt(j).Type=ClassName . . w ttSub.Properties.GetAt(j).%Save() . . w tt.Properties.GetAt(i).%Save(),! Quit

SaveSelectivity

Method.name: DrawSelectivity
Method.Implementation: q:'$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,"s",StorageName,"M")) s count=0 s SelName="" for { s SelName=$o(^oddDEF(ClassName,"s",StorageName,"M",SelName)) q:SelName="" continue:'$d(^oddDEF(ClassName,"s",StorageName,"M",SelName,21)) s count=count+1 w:count'=1 $c(13,10) s val=^oddDEF(ClassName,"s",StorageName,"M",SelName,21) w SelName_"="_val } q

Class.name: %Library.TMApplication
Class.Description:
This class represents the server-side image of a windows client application. It's methods and properties allow to control application running, to handle exceptions, to process keystrokes, enabling online help and hotkeys.

Note: Each SMWrap application automatically declares an MApplication variable as the oref of the application.

Property.name: Active
Property.Description: Read-only property. Contains "True" while the application is active, i.e., if the form or application has focus, and "False" in the opposite case.

Property.name: AllowTesting
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: BiDiMode
Property.Description: Specifies the bi-directional mode, controlling the direction in which text appears (left-to-right or right-to-left) and (optional) the default text alignment.

Property.name: ClientState
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: ClipboardText
Property.Description:
Represents the text in the Windows Clipboard.
Note: An attempt to read this property when the Clipboard contains no text, leads to an exception. Use HasFormat to figure out, does the Clipboard contains text string(s).

Property.name: CrashReportCaption
Property.Description: Subject of bug report mail

Property.name: CrashReportEMailAddress
Property.Description: Bug report email address

Property.name: CurrencyDecimals
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the number of digits after decimal point for currency values.

Property.name: CurrencyFormat
Property.Description:
Represents client-side setting for the currency format. Possible values:
0 - string looks like "$1";
1 - string looks like "1$";
2 - string looks like "$ 1";
3 - string looks like "1 $".

Property.name: CurrencyString
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the currency symbol.

Property.name: DateSeparator
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the symbol separating days, months and years.

Property.name: DecimalSeparator
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the national replacement of the decimal point.

Property.name: Fonts
Property.Description: Represents the list of available screen fonts on the client side.

Property.name: HelpFile
Property.Description: Specifies the application Help file.

Property.name: Hint
Property.Description: Contains the Hint value of menu or control item when the mouse is moving over it.

Property.name: HintColor
Property.Description: Determines the hint box color. A default value is $$$clInfoBk.

Property.name: HintHidePause
Property.Description: Determines the time interval (in milliseconds) before the hint box disappears if the mouse remains over the corresponding control. Default value is 2500.

Property.name: HintPause
Property.Description: Determines the time interval (in milliseconds) before the hint box appears if the mouse pointer is placed over the corresponding control. Default value is 500.

Property.name: HintShortCuts
Property.Description: Determines, does the hints include shortcut information. Possible values are "True" or "False".

Property.name: HintShortPause
Property.Description: Determines the time interval (in milliseconds) before new hint box appears if another hint has been shown. Default value is 50.

Property.name: Icon
Property.Description: Determines the icon representing current application on the Windows task bar.

Property.name: ListSeparator
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the symbol separating items in lists.

Property.name: LongDateFormat
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for long date format. May look like: ""dd/mm/yyyy"". For details see the '%TMStatusPanel.DateFormat' and '%TMStatusPanel.TimeFormat' descriptions.

Property.name: LongTimeFormat
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for long time format. May look like: ""h:mm:ss"". For details see the '%TMStatusPanel.DateFormat' and '%TMStatusPanel.TimeFormat' descriptions.

Property.name: Name
Property.Description: Application name.

Property.name: NegCurrFormat
Property.Description:
Represents client-side setting for the currency format used for negative amounts. Possible values:
0 - string looks like "($1)";
1 - string looks like "-$1";
2 - string looks like "$-1";
4 - string looks like "(1$)";
5 - string looks like "-1$";
6 - string looks like "1-$";
7 - string looks like "1$-";
8 - string looks like "-1 $";
9 - string looks like "-$ 1";
10 - string looks like "1 $-";
11 - string looks like "$ 1-";
12 - string looks like "$ -1";
13 - string looks like "1- $";
14 - string looks like "($ 1)";
15 - string looks like "(1 $".

Property.name: OnActivate
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when application becomes active, i.e., after start or when focus is set on any window of this application.

Property.name: OnDeactivate
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when application becomes inactive, i.e., user switches to another application.

Property.name: OnException
Property.Description: Handler of any unhandled exception.

Property.name: OnHelp
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when HelpCommand, HelpContext or HelpJump methos is called.

Property.name: OnHint
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when mouse pointer moves over a control or menu item with ShowHint property set to 1 and non-empty Hint property.

Property.name: OnIdle
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when application becomes idle.

Property.name: OnMinimize
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when application is minimized.

Property.name: OnRestore
Property.Description: Handler of event occurs when normal size of minimized application is restored.

Property.name: ScreenCursor
Property.Description: Determines the mouse cursor shape. Default is $$$crDefault. If set to any other value, all windows of this application will have the same cursor. Available values are listed in %Const.INC.

Property.name: ScreenHeight
Property.Description: Shows the vertical size (in pixels) of user part of the screen.

Property.name: ScreenPixelsPerInch
Property.Description: Shows the number of pixels per inch in the vertical direction.

Property.name: ScreenWidth
Property.Description: Shows the horizontal size (in pixels) of user part of the screen.

Property.name: ShortDateFormat
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for short date format. May look like: ""dd/mm/yy"". For details see the '%TMStatusPanel.DateFormat' and '%TMStatusPanel.TimeFormat' descriptions.

Property.name: ShortTimeFormat
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for short time format. May look like: ""hh:mm"". For details see the '%TMStatusPanel.DateFormat' and '%TMStatusPanel.TimeFormat' descriptions.

Property.name: ShowHint
Property.Description: Determines whether hints are enabled (if set to "True") or disabled (if set to "False") for the application. Overrides the corresponding properties of individual controls.

Property.name: ShowMainForm
Property.Description: Determines, should the main form be shown (if set to 1, which is default value) or hidden (if set to 0) on the application startup.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary string associated with the application.

Property.name: Terminated
Property.Description: Indicates that application is being terminated by the the Windows.

Property.name: ThousandSeparator
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the symbol separating 3-digit groups in long numbers.

Property.name: TimeAMString
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the suffix for times before 12:00.

Property.name: TimePMString
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the suffix for times equal or later than 12:00.

Property.name: TimeSeparator
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the symbol separating hours, minutes and seconds.

Property.name: Title
Property.Description: Contains the text that appears near the icon representing the application when it is minimized.

Property.name: TwoDigitYearCenturyWindow
Property.Description: Represents client-side setting for the value to be subtracted from the current year to determine year, before which 2-digit years should be considered as belonging to next century.

Property.name: UpdateFormatSettings
Property.Description: Determines, should the formats be updated immediately after the regional settings reconfiguration.

Property.name: UpdateMetricSettings
Property.Description: Determines, should the metrics be updated immediately after the display appearance reconfiguration.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.Fonts.%Close() s ##this.Fonts=""""") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.Icon.%Close() s ##this.Icon=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Fonts.%Close() s ..Fonts=""""") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Fonts=##class(%TMStrings).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""Fonts""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Icon.%Close() s ..Icon=""""") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Icon=##class(%TMIcon).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""Icon""))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: ActiveGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Active") q tmp

Method.name: AllowTestingGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AllowTesting") q tmp

Method.name: BiDiModeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BiDiMode") q tmp

Method.name: BringToFront
Method.Description: Moves the last active window to the foreground. The window must be visible and enabled.

Method.name: CancelHint
Method.Description:
Cancels the hint displaying for controls.

As a rule, used internally, in such cases as not vaild window or application termination.

Method.name: ClipboardTextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ClipboardText") q tmp

Method.name: ExeName
Method.Description: Return full name of current client process.

Method.name: Execute
Method.Description:
Run new process on the client computer. CmdLine specifies command line with arguments of new process CurrDir specifies current directory for new process. If CurrDir is empty string, new process runs in current directory of SMWrap player. Wait specifies timeout in milliseconds of waiting while new process terminates. If Wait = 0, SMWrap player does not wait new process and return result immediately. If Wait = -1, SMWrap player wait child process infinitely.
Return of this function is: If Wait = 0, specifies "True" if child process run's successfully and in other case system's diagnostic message. If Wait '= 0, specifies numeric value as child process's exit code or diagnostic message if waitnig filed.
For example, simple run: s res=MAplication.Execute("notepad.exe") and run and wait: s res=MApplication.Execute("e:\program files\winrar\winrar.exe w:\filename.zip","",-1)

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Fonts.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Fonts,""Fonts"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Icon.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Icon,""Icon"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: GetLongDayNames
Method.Description: Returns client-side setting for the long name of day of week specified by Index (from 1 to 7).

Method.name: GetLongMonthNames
Method.Description: Returns client-side setting for the long name of month specified by Index (from 1 to 12).

Method.name: GetShortDayNames
Method.Description: Returns client-side setting for the short name of day of week specified by Index (from 1 to 7).

Method.name: GetShortMonthNames
Method.Description: Returns client-side setting for the short name of month specified by Index (from 1 to 12).

Method.name: HelpCommand
Method.Description:
A wrapper function calling the OnHelp event.

Parameters of this method are described in the WinHelp issue of the Windows Help system.

Method.name: HelpContext
Method.Description:
This method calls the OnHelp event to display screen with the context help ID (passed in Context parameter) of the help file specified in the HelpFile property.

Returns 0 if HelpFile value is empty string, else 1.

Method.name: HelpFileGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HelpFile") q tmp

Method.name: HelpJump
Method.Description:
This method calls the OnHelp event to display screen having the context string (passed in JumpID parameter) of the help file specified in the HelpFile property.

Returns 0 if HelpFile value is empty string, else 1.

Method.name: HideHint
Method.Description:
Hides the current hint.

As a rule, used internally.

Method.name: HintColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HintColor") q tmp

Method.name: HintGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Hint") q tmp

Method.name: HintHidePauseGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HintHidePause") q tmp

Method.name: HintPauseGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HintPause") q tmp

Method.name: HintShortCutsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HintShortCuts") q tmp

Method.name: HintShortPauseGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HintShortPause") q tmp

Method.name: LoadString
Method.Description:
Returns the string from the stringtable defined in application project.
The Id parameter contains string identifier, the Locale parameter, if defined, is the stringtable index. If Locale is undefined, DefaultLocale value is used.

Method.name: MessageBeep
Method.Description:
The MessageBeep function plays a waveform sound. The waveform sound for each sound type is identified by an entry in the "sounds" section of the registry.
Parameters
- uType (Specifies the sound type, as identified by an entry in the "sounds" section of the registry. This parameter can be one of the following values:
Sound Value -------------------------------------------------------------------- ------------------------------- Standard beep using the computer speaker 0 SystemAsterisk $$$MBICONASTERISK SystemExclamation $$$MBICONEXCLAMATION SystemHand $$$MBICONHAND SystemQuestion $$$MBICONQUESTION SystemDefault $$$MBOK
Return Values
If the function succeeds, the return value is "True" If the function fails, the return value is "False"

Method.name: MessageBox
Method.Description:
Displays dialog box with specified Caption (optional) and Text and with a set of buttons depending on the Flags parameter.

The possible values of the Flags parameter are listed in %Const.INC, their values can be added to obtain the desired effect.

Returns:

0: Could not create message box.
1: "OK" button pressed.
2: "Cancel" button pressed.
3: " Abort" button pressed.
4: "Retry" button pressed.
5: "Ignore" button pressed.
6: "Yes" button pressed.
7: "No" button pressed.

Method.name: Minimize
Method.Description: Shrinks an application to the taskbar.

Method.name: NormalizeAllTopMosts
Method.Description: Unset "Always on Top" property for all forms, including the main window.

Method.name: NormalizeTopMosts
Method.Description: Unset "Always on Top" property for all forms, excluding the main window.

Method.name: OnActivateSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnActivate=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnActivate",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnDeactivateSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDeactivate=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDeactivate",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnExceptionSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnException=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnException",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnHelpSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnHelp=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnHelp",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnHintSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnHint=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnHint",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnIdleSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnIdle=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnIdle",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnMinimizeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnMinimize=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnMinimize",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnRestoreSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnRestore=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnRestore",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: ProcessMessages
Method.Description: Interrupts the application execution to permit Windows to respond to events. Recommended to call this method in lengthy operations.

Method.name: Restore
Method.Description: Restores minimized application to its previous size.

Method.name: RestoreTopMosts
Method.Description: Restores forms with FormStyle "fsStayOnTop" to be always on top again after NormailzeTopMosts method call.

Method.name: ScreenCursorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ScreenCursor") q tmp

Method.name: ScreenHeightGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ScreenHeight") q tmp

Method.name: ScreenWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ScreenWidth") q tmp

Method.name: SetLongDayNames
Method.Description: Sets client-side setting for the long name of day of week specified by Index (from 1 to 7).

Method.name: SetLongMonthNames
Method.Description: Sets client-side setting for the long name of month specified by Index (from 1 to 12).

Method.name: SetShortDayNames
Method.Description: Sets client-side setting for the short name of day of week specified by Index (from 1 to 7).

Method.name: SetShortMonthNames
Method.Description: Sets client-side setting for the short name of month specified by Index (from 1 to 12).

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShowHint") q tmp

Method.name: ShowMainFormGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShowMainForm") q tmp

Method.name: ShowWatch
Method.Description:
This method shows system window with list of local variables (except %obj) and objects. Window is shown in modal mode. In this window programmer can change value of variable, add new or kill available one. Process execution stops until watch window is closed.
The same window can be showed at any time by pressing CTRL+SHIFT+F8 in modeless mode without stopping process execution.

Method.name: TerminatedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Terminated") q tmp

Method.name: TitleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Title") q tmp

Method.name: Trace
Method.Description: Sends interprocess message to be handled and displayed by SMWrap Event Log application.

Class.name: %Library.TMAreaSeries
Class.Description: This class is derived from %TMCustomSeries and contains additional properties and methods allowing to draw line through the series points and fill the area between the line and the chart bottom.

Property.name: MultiArea
Property.Description:
Determines, how the multiple series belonging to the same chart should be drawn. Possible values:
"maNone" - next series behind the previous one;
"maStacked" - next series on top of the previous one;
"maStacked100" - next series on top of the previous one, adjusting individual points to the (0-100) scale.

Method.name: MultiAreaGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("MultiArea") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMArrowSeries
Class.Description: Represents chart points as a set of arrows.

Property.name: ArrowHeight
Property.Description: Determines the vertical size (in pixels) of arrow head.

Property.name: ArrowWidth
Property.Description: Determines the horizontal size (in pixels) of arrow head.

Property.name: EndXValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with horizontal ending coordinates of arrows.

Property.name: EndYValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with vertical ending coordinates of arrows.

Property.name: StartXValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with horizontal starting coordinates of arrows.

Property.name: StartYValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with vertical starting coordinates of arrows.

Class.name: %Library.TMBarSeries
Class.Description: Represents chart data as a set of vertical bars.

Property.name: CustomBarWidth
Property.Description: Determines the fixed (unchanged when zooming) width of bars (in pixels).

Method.name: AddBar
Method.Description: Adds new bar with specified value, text and color to the series. Returns index of added bar.

Method.name: CustomBarWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CustomBarWidth") q tmp

Method.name: GetOriginPos
Method.Description: Returns the screen coordinate of the specified bar starting point.

Class.name: %Library.TMBevel
Class.Description: This class allows to display beveled lines and frames.

Property.name: Shape
Property.Description:
Specifies the bevel appearance. Possible values:
"bsBox" - the entire client area is beveled;
"bsFrame" - the client area outline is beveled;
"bsTopLine" - the top edge of client area is beveled;
"bsBottomLine" - the bottom edge of client area is beveled;
"bsLeftLine" - the left edge of client area is beveled;
"bsRightLine" - the right edge of client area is beveled;
"bsSpacer" - use an empty space as a bevel.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description: Specifies, should the bevel be raised (if set to "bsRaised") or lowered (if set to "bsLowered").

Method.name: ShapeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Shape") q tmp

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMBitmap
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image a Windows bitmap object and its palette. Contains methods for creating and manipulating images.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Read only. Contains oref on %TMCanvas object which may be used for the bitmap modifications.

Property.name: Handle
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: HandleType
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: IgnorePalette
Property.Description: Determines, should the palette associated with bitmap be used when the image drawing (if set to "False") or not (if set to "True").

Property.name: MaskHandle
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Monochrome
Property.Description: Determines, should the bitmap be displayed as monochrome image (if set to "True") or in color (if set to "False").

Property.name: PixelFormat
Property.Description:
Determines, the bit format the bitmap image is displayed.

Description Determines bit format in which the bitmap image should be displayed. Possible values: "pfDevice", "pf1bit", "pf4bit" ,"pf8bit", "pf15bit", "pf16bit", "pf24bit", "pf32bit" or "pfCustom".

Property.name: TransparentColor
Property.Description: Determines the color considered as transparent when the bitmap drawing. If the TransparentMode value is "tmAuto", this property contains the color of the bottom left pixel of the bitmap. Direct setting this property changes the TransparentMode to "tmFixed".

Property.name: TransparentMode
Property.Description: See TransparentColor description.

Method.Implementation: n wait s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) s %ZoMRi(2153)="" d ..SetProperty("Data",Value) s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait q $$$OK

Method.name: Dormant
Method.Description: Creates a bitmap image in memory using the memory stream object, reducing the consumption of GDI resources.

Method.name: FreeImage
Method.Description: Reduce the memory consumption at the expense of loosing the color depth.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("IgnorePalette") q tmp

Method.name: Mask
Method.Description: Replaces the specified TransparentColor with white and all other colors with black, converting the current bitmap into a monochrome image.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("MaskHandle") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Monochrome") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("PixelFormat") q tmp

Method.name: ReleaseHandle
Method.Description: Deletes association between the bitmap and its handle.

Method.name: ReleaseMaskHandle

Method.name: ReleasePalette
Method.Description: Deletes association between the bitmap and its palette.

Class.name: %Library.TMBrush
Class.Description: Represents the color and pattern to fill shapes.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Determines the color used to draw the pattern.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the brush object changes.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description: Determines the pattern for the brush. Possible values: "bsSolid", "bsClear", "bsHorizontal", "bsVertical", "bsFDiagonal", "bsBDiagonal", "bsCross" or "bsDiagCross". If set to "bsClear", the value of the Color property is not used and can not be changed.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this brush.

Method.name: ColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Color") q tmp

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMBubbleSeries
Class.Description: Represents chart data as a set of circles of various radii and colors.

Property.name: RadiusValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList containing radii of the circles in the collection.

Property.name: Squared
Property.Description: Determines, are the bubble sizes depending on the 'RadiusValues' property (if set to "True", default value) or on X- and YValues and the axis scale (if set to "False").

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPointSeries") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPointSeries") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPointSeries)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: AddBubble
Method.Description: Adds new bubble with specified X- and YValues, radius, label and color to the series. Returns index of added bubble.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Squared") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMButton
Class.Description: This class represents the server-side image of a windows push button. It's methods and properties allow to control button appearance and behaviour.

Property.name: Cancel
Property.Description: Determines, should the OnClick event for this button occur when the Escape key is pressed. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: Default
Property.Description: Determines, should the OnClick event for this button occur when the Enter key is pressed and focus is not set on another button. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: ModalResult
Property.Description: For modal forms, if the value of this property is not empty, clicking the button closes the form and sets the ModalResult property of the parent form to this value.

Method.name: CancelGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Cancel") q tmp

Method.name: DefaultGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Default") q tmp

Method.name: ModalResultGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ModalResult") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMButtonGrid
Class.Description: Variation of %TMRxDrawGrid class with slightly reduced set of properties and added capabitily to assign objects to grid rows.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the appearance of the grid border. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border (not resizeable).
"bsNone" - no border (not resizeable).
"bsDialog" - usual dialog box border (not resizeable).
"bsSizeable" - usual resizeable border.
"bsToolWindow" - single-line border, smaller caption (not resizeable).
"bsSizeToolWin" - usual resizeable border, smaller caption.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMCanvas object to be used to display owner-drawn items.

Property.name: Col
Property.Description: Contains column number of currently selected cell or nonsense value if rows rather than cells are selectable.

Property.name: ColCount
Property.Description: Contains number of columns in the grid.

Property.name: ColWidths
Property.Description: Contains Cache' list ($lb()) built from widths of columns (in pixels).

Property.name: Columns
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMGridColumns providing interface to the set of columns.

Property.name: DefaultColWidth
Property.Description: Contains default width (in pixels) of a column of the grid.

Property.name: DefaultDrawing
Property.Description: If set to "False", the 'OnDrawCell" event will occur when a cell needs to be drawn. If set to "True", cells will be drawn in default manner.

Property.name: DefaultRowHeight
Property.Description: Contains default height (in pixels) of a row of the grid.

Property.name: Delimiter
Property.Description: Determines value of delimiter for separation string into cells values.

Property.name: EditorMode
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the grid is currently edited by user, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: FixedButtons
Property.Description: If set to "True", fixed cells in the grid header can be clicked as buttons, if set to "False" - not.

Property.name: FixedColor
Property.Description: Determines background color of the grid header (in hexadecimal RGB format).

Property.name: FixedCols
Property.Description: Determines the number of "fixed" (i.e., non-scrollable, looking like a grid header, but arranged in the left hand side of grid) columns. Default value is 0.

Property.name: FixedRows
Property.Description: Determines the number of "fixed" (i.e., non-scrollable, looking like a grid header) rows. Default value is 0.

Property.name: GridHeight
Property.Description: Represents the grid client area height (in pixels).

Property.name: GridLineWidth
Property.Description: Determines the thickness of grid line (in pixels, default value is 1).

Property.name: GridWidth
Property.Description: Represents the grid client area width (in pixels).

Property.name: InUpdate
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: LeftCol
Property.Description: Represents the number of the leftmost visible column of the grid. The columns numeration starts from 0.

Property.name: OnAcceptEditKey
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the character entered in a cell requires validation.

Property.name: OnCancelEdit
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the user cancels cell editing.

Property.name: OnChangeFocus
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the focus moves to another cell.

Property.name: OnCheckButton
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when 'Enable' status of a fixed cell is retrieved.

Property.name: OnClearGrid
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the 'ClearGrid' method is called.

Property.name: OnColumnMoved
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the user moved a grid column.

Property.name: OnColumnSized
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a column has been 1st time resized.

Property.name: OnDrawCell
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a cell needs to be drawn while 'DefaultDrawing' property is set to "False".

Property.name: OnEditButtonClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the ellipsis button in the ellipsis-style inplace editor is clicked.

Property.name: OnEditChange
Property.Description: Handler for event occuring when the text in the edit region changes.

Property.name: OnFixedCellClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the fixed cell is clicked and the 'FixedButtons' property is set to "True".

Property.name: OnGetEditAlign
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when inplace editor alignment is retrieved.

Property.name: OnGetEditLimit
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the maximum text length for inplace editor is retrieved.

Property.name: OnGetEditMask
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the text pattern for inplace editor is retrieved.

Property.name: OnGetEditStyle
Property.Description:
Handler of event occuring when inplace editor style is retrieved. Possible styles are:
"ieSimple" - simplest one-string editor;
"ieEllipsis" - simplest one-string editor with ellispsis button;
"iePickList" - drop-down list with an edit region for custom text input. Options of this dropdown list can be assigned in the 'OnGetPicklist' event handler.

Property.name: OnGetEditText
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user starts the cell text editing. Allows to prepare initial text for editing.

Property.name: OnGetPicklist
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when options for inplace dropdown list are retrieved. The 'PickList' parameter must contain CRLF-delimited options.

Property.name: OnRowMoved
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the user moved a grid row.

Property.name: OnRowSized
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a row has been 1st time resized.

Property.name: OnSelectCell
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when another cell has been selected.

Property.name: OnSetEditText
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user finishes the cell text editing.

Property.name: OnShowEditor
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user tries to start inplace-editor.

Property.name: OnTopLeftChanged
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the grid has been scrolled.

Property.name: Options
Property.Description:
Determines the grid appearance and capabilities. Possible value: Cache list ($lb()) where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"goFixedVertLine" - draw vertical lines between the fixed (non-scrolling) columns;
"goFixedHorzLine" - draw horizontal lines between the fixed (non-scrolling) rows;
"goVertLine" - draw vertical lines between usual (scrollable) columns;
"goHorzLine" - draw horizontal lines between usual (scrollable) rows;
"goRangeSelect" - allow to select ranges of cells (for read-only grids);
"goDrawFocusSelected" - highlight cells with input focus;
"goRowSizing" - allow to resize separate scrollable rows;
"goColSizing" - allow to resize separate scrollable columns;
"goRowMoving" - allow to move scrollable rows by the mouse;
"goColMoving" - allow to move scrollable columns by the mouse;
"goEditing" - allows to enter edit mode for the cells;
"goTabs" - the 'Tab' and 'Shift-Tab' keys moves focus between the columns;
"goRowSelect" - select entire row rather than single cell;
"goAlwaysShowEditor" - the edit mode is always on;
"goThumbTracking" - update the grid image while the scrollbar thumb is being dragged, do not wait for the thumb release.

Property.name: Query
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMQuery object used while the 'ExecuteQuery' method call.

Property.name: Row
Property.Description: Determines the index of row containing selected cell. Possible values: integers from 0 to RowCount-1.

Property.name: RowCount
Property.Description: Represents the total number of the grid rows.

Property.name: ScrollBars
Property.Description: Determines, what scrollbars should be shown if there are invisible rows or columns. Possible values: "ssNone", "ssHorizontal", "ssVertical" or "ssBoth".

Property.name: ShowHeader
Property.Description: "True" is equivalent to the 'FixedRows' value equal to 1.

Property.name: TopRow
Property.Description: Represents index of the topmost visible scrollable row.

Property.name: VisibleColCount
Property.Description: Indicates the number of visible columns (excluding fixed columns).

Property.name: VisibleRowCount
Property.Description: Indicates the number of visible rows (excluding fixed rows).

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE("#classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Canvas.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Canvas=##class(%TMCanvas).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Canvas""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Columns.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Columns=##class(%TMGridColumns).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Columns""))") $$$GENERATE(" s ..InUpdate=0") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds new row to the buttongrid. Parameter must be Cache list ($lb()) built from all cells values or delimiter-separated string if the 'Delimiter' property is not empty.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait i ..InUpdate d . s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) ; save nowait state . s %ZoMRi(2153)=1 ; set nowait state . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AddObject",$lb(String,0)) . s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait ; restore nowait state e d . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AddObject",$lb(String,0)) q:$Q tmp q

Method.name: AddObject
Method.Description: Adds new row to the buttongrid. The 'String' parameter must be Cache list ($lb()) built from all cells valuesor delimiter-separated string if the 'Delimiter' property is not empty. The object oref will be stored in the additional invisible column.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait i ..InUpdate d . s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) ; save nowait state . s %ZoMRi(2153)=1 ; set nowait state . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AddObject",$lb(String,Object)) . s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait ; restore nowait state e d . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AddObject",$lb(String,Object)) q:$Q tmp q

Method.name: BeginUpdate
Method.Description: Postpones repainting the grid until the 'EndUpdate' method call.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("BeginUpdate",$lb()) s ..InUpdate=1 q

Method.name: BorderStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BorderStyle") q tmp

Method.name: CellRect
Method.Description: Returns the screen coordinates of the specified cell (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)).

Method.name: ClearColumns
Method.Description: Removes all columns from the grid. Rows data remain unchanged.

Method.name: ClearGrid
Method.Description: Removes all rows from the grid.

Method.name: ColCountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ColCount") q tmp

Method.name: ColGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Col") q tmp

Method.name: CopyToClipboard
Method.Description: Copy columns titles and cells data to clipboard in tab-separated format

Method.name: DefaultColWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DefaultColWidth") q tmp

Method.name: DefaultDrawingGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DefaultDrawing") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Deletes specified row from the grid.

Method.name: DelimiterGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Delimiter") q tmp

Method.name: DrawMultiline
Method.Description: Draws multiline text on the grid canvas in the specified rectangle (format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) with specified alignment.

Method.name: DrawStr
Method.Description: Draws text string on the grid canvas in the specified rectangle (format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) with specified alignment.

Method.name: EditorModeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("EditorMode") q tmp

Method.name: EndUpdate
Method.Description: Allows the changes postponed after the 'BeginUpdate' method call to be reflected on the screen.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("EndUpdate",$lb()) s ..InUpdate=0 q

Method.name: ExecuteQuery
Method.Description: Executes query and loads information in grid. Query class, name and other information must be stored in Query property.
Method.Implementation: n query,params,i,Delim,str s query=##class(%ResultSet).%New(..Query.QueryClass_"."_..Query.QueryName) q:query=$$$NULLOREF $$$ERROR("Invalid query name") d ..ClearGrid() d ..BeginUpdate() s Delim=..Delimiter s params="" f i=1:1:16 d . i $d(@("p"_i)) d . . i params="" s params="p"_i . . e s params=params_",p"_i x "d query.Execute("_params_")" f q:'query.Next() d . s str="" . f i=1:1:$l(..Query.QueryFields,",") d . . i str="" s str=$lb(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",",i))) . . e s str=str_$lb(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",",i))) . . ; i str="" s str=query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",",i)) . . ; e s str=str_Delim_query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",",i)) . d:..Query.IdField'="" ..AddObject(str,query.GetDataByName(..Query.IdField)) . d:..Query.IdField="" ..Add(str) d ..EndUpdate() q $$$OK

Method.name: FindRow
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("FindRow",$lb(ID)) q tmp

Method.name: FixedButtonsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FixedButtons") q tmp

Method.name: FixedColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FixedColor") q tmp

Method.name: FixedColsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FixedCols") q tmp

Method.name: FixedRowsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FixedRows") q tmp

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Canvas.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Canvas,""Canvas"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Columns.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Columns,""Columns"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: GetCells
Method.Description:
Returns the value of the specified cell. Columns and rows numbering starts from 1.
Note that there is an invisible 0th column intended to store objects references, therefore, column numbers transmitted to events handlers as 'ACol' parameter or contained in 'Col' property need to be incremented before being used in this method.

Method.name: GetObject
Method.Description: Returns oref of the object assigned to the specified row. Rows numbering starts from 1.

Method.name: GetRow
Method.Description: Returns all cells for specified row as $LB() of values. Rows numbering starts from 1.

Method.name: GetRowColors
Method.Description: Method return foreground color and background color as $LB(ForeColor,BkColor) for specified row. For rows wich has not assigned colors, method return $$$clNone. This values used as default and threated by control as $$$clWindow and $$$clWindowText.

Method.name: GetSelection
Method.Description: Returns the value of the current selection range. Returns range in $lb() format as $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom), where left, Top, Right, Bottom show currently selected row and column range.

Method.name: GetSorted
Method.Description: Returns column number by which the grid has been sorted, or -1 if grid is not sorted.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("GetSorted",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: GridHeightGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("GridHeight") q tmp

Method.name: GridLineWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("GridLineWidth") q tmp

Method.name: GridWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("GridWidth") q tmp

Method.name: IndexOfObject
Method.Description: Returns index of the string containing the specified oref, or -1 if such string is not found. Search starts from the specified FirstRow.

Method.name: IndexOfString
Method.Description: Returns index of the specified string, or -1 if such string is not found. Search starts from the specified FirstRow.

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Insert new row to the specified position of the buttongrid. Parameter must be Cache list ($lb()) built from all cells values or delimiter-separated string if the 'Delimiter' property is not empty.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait i ..InUpdate d . s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) ; save nowait state . s %ZoMRi(2153)=1 ; set nowait state . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("InsertObject",$lb(Row,String,0)) . s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait ; restore nowait state e d . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("InsertObject",$lb(Row,String,0)) q

Method.name: InsertObject
Method.Description: Insert new row to the specified position of the buttongrid. Parameter must be Cache list ($lb()) built from all cells values or delimiter-separated string if the 'Delimiter' property is not empty. The object oref will be stored in the additional invisible column.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait i ..InUpdate d . s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) ; save nowait state . s %ZoMRi(2153)=1 ; set nowait state . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("InsertObject",$lb(Row,String,Object)) . s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait ; restore nowait state e d . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("InsertObject",$lb(Row,String,Object)) q

Method.name: IsEmpty
Method.Description: Returns "True" if grid does not contain data, otherwise - "False".

Method.name: LeftColGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("LeftCol") q tmp

Method.name: LocateRow
Method.Description: Moves cursor to the string with the most fitting value in the specified column.

Method.name: MouseCoord
Method.Description: Converts the specified screen coordinate into corresponding cell indices ($lb(Column,Row)).

Method.name: OnAcceptEditKeySet

Method.name: OptionsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Options") q tmp

Method.name: RowCountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("RowCount") q tmp

Method.name: RowGet

Method.name: ScrollBarsGet
