Method.name: SetCells
Method.Description:
Assigns the value for the specified cell. Columns and rows numbering starts from 1. Use the 'Columns' property to change columns headers.
Note that there is an invisible 0th column intended to store objects references, therefore, column numbers transmitted to events handlers as 'ACol' parameter or contained in 'Col' property need to be incremented before being used in this method.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait i ..InUpdate d . s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) ; save nowait state . s %ZoMRi(2153)=1 ; set nowait state . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("SetCells",$lb(Col,Row,Value)) . s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait ; restore nowait state e d . s tmp=##this.RunMethod("SetCells",$lb(Col,Row,Value)) q

Method.name: SetObject
Method.Description: Assigns the object oref for the specified row. Rows numbering starts from 1.

Method.name: SetRow
Method.Description: Replace all cells in specified Row by values given in Line as $LB(). Rows numbering starts from 1.

Method.name: SetRowColors
Method.Description: Method sets specified colors for specified row. ForeColor used by control for text color and BkColor use for background color. Colors $$$clNone clears row settings and threated by control as $$$clWindowText and $$$clWindow.

Method.name: ShowHeaderGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShowHeader") q tmp

Method.name: TopRowGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TopRow") q tmp

Method.name: VisibleColCountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("VisibleColCount") q tmp

Method.name: VisibleRowCountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("VisibleRowCount") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMCanvas
Class.Description: Represents drawing surface and tools for controls working with graphic images.

Property.name: Brush
Property.Description: Represents the color and pattern used when the background drawing and shapes filling. Look the %TMBrush description for details.

Property.name: CanvasOrientation
Property.Description: Read only property, indicating, is the canvas left-to-right or right-to-left oriented. Possible values: "coLefToRight" (default value) or "coRightToLeft".

Property.name: CopyMode
Property.Description:
Determines effects using when images copying with BrushCopy and CopyRect methods. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb) where only necessary from the following strings are combined, or $lb() if to effects are desired:
"cmBlackness" - fill the destination area with black.
"cmDstInvert" - invert the image in destination area, not using source.
"cmMergeCopy" - combine source bitmap and destination image by AND function.
"cmMergePaint" - combine destination image and inverted source bitmap by OR function.
"cmNotSrcCopy" - invert source image.
"cmNotSrcErase" - combine source bitmap and destination image by OR operator and invert the result.
"cmPatCopy" - copy source pattern.
"cmPatInvert" - combine source pattern and destination image by XOR function.
"cmPatPaint" - combine inverted source image, source pattern and source image by OR function.
"cmSrcAnd" - combine the destination image and source bitmap by AND function.
"cmSrcCopy" - copy the source bitmap.
"cmSrcErase" - combine inverted destination image and source bitmap by AND function.
"cmSrcInvert" - combines destination image and source bitmap by XOR function.
"cmSrcPaint" - combine destination image and source bitmap by OR function.
"cmWhiteness" - fill the destination area with white.

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Specifies the font for TextOut and TextRect methods. See %TMFont description for details.

Property.name: Handle
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: LockCount
Property.Description: Locks counter, used in Lock, TryLock and Unlock methods. If set to 0, the canvas is unlocked.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the image was changed by %TMCanvas drawing method.

Property.name: OnChanging
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before a %TMCanvas drawing method changes the image.

Property.name: Pen
Property.Description: Determines the parameters of pen using for drawing lines and outlining shapes. See %TMPen description for details.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this canvas.

Property.name: TextFlags
Property.Description:
Specifies effects when text writing by the TextOut and TextRect methods. The possible value: the sum of the necessary integer constants from the following table:
$$$ETO_CLIPPED - in TextRect is set automatically, in TextOut has no effect.
$$$ETO_OPAQUE - draw the text with opaque background color.
$$$ETO_RTLREADING - display text from right to left, requires Mideast version of Windows.
$$$ETO_GLYPH_INDEX - displays character placement codes in TrueType fonts.
$$$ETO_IGNORELANGUAGE - undocumented Microsoft flag.
$$$ETO_NUMERICSLOCAL - undocumented Microsoft flag.
$$$ETO_NUMERICSLATIN - undocumented Microsoft flag.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" d ..Brush.%Close() s ..Brush=""""") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Font.%Close() s ..Font=""""") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Pen.%Close() s ..Pen=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Brush.%Close() s ..Brush=""""") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Brush=##class(%TMBrush).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Brush""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Font.%Close() s ..Font=""""") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Font=##class(%TMFont).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Font""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Pen.%Close() s ..Pen=""""") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Pen=##class(%TMPen).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Pen""))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: Arc
Method.Description: Draws an arc of ellipse. The points (X1,Y1) and (X2,Y2) define rectangle, in which ellipse is inscribed. The starting and ending points are intersections of the ellipse and lines connecting the centre of ellipse with (X3,Y3) and (X4,Y4) points correspondingly. The arc is drawn counterclockwise from the starting to the ending point.

Method.name: BrushCopy
Method.Description: Copies rectangular portion of the Bitmap defined by Dest parameter (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) to the rectangular area of the canvas defined by the Source parameter (in the same format as Dest), replacing the specified Color by the Color of the Brush property.

Method.name: Chord
Method.Description: Draws an ellipse segment confined by an ellipse arc and the straight line connecting ending and starting points of the arc. The points (X1,Y1) and (X2,Y2) define rectangle, in which ellipse is inscribed. The starting and ending points are intersections of the ellipse and line connecting (X3,Y3) and (X4,Y4).points correspondingly. The perimeter of the segment is drawn using the value of Pen property, and the segment is filled using the value of Brush property.

Method.name: CopyModeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CopyMode") q tmp

Method.name: CopyRect
Method.Description: Copies the rectangular part (specified by Source parameter, in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) from another Canvas to the current canvas, to the rectangle specified by Dest parameter (in the same format as Source).

Method.name: Draw
Method.Description: Draws the bitmap image or the icon specified by the Graphic parameter into rectangle with the upper left angle at the (X,Y) point.

Method.name: DrawFocusRect
Method.Description:
Draws or removes (using XOR function) the rectangle defined by the Rect parameter (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)).
Note: this rectangle can not be scrolled automatically.

Method.name: DrawText
Method.Description:
Draw text into canvas. Parameters meaning: Value - string for draw. String draws using currently selected font. Rect - rectangle for clipping. Meaning as $LB(Left,Top,Right,Bottom) Flags - formatting options. It can be summary of values:
DT_TOP = 0H; Top-justifies text (single line only).
DT_LEFT = 0H; Aligns text to the left.
DT_CENTER = 1H; Centers text horizontally in the rectangle.
DT_RIGHT = 2H; Aligns text to the right.
DT_VCENTER = 4H; Centers text vertically (single line only).
DT_BOTTOM = 8H; Justifies the text to the bottom of the rectangle. This value must be combined with DT_SINGLELINE.
DT_WORDBREAK = 10H; Breaks words. Lines are automatically broken between words if a word would extend past the edge of the rectangle specified by the lpRect parameter. A carriage return-linefeed sequence also breaks the line.
DT_SINGLELINE = 20H; Displays text on a single line only. Carriage returns and linefeeds do not break the line.
DT_EXPANDTABS = 40H; Expands tab characters. The default number of characters per tab is eight.
DT_TABSTOP = 80H; Sets tab stops. Bits 15-8 (high-order byte of the low-order word) of the uFormat parameter specify the number of characters for each tab. The default number of characters per tab is eight.
DT_NOCLIP = 100H; Draws without clipping. DrawText is somewhat faster when DT_NOCLIP is used.
DT_EXTERNALLEADING = 200H; Includes the font external leading in line height. Normally, external leading is not included in the height of a line of text.
DT_CALCRECT = 400H; Determines the width and height of the rectangle. If there are multiple lines of text, DrawText uses the width of the rectangle pointed to by the lpRect parameter and extends the base of the rectangle to bound the last line of text. If there is only one line of text, DrawText modifies the right side of the rectangle so that it bounds the last character in the line. In either case, DrawText returns the height of the formatted text but does not draw the text.
DT_NOPREFIX = 800H; Turns off processing of prefix characters. Normally, DrawText interprets the mnemonic-prefix character & as a directive to underscore the character that follows, and the mnemonic-prefix characters && as a directive to print a single &. By specifying DT_NOPREFIX, this processing is turned off.
DT_EDITCONTROL = 2000H; Duplicates the text-displaying characteristics of a multiline edit control. Specifically, the average character width is calculated in the same manner as for an edit control, and the function does not display a partially visible last line.
DT_PATH_ELLIPSIS = 4000H or DT_END_ELLIPSIS = 8000H; Replaces part of the given string with ellipses, if necessary, so that the result fits in the specified rectangle. The given string is not modified unless the DT_MODIFYSTRING flag is specified. You can specify DT_END_ELLIPSIS to replace characters at the end of the string, or DT_PATH_ELLIPSIS to replace characters in the middle of the string. If the string contains backslash (\) characters, DT_PATH_ELLIPSIS preserves as much as possible of the text after the last backslash.
DT_MODIFYSTRING = 10000H; Modifies the given string to match the displayed text. This flag has no effect unless the DT_END_ELLIPSIS or DT_PATH_ELLIPSIS flag is specified.
DT_RTLREADING = 20000H; Layout in right to left reading order for bi-directional text when the font selected into the hdc is a Hebrew or Arabic font. The default reading order for all text is left to right.
DT_WORD_ELLIPSIS = $40000; Undocumented Microsoft option.
This flags are given from official Microsoft Win SDK. All values are given in hexadecimal format.

Method.name: Ellipse
Method.Description: Draws an ellipse. The points (X1,Y1) and (X2,Y2) define rectangle, in which ellipse is inscribed. The perimeter of ellipse is drawn using the value of the Pen property, and the ellipse is filled using the value of the Brush property.

Method.name: FillRect
Method.Description: Fills the rectangle specified by the Rect parameter (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) using the value of the Brush property. The left and bottom edges are not included into the region to be filled.

Method.name: FloodFill
Method.Description: Fills the region including the (X,Y) point and confined by the boundary defined by the Color and FillStyle parameters, using the value of the Brush property. FillStyle equal to "fsBorder" meand that the boundary has the same color as specified in the Color parameter. FillStyle equal to "fsSurface" means that the boundary has another colors.

Method.name: FrameRect
Method.Description: Draws the one-pixel-wide border around the rectangle specified by the Rect parameter(in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)).

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Brush.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Brush,""Brush"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Font.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Font,""Font"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Pen.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Pen,""Pen"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: GetClipRect
Method.Description: Returns the definition of rectangle (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) which needs to be repainted. Any drawing is allowed inly within this rectangle. For use in OnPaint handlers.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("GetClipRect",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: GetPixel
Method.Description: Returns the color of the specified pixel, or -1 if the pixel is outside the clipping rectangle or device does not support this method.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("GetPixel",$lb(X,Y)) q tmp

Method.name: HandleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Handle") q tmp

Method.name: LineTo
Method.Description: Draws the a line (using the Pen value) from the current PenPos to the (X,Y) and sets the PenPos value to $lb(X,Y).

Method.name: Lock
Method.Description: Sets an incremental lock, protecting the canvas from other threads of a multithreaded application.

Method.name: LockCountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("LockCount") q tmp

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnChangingSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChanging=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChanging",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: Pie
Method.Description: Draws the ellipse sector. The points (X1,Y1) and (X2,Y2) define rectangle, in which ellipse is inscribed. The sector is confined by this eppipse and the lines connecting the ellipse centre and the (X3, Y3) and (X4, Y4) points.

Method.name: PolyBezier
Method.Description: Draws Bezier curves using the points specified by the Points parameter (in format $lb($lb(X1,Y1),$lb(X2,Y2),...,$lb(XN,YN))). The first curve starts at (X1,Y1), ends at (X4,Y4) and uses (X2,Y2) and (X3,Y3) as control points. The next curves start at the ending point of previous curve and use next 3 poins in the same manner.

Method.name: PolyBezierTo
Method.Description: Draws cubic Bezier curves (see PolyBezier description) and sets the PenPos value to the last point.

Method.name: Polygon
Method.Description: Draws the filled polygon with angles specified by the Points parameter (in format $lb($lb(X1,Y1),$lb(X2,Y2),...,$lb(XN,YN))).

Method.name: Polyline
Method.Description: Draws polygonal line connecting poins specified by the Points parameter (in format $lb($lb(X1,Y1),$lb(X2,Y2),...,$lb(XN,YN))). Does not change the value of PenPos property.

Method.name: SetPixel
Method.Description: Changes the color of specified pixel.

Method.name: StretchDraw
Method.Description: Draws the bitmap image or the icon specified by the Graphic parameter into rectangle specified by the Rect parameter (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)), stretching the image to fit in the rectangle.

Method.name: TextExtent
Method.Description: Returns $lb(Width,Height) of the rectangular area required to display the Text string.

Method.name: TextFlagsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TextFlags") q tmp

Method.name: TextHeight
Method.Description: Returns height of the rectangular area required to display the Text string.

Method.name: TextOut
Method.Description: Wtites the Text string onto the canvas, using the current value of Font property.

Method.name: TextRect
Method.Description: Writes the Text string within a rectangular clipping region specified by the Rect parameter. The coordinates of the upper left corner of the text are (X, Y).

Method.name: TextWidth
Method.Description: Returns width of the rectangular area required to display the Text string.

Method.name: TryLock
Method.Description: Tries to set non-incremental lock, protecting the canvas from other threads of a multithreaded application. Returns "True" if lock is set, or "False" if the canvas is already locked by another thread.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("TryLock",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: Unlock
Method.Description: Removes lock previously set by Lock or TryLock method.

Class.name: %Library.TMChart
Class.Description: Provides an exhaustive set of tools for charts drawing.

Property.name: AllowPanning
Property.Description:
Determines the direction of allowed scrolling. Possible values:
"pmNone" - scrolling is impossible;
"pmHorizontal" - only horizontal scrolling is allowed;
"pmVertical" - only vertical scrolling is allowed;
"pmBoth" - complete scrolling is allowed.

Property.name: AllowZoom
Property.Description: Determines, can the chart be zoomed using mouse with Ctrl-key pressed (if set to "True") or not.

Property.name: AnimatedZoom
Property.Description: If set to "False", the zoom function is instant, if set to "True", the zooming consists of the sequence of steps, number of which is detemined by the 'AnimatedZoomSteps' property.

Property.name: AnimatedZoomSteps
Property.Description: Determines the number of steps for animated zooming.

Property.name: AutoSize
Property.Description: If set to "True", the chart image should be resized to fit the control area, if set to "False" - the image remains unchanged.

Property.name: AxisVisible
Property.Description: Setting this property displayes (if set to "True") or hides (if set to "False") all axes simultaneously.

Property.name: BackColor
Property.Description: Determines background color for the area between the chart axes (in hexadecimal RGB format).

Property.name: BackImage
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBitmap object with the background image for the the area between the chart axes.

Property.name: BackImageInside
Property.Description: If set to "True", the background image will be clipped in the the area between the chart axes.

Property.name: BackImageMode
Property.Description: Determines, should the background image be stretched (if set to "pbmStretch"), tiled (if set to "pbmTile") or centered (if set to "pbmCenter").

Property.name: BackWall
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartWall object determining attributes of the chart backwall.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines, will the control have a border around the client area. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border
"bsNone" - no border.

Property.name: BottomAxis
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMChartAxis object determining attributes of the bottom axis of the chart.

Property.name: BottomWall
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartWall object determining attributes of the bottom wall of the chart.

Property.name: Chart3DPercent
Property.Description: Determines the depth of the chart (in percents of the chart dimensions).

Property.name: ClipPoints
Property.Description: Determines, should the series points be clipped within the corresponding chart region (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Foot
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartTitle object determining the text and format of the chart footer.

Property.name: Frame
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining attributes of pen to draw area around the chart axes.

Property.name: Gradient
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartGradient object determining colors for filling the chart background.

Property.name: LeftAxis
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMChartAxis object determining attributes of the left axis of the chart.

Property.name: LeftWall
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartWall object determining attributes of the left wall of the chart.

Property.name: Legend
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartLegend object describing representation of the chart series.

Property.name: MarginBottom
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the bottom margin of the chart (default value is 8).

Property.name: MarginLeft
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the left margin of the chart (default value is 12).

Property.name: MarginRight
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the right margin of the chart (default value is 12).

Property.name: MarginTop
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the upper margin of the chart (default value is 8).

Property.name: MaxPointsPerPage
Property.Description: If set to positive value, divides the chart into pages. Default value is 0.

Property.name: Monochrome
Property.Description: If set to "True", forces the chart to be drawn in black and while colors.

Property.name: OnAfterDraw
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immedately after a series has been drawn.

Property.name: OnAllowScroll
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after scrolling is allowed.

Property.name: OnClickAxis
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user clicks on a chart axis.

Property.name: OnClickBackground
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user clicks on the chart background.

Property.name: OnClickLegend
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user clicks on the rectangle with the chart legend.

Property.name: OnClickSeries
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user clicks on a series point.

Property.name: OnGetAxisLabel
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user clicks on a chart axis label.

Property.name: OnGetLegendPos
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a legend item is near to be displayed.

Property.name: OnGetLegendRect
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the chart legend is near to be displayed.

Property.name: OnGetLegendText
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a legend text is near to be displayed.

Property.name: OnGetNextAxisLabel
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when an axis label is to be drawn.

Property.name: OnPageChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the new part of series is near to be drawn.

Property.name: OnScroll
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the user drags the right mouse button to scroll the chart contents.

Property.name: OnUndoZoom
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the chart axes are reset to fit all series points.

Property.name: OnZoom
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the chart contents is zoomed by mouse dragging or by the 'ZoomRect' or 'ZoomPercent' methods call.

Property.name: Page
Property.Description: Represents the number of current page.

Property.name: RightAxis
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMChartAxis object determining attributes of the left axis of the chart.

Property.name: ScaleLastPage
Property.Description: If set to "True", the last page has the same width as the other pages. If set to "False", the width of the last page depends on the number of points on it.

Property.name: Title
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartTitle object determining the text and format of the chart header.

Property.name: TopAxis
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMChartAxis object determining attributes of the top axis of the chart.

Property.name: View3DOptions
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMView3DOptions allowing to zoom, rotate and scroll the chart.

Property.name: View3d
Property.Description: Determines, should the 3D effects be simulated (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: View3dWalls
Property.Description: Determines, should the left and bottom walls to be displayed (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Method.Description: Prints the chart contents to the selected printer.

Method.Description: Prints the chart contents to the selected printer, scaling the image into the specified rectangle (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)).

Method.Description: Deletes all series from the chart.

Method.Description: Deletes series specified by its index from the chart.

Method.Description: Performs specified zoom (Percent>100 means zoom in, <100 - zoom out).

Method.name: ZoomRect
Method.Description: Performs zoom, resizing the specified rectangle (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) to the chart dimensions.

Class.name: %Library.TMChartAxis
Class.Description: Describes axis attributes for a %TMChart object.

Property.name: Automatic
Property.Description: Determines, should axis limits be calculated automatically for all series (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False".

Property.name: AutomaticMaximum
Property.Description: Determines, should the axis maximum be calculated automatically according to the maximum values of series (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: AutomaticMinimum
Property.Description: Determines, should the axis minimum be calculated automatically according to the minimum values of series (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Axis
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining drawing mode for axis lines.

Property.name: AxisValuesFormat
Property.Description: Contains pattern string for axis values formatting. Default value: "'#,##0.###". '#' means that corresponding digit should be printed if it is not nonsignificant zero. '0' means that nonsignificant zero should be printed too. Pattern for exponential format may look like "0.###E+00".

Property.name: DateTimeFormat
Property.Description: Contains pattern for date and time formatting. May look like: "dd/mm/yyyy". For details see the '%TMStatusPanel.DateFormat' and '%TMStatusPanel.TimeFormat' descriptions.

Property.name: ExactDateTime
Property.Description: If set to "True", the time steps be adjusted to exact time units. Default value is "False".

Property.name: Grid
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining drawing mode for grid lines.

Property.name: Increment
Property.Description:
Determines minimal step between sequential axis labels. For numeric axes must be a positive value. For date/time axes the following values may be used:
"dtOneSecond", "dtFiveSeconds", "dtTenSeconds", "dtFifteenSeconds", "dtThirtySeconds", "dtOneMinute", "dtFiveMinutes", "dtTenMinutes", "dtFifteenMinutes", "dtThirtyMinutes", "dtOneHour", "dtTwoHours", "dtSixHours", "dtTwelveHours", "dtOneDay", "dtTwoDays", "dtThreeDays", "dtOneWeek", "dtHalfMonth", "dtOneMonth", "dtTwoMonths", "dtSixMonths" or "dtOneYear".

Property.name: Inverted
Property.Description: If set to "True", the minimum and maximum will be swapped. Default value is "False".

Property.name: LabelStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the axis labeling mode. Possible values:
"talAuto" - automatic mode;
"talNone" - no labeling;
"talValue" - labeling according to the values of 'Minimum' and 'Maximum' properties.
"talMark" - use labels from the '%TMChartSeries.SeriesMarks' property.
"talText" - use labels from the '%TMChartSeries.XLabels' property.

Property.name: Labels
Property.Description: Determines, should the axis labels (if set to "True"), or only tics and grid lines (if set to "False") be shown.

Property.name: LabelsAngle
Property.Description: Specifies how the axis label must be turned. Possible values: 0, 90, 180 or 270 (degrees).

Property.name: LabelsFont
Property.Description: Contains oref og %TMFont object used for labes drawing.

Property.name: LabelsOnAxis
Property.Description: Determines, should be labels on minimum and maximum positions be shown (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: LabelsSeparation
Property.Description: Determines minimal interval between sequential axis labels (in percents) to prevent labels overlapping. Default value is 10.

Property.name: LabelsSize
Property.Description: Determines the distance between the axis and the chart boundary. Default value is 0, that means automatic calculation.

Property.name: Logarithmic
Property.Description: Determines, should the axis be linear (if set to "False") or logarithmic (if set to "True").

Property.name: Maximum
Property.Description: Determines maximum value on the axis. Applicable only if the 'Automatic' property set to "False".

Property.name: Minimum
Property.Description: Determines minimum value on the axis. Applicable only if the 'Automatic' property set to "False".

Property.name: MinorTickCount
Property.Description: Determines number of sub-ticks between the axis labels. Default value is 3.

Property.name: MinorTickLength
Property.Description: Determines sub-ticks length (in pixels).

Property.name: MinorTicks
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining drawing mode for sub-ticks.

Property.name: RoundFirstLabel
Property.Description: Determines, should the axis labeling start from the 'Minimum' value (if set to "False") or the labels should be rounded values (if set to "True").

Property.name: TickInnerLength
Property.Description: Determines the length (in pixels) of ticks drawn inside the chart boundaries. Default value is 0.

Property.name: TickLength
Property.Description: Determines the length (in pixels) of main ticks. Default value is 4.

Property.name: TickOnLabelsOnly
Property.Description: Determines, should the ticks and grid lines be drawn at labels positions only (if set to "True", default value), or at all axis increment positions (if set to "False").

Property.name: Ticks
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining drawing mode for main ticks.

Property.name: TicksInner
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining drawing mode for inner ticks.

Property.name: Title
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartAxisTitle determining attributes of the axis title.

Property.name: TitleSize
Property.Description: Determines the distance between the axis and the chart boundary. Default value is 0, that means automatic calculation.

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should the axis (with labels, ticks, grid lines and title) be visible (if set to "True") or hidden (if set to "False").

Method.name: CalcYPosValue
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding vertical coordinate (in pixels) for the specified value.

Method.name: CalcYSizeValue
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding vertical size (in pixels) for the specified value.

Method.Description: Increments 'Minimum' and 'Maximum' properties by the specified offset to scroll the axis. If the 'InsideLimits' parameter is set to "True", the axis can not be scrolled outside of the series limits.

Method.name: SetMinMax
Method.Description: Assigns specified values to the 'Minimum' and 'Maximum' properties and sets the 'Automatic' property to "False".

Method.name: TickInnerLengthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TickInnerLength") q tmp

Method.name: TickLengthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TickLength") q tmp

Method.name: TitleSizeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TitleSize") q tmp

Method.name: VisibleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Visible") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMChartAxisTitle
Class.Description: Determines the text and format of an axis title.

Property.name: Angle
Property.Description: Specifies how the axis title must be turned. Possible values: 0, 90, 180 or 270 (degrees). Default values: 0 - for horizontal axes, 90 - for left axis, 270 - for right axis.

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Contains the text string to be displayed near the axes.

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMFont object determining font attributes for the axis title.

Class.name: %Library.TMChartGradient
Class.Description: Determines colors for filling a chart background.

Property.name: Direction
Property.Description: Determines the gradient fill direction. Possible values: "gdTopBottom", "gdBottomTop", "gdLeftRight" and "gdRightLeft".

Property.name: EndColor
Property.Description: Specifies 2nd of 2 colors (in hexadecimal RGB format) from which the gradient fill should be composed.

Property.name: StartColor
Property.Description: Specifies 1st of 2 colors (in hexadecimal RGB format) from which the gradient fill should be composed.

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should the chart background be filled with this gradient (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Method.name: DirectionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Direction") q tmp

Method.name: EndColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("EndColor") q tmp

Method.name: StartColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("StartColor") q tmp

Method.name: VisibleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Visible") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMChartLegend
Class.Description: Represents a chart legend object with properties and methods allowing to display and control rectangle containing brief information about chart series.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Determines the legend layout on the chart. Possible values: "laLeft", "laRight", "laTop", "laBottom".

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Determines the color of legend background (in hexadecimal RGB format).

Property.name: ColorWidth
Property.Description: Determines the width of the color mark (in percents of the total width of the legend).

Property.name: DividingLines
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object used for drawing legend items dividing lines.

Property.name: FirstValue
Property.Description: Determines number of the first displayed series, or number of the first displayed point, depending on the 'LegendStyle' property value.

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMFont object determining font attributes for the legend texts.

Property.name: Frame
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining drawing mode for the legend border.

Property.name: HorizMargin
Property.Description: Determines the distance (in pixels) between the right- or left-aligned legend rectangle and the chart boundary. Default value: 0, means automatic calculation.

Property.name: Inverted
Property.Description: Specifies direction of the legend items drawing. If set to "False", items are drawn from top to bottom and from left to right, if set to "True" - in the inverted direction.

Property.name: LegendStyle
Property.Description:
Determines items to be shown in the legend. Possible values:
"lsSeries" - show titles of the series;
"lsValues" - show values of the first active series;
"lsLastValues" - show the last values for all active series;
"lsAuto" - acts as "lsValues" if there is only 1 active series, otherwise - as "lsValues".

Property.name: RectLegend
Property.Description: Readonly, contains the legend coordinates (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)).

Property.name: ResizeChart
Property.Description: Determines, may the chart rectangle may be reduced automatically to aviod overlapping with the legend (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: ShadowColor
Property.Description: Determines color of the legend shadow (in hexadecimal RGB format).

Property.name: ShadowSize
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the legend shadow.

Property.name: TextStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the text items contents. Possible values:
"ltsPlain" - display the point label;
"ltsLeftValue" - display the point value followed by the label;
"ltsRightValue" - display the point label followed by the value;
"ltsLeftPercent" - display the percent of the point represents followed by the label;
"ltsRightPercent" - display the label followed by the percent of the points represent;
"ltsXValue" - display the horizontal value.

Property.name: TopPos
Property.Description: Determines the height of the horizontal legend top (in percents of the legend total height).

Property.name: VertMargin
Property.Description: Determines the distance (in pixels) between the top- or bottom-aligned legend rectangle and the chart boundary. Default value: 0, means automatic calculation.

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should the legend be shown (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMChartPen
Class.Description: This class is inherited from %TMPen and contains additional properties necesssary for charts.

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: If set to "True", the lines drawn by this pen are visible, if set to "False" - hidden.

Method.name: VisibleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Visible") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMChartSeries
Class.Description: Base class for different kinds of chart series.

Property.name: Active
Property.Description: Determines, should the series be shown (if set to "True") or hidden (if set to "False").

Property.name: AfterDrawValues
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the series points painting.

Property.name: BeforeDrawValues
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately before the series points painting.

Property.name: ColorEachPoint
Property.Description: Determines, should all the points have the same color specified in the 'SeriesColor' property (if set to "False"), or use different colors accessible via 'GetValueColor' and 'SetValueColor' methods (if set to "True").

Property.name: ColorSource
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Cursor
Property.Description: Determines type of cursor used on mouse moves over a series point. For possible values see the '%Const.INC' routime. Default value is $$$crDefault.

Property.name: DataSource
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Identifier
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Marks
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMSeriesMarks object determining properies of marks near the series points.

Property.name: OnAfterAdd
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a new point has been included into the series.

Property.name: OnBeforeAdd
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a new point is near to be included into the series.

Property.name: OnClearValues
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when all points has been excluded from the series.

Property.name: OnClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user clicks on a series point.

Property.name: OnDblClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user double-clicks on a series point.

Property.name: OnGetMarkText
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a MarkText string is retrieved.

Property.name: ParentChart
Property.Description: Contains oref of the chart to which this series is attached.

Property.name: PercentFormat
Property.Description: Contains pattern for formatting percent-style marks. For possible values see the '%TMChartAxis.AxisValuesFormat' description.

Property.name: SeriesColor
Property.Description: Determines color (in hexadecimal RGB format) used for points painting when the 'ColorEachPoint' property is set to "False".

Property.name: ShowInLegend
Property.Description: Determines, should the series title be included into the chart legend (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False".

Property.name: Style
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this series.

Property.name: Title
Property.Description: Determines the text string to be displayed in the chart legend.

Property.name: ValueFormat
Property.Description: Contains pattern for formatting marks values. For possible values see the '%TMChartAxis.AxisValuesFormat' description.

Property.name: VertAxis
Property.Description: Determines, left or right axis should be used for the vertical scaling. Possible values: "aLeftAxis" or "aRightAxis".

Property.name: XLabelsSource
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: XValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList with the horizontal values of the series points.

Property.name: XYValues
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: YValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList with the vertical values of the series points.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.Marks.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.Marks=##class(%TMSeriesMarks).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""Marks""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.XYValues.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.XYValues=##class(%TMChartValueList).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""XYValues""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.XValues.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.XValues=##class(%TMChartValueList).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""XValues""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.YValues.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.YValues=##class(%TMChartValueList).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""YValues""))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: ActiveGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Active") q tmp

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds a point with the specified vertical value to the series. Horizontal value will be calculated automatically. Returns the index of added point in the %TMChartValueList object.

Method.name: AddNull
Method.Description: Adds empty point to the series. Such point breaks the line connecting sequential points. Returns index of the added point in the %TMChartValueList object.

Method.name: AddXY
Method.Description: Adds a point with the specified horizontal and vertical value to the series. Returns index of the added point in the %TMChartValueList object.

Method.name: AddY
Method.Description: Adds a point with the specified vertical value to the series. Horizontal value will be calculated automatically. Returns the index of added point in the %TMChartValueList object.

Method.name: CalcXPos
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding horizontal coordinate (in pixels) for the point specified by its index.

Method.name: CalcXPosValue
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding horizontal coordinate (in pixels) for the specified value.

Method.name: CalcXSizeValue
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding horizontal size (in pixels) for the specified value.

Method.name: CalcYPos
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding vertical coordinate (in pixels) for the point specified by its index.

Method.name: CalcYPosValue
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding vertical coordinate (in pixels) for the specified value.

Method.name: CalcYSizeValue
Method.Description: Returns the corresponding vertical size (in pixels) for the specified value.

Method.name: Clear
Method.Description: Removes all points from the series.

Method.name: Clicked
Method.Description: Returns index of clicked series point or -1 if specified screen position does not belong to any series point.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Clicked",$lb(x,y)) q tmp

Method.name: ColorEachPointGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ColorEachPoint") q tmp

Method.name: ColorRange
Method.Description: Sets specified color (in hexadecimal RGB format) to the points specified by their %TMChartValueList oref and the range of indices.

Method.name: ColorSourceGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ColorSource") q tmp

Method.name: Count
Method.Description: Returns total number of points in the series.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Count",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: CursorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Cursor") q tmp

Method.name: DataSourceGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DataSource") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Removes the point specified by its index from the series.

Method.name: FillSampleValues
Method.Description: Populates the series with specified number of points.

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Marks.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Marks,""Marks"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..XValues.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..XValues,""XValues"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..XYValues.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..XYValues,""XYValues"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..YValues.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..YValues,""YValues"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: GetCursorValueIndex
Method.Description: Returns index of the point nearest to the mouse cursor, or -1 if all points are far from it.

Method.name: GetHorizAxis
Method.Description: Determines, what horizontal axis is associated with this series - "TopAxis" or "BottomAxis".

Method.name: GetMarkValue
Method.Description: Returns the value to be shown at the specified mark (usually YValue, for some exclusions like '%TMHorizBarSeries' - XValue).

Method.name: GetValueColor
Method.Description: Returns the color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for displaying the specified series point when 'ColorEachPoint' property is set to "True".

Method.name: GetValueMarkText
Method.Description: Returns the text for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: GetXLabel
Method.Description: Returns the horizontal label for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: GetXValue
Method.Description: Returns the horizontal value for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: GetYValue
Method.Description: Returns the vertical value for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: IdentifierGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Identifier") q tmp

Method.name: MandatoryValueList
Method.Description: Returns oref of %TMChartValueList object containing most significant values (usually YValue, for some exclusions like '%TMHorizBarSeries' - XValue) for the series.

Method.name: MarkPercent
Method.Description: Returns text representation of the specified value for displaying precent-style mark. If the 'AddTotal' parameter is "True", the percent value will be separated from the main text by " of " string.

Method.name: MaxMarkWidth
Method.Description: Returns maximal width (in pixels) of all marks in the series.

Method.name: MaxXValue
Method.Description: Returns the maximal horizontal value of all marks in the series.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("MaxXValue",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: MaxYValue
Method.Description: Returns the maximal horizontal value of all marks in the series.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("MaxYValue",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: MinXValue
Method.Description: Returns the minimal horizontal value of all marks in the series.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("MinXValue",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: MinYValue
Method.Description: Returns the minimal vertical value of all marks in the series.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("MinYValue",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: OnClickSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnClick=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnClick",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnDblClickSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDblClick=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDblClick",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnGetMarkTextSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnGetMarkText=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnGetMarkText",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: PercentFormatGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("PercentFormat") q tmp

Method.name: PointOrigin
Method.Description: Calculates summed values returned by the 'GetMarkValue' methods. Applicable to '%TMAreaSeries', '%TMBarSeries' and '%TMHorizBarSeries'.

Method.name: SetValueColor
Method.Description: Assigns the color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for displaying the specified series point when 'ColorEachPoint' property is set to "True".

Method.name: SetValueMarkText
Method.Description: Assigns the text for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: SetXLabel
Method.Description: Assigns the horizontal label for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: SetXValue
Method.Description: Assigns the horizontal value for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: SetYValue
Method.Description: Assigns the vertical value for displaying the specified series point.

Method.name: ShowInLegendGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShowInLegend") q tmp

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Method.name: SwapValueIndex
Method.Description: Swaps 2 points (specified by their indices) in the series.

Method.name: TitleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Title") q tmp

Method.name: ValueFormatGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ValueFormat") q tmp

Method.name: VertAxisGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("VertAxis") q tmp

Method.name: VisibleCount
Method.Description: Returns number of points with XValues from the range between the minimum and maximum of the horizontal axis.

Method.name: XLabelsSourceGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("XLabelsSource") q tmp

Method.name: XScreenToValue
Method.Description: Converts horizontal screen coordinate to the corresponding value.

Method.name: XValueToText
Method.Description: Returns the text representation of the specified value.

Method.name: YScreenToValue
Method.Description: Converts vertical screen coordinate to the corresponding value.

Method.name: YValueToText
Method.Description: Returns the text representation of the specified value.

Class.name: %Library.TMChartShape
Class.Description: This class is derived from %TMChartSeries and allows to draw shapes in the corresponding places of the chart. The shape type is determined by the 'Style' property, possible values are: "chasRectangle", "chasCircle", "chasVertLine", "chasHorizLine", "chasTriangle", "chasInvertTriangle", "chasLine" or "chasDiamond".

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Detemines horizontal text alignment inside the target rectangle. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify" or "taCenter".

Property.name: Bounds
Property.Description: Determines the bounding rectangle (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom), in axes rather than screen coordinates) for the shape.

Property.name: Brush
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBrush object determining the color and pattern used when the shapes background filling.

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMFont object determining the font attributes for displaying the 'Text' property.

Property.name: Pen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining attributes of the pen for the shapes drawing.

Property.name: RoundRectangle
Property.Description: Determines, should the rectangles be drawn with rounded corners (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMStrings object with collection of strings to be displayed inside the shapes.

Property.name: Transparent
Property.Description: Determines, should the shapes interior be filled (if set to "False", default value) or remain unchanged (if set to "True").

Property.name: X0
Property.Description: Determines the axis coordinate of the left edge of the bounding rectangle.

Property.name: X1
Property.Description: Determines the axis coordinate of the right edge of the bounding rectangle.

Property.name: XYStyle
Property.Description: Possible values: "xysPixels", "xysAxis"," xysAxisOrigin"

Property.name: Y0
Property.Description: Determines the axis coordinate of the top edge of the bounding rectangle.

Property.name: Y1
Property.Description: Determines the axis coordinate of the bottom edge of the bounding rectangle.

Method.name: %OnClose

Class.name: %Library.TMChartTitle
Class.Description: Allows to display a chart title or footer (depending on corresponding %TMChart properties).

Property.name: AdjustFrame
Property.Description: Determines, should the title and the footer be resized to the chart size (if set to "True", default value) or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Detemines horizontal text alignment inside the target rectangle. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify" or "taCenter".

Property.name: Brush
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBrush object determining the color and pattern used when the title and footer background filling.

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMFont object determining the font attributes for displaying the 'Text' property.

Property.name: Frame
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining attributes of the pen for drawing frame around the chart axis.

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMStrings object with collection of strings to be displayed as the chart title or footer.

Property.name: TitleRect
Property.Description: Determines the bounding rectangle for title or footer (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom).

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should the title or footer be shown (if set to "True") or hidden (if set to "False").

Class.name: %Library.TMChartValueList
Class.Description: Represents collection of values of series points.

Property.name: DateTime
Property.Description: Determines, have values numeric (if set to "False") or datetime (if set to "True") format.

Property.name: Multiplier
Property.Description: Comtains the multiplier for conversion points values.

Property.name: Name
Property.Description: Identifies the value list. Necessary if a series has more than one value list.

Property.name: Order
Property.Description: Determines the points sorting mode by the XValues. Possible values: "loAscending", "loDescending" or "loNone".

Property.name: ValueSource
Property.Description: For internal use.

Method.name: ClearList
Method.Description: Deletes all point values from the list.

Method.name: ClearValues
Method.Description: Deletes all point values from the list.

Method.name: Count
Method.Description: Returns the number of points values in the collection.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Count",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: DateTimeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DateTime") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Deletes value specified by its index from the collection.

Method.name: First
Method.Description: Returns the value of the first point in the collection.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("First",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: GetValue
Method.Description: Returns the value specified by its index.

Method.name: Last
Method.Description: Returns the value of the last point in the collection.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Last",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: Locate
Method.Description: Returns index of the specified value or -1 if there is no such value in the collection.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Locate",$lb(Value)) q tmp

Method.name: ModifyValue
Method.Description: Changes the value of point specified by its index without raising any events.

Method.name: MultiplierGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Multiplier") q tmp

Method.name: OrderGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Order") q tmp

Method.name: RecalcMinMax
Method.Description: Recalculated minimum and maximum values for the corresponding axis.

Method.name: Scroll
Method.Description: Performs left cyclic shift of the collection.

Method.name: SetValue
Method.Description: Assigns the value of point specified by its index.

Method.name: Sort
Method.Description: Reorders the points in the collection according to the 'Order' property value.

Method.name: ValueSourceGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ValueSource") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMChartWall
Class.Description: This class contains properties allowing to control the left and bottom chart walls painting.

Property.name: Brush
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBrush object determining the color and pattern used when the wall background filling.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Determines color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for the wall background filling.

Property.name: Pen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining attributes of the pen for the wall frame drawing.

Property.name: Size
Property.Description: Determines the wall thickness (in pixels).

Class.name: %Library.TMCheckBox
Class.Description: This class represents the server-side image of a windows check box . It's methods and properties allow to control state (checked/unchecked/grayed) of check boxes.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Determines the check box caption alignment. Possible values: "taLeftJustify" or "taRightJustify", default is "taLeftJustify".

Property.name: AllowGrayed
Property.Description: Determines, is a "grayed" state allowed for the check box. If set to "True", the check box can be checked, unchecked or grayed. If set to "False", only two states are possible: checked or unchecked.

Property.name: Checked
Property.Description: Represents the presence of a check mark in the check box. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: State
Property.Description: Represents state of the check box. Possible values: "cbUnchecked", "cbChecked" or "cbGrayed".

Method.name: AlignmentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Alignment") q tmp

Method.name: AllowGrayedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AllowGrayed") q tmp

Method.name: CheckedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Checked") q tmp

Method.name: StateGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("State") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMCheckListBox
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of a standard Windows control showing the list of items that can be selected, scrolled, added, deleted or checked.

Property.name: AllowGrayed
Property.Description: Determines, is a "grayed" state allowed for the check box. If set to "True", the check box can be checked, unchecked or grayed. If set to "False", only two states are possible: checked or unchecked.

Property.name: AutoComplete
Property.Description: Determines whether the user can give focus to items by typing in the list..

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description: If set to "bsSingle", the list view will have a single-line border. "bsNone" means no border.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas which may be used for drawing on the listbox control from the OnDrawItem events handler.

Property.name: Columns
Property.Description: For multicolumn listboxes, represents the number of columns visible without scrolling.

Property.name: HeaderBackgroundColor
Property.Description: Specifies the background color for a header item in the listbox.

Property.name: HeaderColor
Property.Description: Specifies the font color for a header item in the list box.

Property.name: IntegralHeight
Property.Description: If this property is set to "True" and the listbox style is "lsOwnerDrawFixed", only integer number of items can be visible, otherwise, some items can be shown partially.

Property.name: ItemHeight
Property.Description: Specifies the height of the listbox items (in pixels). Has sense only for "lsOwnerDrawFixed" and "lsOwnerDrawVariable" values of the Style property. Can be overriden by the value set in OnMeasureItem event handler.

Property.name: ItemIndex
Property.Description: Represents the number of the selected listbox item (numbering starts from 0). Equals to -1 if no items selected.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: Collection of the checklistbox items. Use %TMString methods (Add, Insert, Move, Delete, IndexOf) to operate with separate items.

Property.name: OnDrawItem
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when an item in an owner-draw checklistbox is to be displayed. Handler may use %TMCanvas methods to add graphic elements to the item or to replace the item text by an image.

Property.name: OnMeasureItem
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when an item in a owner-draw-variable checklistbox is to be redisplayed. The handler should specify the height (in pixels), necessary to draw an item.

Property.name: SelCount
Property.Description: Read only, contains the number of selected items if multiselect is allowed.

Property.name: Sorted
Property.Description: Determines, should the checklistbox items be sorted in alphabetic order (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines the style of the checklistbox. The possible values: "lbStandard" - all items have the same height.
"lbOwnerDrawFixed" - owner-draw listbox, with the OnDrawItem event occuring when an item is to be drawn; all items height is determined by the ItemHeight property.
"lbOwnerDrawVariable" - owner-draw listbox, with the OnDrawItem and OnMeasureItem events occuring when an item is to be drawn; items can have different heights.

Property.name: TabWidth
Property.Description: Determines the tabs size for this checklistbox. If set to 0, the default Windows setting is used.

Property.name: TopIndex
Property.Description: Represents the index of the topmost visible item in the checklistbox.

Method.name: GetChecked
Method.Description: Returns "True" if the item with specified Index is checked, otherwise - "False".

Method.name: GetSelected
Method.Description: Returns "True" if the item with specified Index is selected, otherwise - "False".

Method.name: GetState
Method.Description:
Returns state of listbox item specified by its Index. Possible values:
"cbUnchecked", "cbChecked" or "cbGrayed".

Method.name: HeaderColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HeaderColor") q tmp

Method.name: IntegralHeightGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("IntegralHeight") q tmp

Method.name: ItemAtPos
Method.Description: Returns the index of the listbox item at the specified position of the control. The Pos parameter should contain $lb(X,Y), the Existing parameter determines, will the method return -1 (if set to "True") or last item index+1 (if set to "False") when no item found at the specified position.

Method.Description: Returns the coordinates ($lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) of the item specified by the Item parameter.

Method.name: SetSelected
Method.Description: Selects (if Value is "True") or deselects (if Value is "False") the item specified by the Index.

Method.name: SetState
Method.Description:
Sets state of listbox item specified by its Index. Possible values of Value:
"cbUnchecked", "cbChecked" or "cbGrayed".

Class.name: %Library.TMColorDialog
Class.Description: This class enables color selecting modal dialog. The Execute method activates dialog, after the dialog completed, the Color property contains selected color.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Contains the value of color selected in the dialog box (in hexadecimal RGB format) or determines default color when dialog box opens. Macros from %Const.INC may be used here.

Property.name: Ctl3D
Property.Description: Determines, should the control look three-dimensional (if set to "True") or flat (if set to "False").

Property.name: CustomColors
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMString object with values of custom colors available in the dialog. Each string should be in the format "Color(A-P)=hexadecimal RGB".

Property.name: HelpContext
Property.Description: Contains the context ID of the help system screen related to this dialog.

Property.name: OnClose
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the dialog is about to be closed.

Property.name: OnShow
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the form is shown as a result of <i>Execute<i>method.

Property.name: Options
Property.Description:
Determines the diaolg options. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb) where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"cdFullOpen" - enable custom color options;
"cdPreventFullOpen" - disable the "Define Custom Colors" button;
"cdShowHelp" - enable "Help" button;
"cdSolidColor" - use the nearest solid color to the selected one;
"cdAnyColor" - enables dithered colors selection.
Default value: $lb().

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control

Class.name: %Library.TMComPort
Class.Description: This class provides methods and properties enabling access to COM-ports on a client's computer.

Property.name: BaudRate
Property.Description:
Represents baud rate for the COM-port connection. Possible values:
"br110", "br300", "br600", "br1200", "br2400", "br4800", "br9600", "br14400", "br19200", "br38400", "br56000", "br57600", "br115200".
Note that both sides of the connection must have equal baud rates.

Property.name: Buffer
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMComBuffer object associated with the COM-port buffer.

Property.name: Connected
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the COM-port is opened successfully, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: DataBits
Property.Description:
Determines number of data bits. Possible values:
"dbFive", "dbSix", "dbSeven", "dbEight".

Property.name: DiscardNull
Property.Description: Determines, should null bytes be discarded (if set to "True") or accepted (if set to "False").

Property.name: EventChar
Property.Description: Specifies ASCII-code of byte, receiving of which raises "OnRxFlag" event.

Property.name: Events
Property.Description:
Contains Cache' list ($lb()) of strings determining which events should be monitored. Possible values of these strings:
"evRxChar", "evTxEmpty", "evRxFlag", "evRing", "evBreak", "evCTS", "evDSR", "evError", "evRLSD", "evRx80Full".

Property.name: FlowControl
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMComFlowControl object associated with this COM-port.

Property.name: Name
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: OnAfterClose
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the COM-port has been successfully disconnected (by 'Close' method call or by setting 'Connected' property to "False").

Property.name: OnAfterOpen
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the COM-port has been successfully connected (by 'Open' method call or by setting 'Connected' property to "True").

Property.name: OnBeforeClose
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the COM-port is near to be disconnected.

Property.name: OnBeforeOpen
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the COM-port is near to be connected.

Property.name: OnBreak
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when break of input has been detected.

Property.name: OnCTSChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the Clear-To-Send signal is changed (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True" - from low to high, otherwise - from high to low).

Property.name: OnDSRChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the Data-Send-Ready signal is changed (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True" - from low to high, otherwise - from high to low).

Property.name: OnError
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when data status error has been detected.

Property.name: OnRLSDChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the Receive-Line-Signal-Detected signal is changed (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True" - from low to high, otherwise - from high to low).

Property.name: OnRing
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when ring indicator has been detected.

Property.name: OnRx80Full
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when input buffer 80%-full.

Property.name: OnRxBuf
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when input data have been read by some other component, such data are available via the 'Buffer' parameter.

Property.name: OnRxChar
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when input byte(s) has been arrived.

Property.name: OnRxFlag
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the byte specified in 'EventChar' property has been arrived.

Property.name: OnTxEmpty
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when all data from the output buffer have been sent.

Property.name: Parity
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMComParity object associated with this COM-port.

Property.name: Port
Property.Description: Specifies the name of used COM-port. Possible values: "COM1", "COM2", etc.

Property.name: StopBits
Property.Description:
Determines number of stop bits. Possible values:
"sbOneStopBit", "sbOne5StopBits", "sbTwoStopBits".

Property.name: SyncMethod
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary value associated with this control.

Property.name: Timeouts
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMComportTimeouts object associated with this COM-port.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: ClearBuffer
Method.Description: Clears input and/or output buffer(s), as specified by 'Input' and 'Output' parameters.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("InputCount",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: IsAsyncCompleted
Method.Description: Contains "False" while asynchronous operations are in progress or "True" if all these operations have been completed.

Method.name: LastErrors
Method.Description:
Returns Cache' list ($lb()) of error codes occured since previous call of this method. Possible error codes:
"ceFrame" - framing error;
"ceRxParity" - parity error;
"ceOverrun" - character buffer overrun, last byte has been lost;
"ceBreak" - break detected;
"ceIO" - communication error;
"ceMode" - unsupported mode;
"ceRxOver" - input buffer overflow;
"ceTxFull" - output buffer overflow.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("LastErrors",$lb()) q tmp
