Method.Description: Returns number of bytes in the output buffer.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("OutputCount",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: PortGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Port") q tmp

Method.name: ReadStr
Method.Description: Reads specified number of bytes from the buffer and returns string. If the buffer does not contain required number of bytes, waits for them until timeout elapses.

Method.name: ReadStrAsync
Method.Description: Reads specified number of bytes from the buffer and returns read string.

Method.name: SetBreak
Method.Description: Sets (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") or unsets (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") break state.

Method.name: SetDTR
Method.Description: Enables (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") or disables (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") Data-Terminal-Ready signal.

Method.name: SetRTS
Method.Description: Enables (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") or disables (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") Request-To-Send signal.

Method.name: SetXonXoff
Method.Description: Simulates Xon (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") or Xoff (if 'OnOff' parameter is "True") character arrival.

Method.name: Signals
Method.Description:
Returns Cache' list ($lb()) of strings describing what signals are in the high state. Possible values of these strings:
"csCTS", "csDSR", "csRing" and "csRLSD".
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Signals",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: StateFlags
Method.Description:
Returns Cache' list ($lb()) of strings corresponding to set COM-port state flags. Possible values of these strings:
"fCtlHold" - if set, transmission is waiting for the CTS signal;
"fDsrHold" - if set, transmission is waiting for the DSR signal;
"fRlsHold" - if set, transmission is waiting for the RLSD signal;
"fXoffHold" - if set, transmission is waiting due to XOff character received;
"fXoffSent" - if set, transmission is waiting due to XOff character transmitted;
"fEof" - if set, the EOF character has been received;
"fTxim" - if set, some character is queued to be transmitted by 'TransmitChar' method before other output buffer.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("StateFlags",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: StopBitsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("StopBits") q tmp

Method.name: SyncMethodGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SyncMethod") q tmp

Method.name: TransmitChar
Method.Description: Transmits specified character before characters (if any) pending in output buffer.

Method.name: WaitForAsync
Method.Description: Returns when specified asynchonous operation is completed.

Method.name: WriteStr
Method.Description: Places specified string into output buffer, waits for transmission completion or timeout elapse.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("WriteStr",$lb(Str)) q tmp

Method.name: WriteStrAsync
Method.Description: Places specified string into output buffer without waiting.

Method.name: ReadIntervalGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ReadInterval") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMComboBox
Class.Description: This class represents the server-side image of a windows dropdown list (combobox) . Its methods and properties allow to fill dropdown lists and get information about selected options.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: OREF of %TMCanvas to be used to display owner-drawn items.

Property.name: CharCase
Property.Description: Determines the case conversion of the text in dropdown list. Possible values: "ecNormal" (no conversion), "ecUpperCase" and "ecLowerCase". Note that case conversion affects on the actual text, not only on it's appearance.

Property.name: DropDownCount
Property.Description: Determines the maximum number of items which can be displayed without scrolling. Default value is 8. Has no sense if Style is "csSimple".

Property.name: DroppedDown
Property.Description: Represents the state of combobox, is it dropped down (1) or closed up (0). Has no sense if Style is "csSimple".

Property.name: ItemHeight
Property.Description: Specifies the height of the dropdown list items (in pixels). Has sense only for "csOwnerDrawFixed" and "csOwnerDrawVariable" values of Style. Can be overriden by the value set in OnMeasureItem event handler.

Property.name: ItemIndex
Property.Description: Represents the number of the selected drop-down list item (numbering starts from 0). Equals to -1 if no items selected.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: Collection of the drop-down list options. Use %TMString methods (Add, Insert, Move, Delete, IndexOf) to operate with separate items.

Property.name: MaxLength
Property.Description: Limits the length of string the user can input in the edit portion of the drop-down list. 0 means no limitation.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when the text the edit region changes.

Property.name: OnDrawItem
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when an item in an owner-draw drop-down list is to be displayed. Handler may use %TMCanvas methods to add graphic elements to the item or to replace the item text by an image.

Property.name: OnDropDown
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when the user activates the drop-down list.

Property.name: OnMeasureItem
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when an item in a owner-draw-variable drop-down list is to be redisplayed. The handler should specify the height (in pixels), necessary to draw an item.

Property.name: Query
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMQuery object used in the ExecuteQuery method. See %TMQuery description for details.

Property.name: SelLength
Property.Description: Represents the length of the selected text in the edit region of the drop-down list.

Property.name: SelStart
Property.Description: Represent the number of first symbol of selected part of text in the edit region of the drop-down list (numbering starts from 0).

Property.name: SelText
Property.Description: Represents the selected text in the edit region of the drop-down list. Change of this property replaces the selected text with new value, or inserts it at the cursor if no text is selected.

Property.name: Sorted
Property.Description: Determines, should the drop-down list items be sorted in alphabetic order (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines the style of the drop-down list. The possible values: "csDropDown" - drop-down list with an edit region for custom text input.
"csSimple" list box with an edit region for custom text input.
"csDropDownList" - drop-down list with read-only edit region.
"csOwnerDrawFixed" - owner-draw drop-down list with an edit region for custom text input, with the OnDrawItem event occuring when an item is to be drawn; all items height is determined by the ItemHeight property.
"csOwnerDrawVariable" - owner-draw drop-down list with an edit region for custom text input, with the OnDrawItem and OnMeasureItem events occuring when an item is to be drawn; items can have different heights.

Method.Description: Executes query and loads information in combobox. Query class, name and other information must be stored in Query property.
Method.Implementation: n query,params,i s query=##class(%ResultSet).%New(..Query.QueryClass_"."_..Query.QueryName) q:query=$$$NULLOREF $$$ERROR("Invalid query name") d ..Items.Clear() s params="" f i=1:1:16 d:$d(@("p"_i)) . i params="" s params="p"_i . e s params=params_",p"_i x "d query.Execute("_params_")" f q:'query.Next() d . d:..Query.IdField'="" ..Items.AddObject(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",")),query.GetDataByName(..Query.IdField)) . d:..Query.IdField="" ..Items.Add(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,","))) q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMCompositeReport
Class.Description: This component holds references to other report components. For report constructing component use references. For example, d ..CompositeReport1.ClearReportList() d ..CompositeReport1.AddReport(..Report1) d ..CompositeReport1.AddReport(..Report2) d ..CompositeReport1.AddReport(..Report3) d ..CompositeReport1.ShowReport() this code creates new report from reports ..Report1, ..Report2, ..Report3. If added reports have property "Print on prev page" turned on, report prints on last page of previous report.

Method.name: AddReport
Method.Description: Adds available report component to internal report list.

Method.name: ClearReportList
Method.Description: This method clears internal reports list.

Class.name: %Library.TMControl
Class.Description: The base class for visual controls, containing methods and properties common for all of them.

Property.name: Align
Property.Description:
Determines the control alignment inside it's parent form or panel. Possible values:
"alLeft" - align control to the left side;
"alRight" - align control to the right side;
"alTop" - align control to the top;
"alBottom" - align control to the bottom;
"alNone" - remain control where it was positioned.
Values can not be combined. To bind control to the form angles rahther than to edges, use Anchors method.

Property.name: Anchors
Property.Description:
Determines how the control is anchored to it's parent form or panel. Possible values: Cache' list ($lb) where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"akLeft", "akRight", "akTop", "akBottom";
or $lb() to cancel anchoring.
Note that controls anchored simultaneously to the opposite sides of the parent from or panel will be stretched when parent resizing.

Property.name: AutoSize
Property.Description: Determines, may the control size itself automatically. Default value is "False".

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Specifies a text string associated with this control. The character marked with ampersand can be used as accelerator key.

Property.name: ClientHeight
Property.Description: Determines the height (in pixels) of the client area.

Property.name: ClientWidth
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the client area.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Determines the background color. Available predefined values are listed in %Const.INC. If changed, the ParentColor propery is automaticlly set to "False".

Property.name: Constraints
Property.Description: Determines the minimal and maximal height and width of the control. Look %TMSizeConstraints description for details.

Property.name: Cursor
Property.Description: Determines the mouse cursor shape when the mouse moves over the current control. Default is $$$crDefault, available values are listed in %Const.INC.

Property.name: DockOrientation
Property.Description:
Determines the docked zones orientation. Possible values:
"doHorizontal: - from left to right,
"doVertical" - from top to bottom,
"doNoOrient" - default value.

Property.name: DragCursor
Property.Description: Determines the mouse cursor shape when the current control is being dragged.

Property.name: DragKind
Property.Description: Determines, is the control being dragged as usual ("dkDrag") or for docking ("dkDock").

Property.name: DragMode
Property.Description:
Determines the possibilty to be drag-and-dropped for the control. Possible values:
"dmAutomatic" - control can be drag-and-dropped,
"dmManual" - control will be drag-and-dropable only after the BeginDrag method call.

Property.name: Enabled
Property.Description: Determines, is the control available for user. "True" (default value) makes the control available for user, enabling handling of mouse, keyboard and timer events. If the property is set to "False", the control ignores events.

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Determines the appearance of the text written in the control. Look %TMFont description for details.

Property.name: Height
Property.Description: Determines the total vertical size (in pixels) of the control.

Property.name: Hint
Property.Description: Determines the text string appearing when the mouse cursor moves over the control and the ShowHint property is set to "True".

Property.name: Left
Property.Description: Determines the horizontal shift (in pixels) of the control left edge relative to the form (or the parent panel) left edge.

Property.name: OnCanResize
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control is resized.

Property.name: OnClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control is clicked, or accelerator key for the control is pressed. Space bar is considered as an accelerator key for the active control, Enter - for default button, Esc - for cancel button.

Property.name: OnConstrainedResize
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control resizes itself in accordance with the value of it's Constraints property.

Property.name: OnDblClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control is double-clicked.

Property.name: OnDragDrop
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the dragged control is dropped.

Property.name: OnDragOver
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when some object is being dragged over the control.

Property.name: OnEndDock
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control has been docked.

Property.name: OnEndDrag
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control dragging stops.

Property.name: OnMouseDown
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the a mouse button is pressed and the mouse cursor is positioned within the control.

Property.name: OnMouseMove
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the mouse cursor moves within the control.

Property.name: OnMouseUp
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the mouse button previously pressed with the mouse cursor was positioned within the control, is released.

Property.name: OnResize
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control is resized.

Property.name: OnStartDock
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control is about to be docked.

Property.name: OnStartDrag
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the a mouse button is pressed and held down with the mouse cusror is positioned within the control.

Property.name: ParentColor
Property.Description: Determines, should the control use the same color as its parent (if set to "True") or use own Color property (if set to "False").

Property.name: ParentFont
Property.Description: Determines, should the control use the same font as its parent (if set to "True") or use own Font property (if set to "False").

Property.name: ParentShowHint
Property.Description: Determines, should the control show hints in accordance with its parent ShowHint (if set to "True") or use own value (if set to "False").

Property.name: PopupMenu
Property.Description:
Specifies oref of the pop-up menu, which should appear when the right mouse button is clicked with the control selected. associated with the control.
Note: if the AutoPopup property of the menu is "False", this menu can be displayed only with the Popup method call.

Property.name: ScalingFlags
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: ShowHint
Property.Description: Determines whether hints are enabled (if set to "True") or disabled (if set to "False") for the control.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Determines the contents of edit and memo controls and edit regions of comboboxes.

Property.name: Top
Property.Description: Determines the vertical shift (in pixels) of the control upper edge relative to the form (or the parent panel) upper edge.

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines the visibility of the control. Possible values: "True" (default) or "False".

Property.name: Width
Property.Description:
Determines the total horizontal size (in pixels) of the control.
Does not affects on tab sheets at runtime.

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: Invalidate
Method.Description:
Tells Windows to repaint the control after other important Windows messages are handled.
Use Invalidate when the entire control needs to be repainted. When more than one region within the control needs repainting, Invalidate will cause the entire window to be repainted in a single pass, avoiding flicker caused by redundant repaints. There is no performance penalty for calling Invalidate multiple times before the control is actually repainted.

Method.name: Repaint
Method.Description:
Forces the control to repaint its image on the screen.
Call Repaint to force the control to repaint its image immediately. If the ControlStyle property includes csOpaque, the control paints itself directly. Otherwise, the Repaint method calls the Invalidate method and then the Update method so that any visible portions of controls beneath the control will be repainted as well.

Method.name: ScalingFlagsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ScalingFlags") q tmp

Method.name: ScreenToClient
Method.Description: Converts coordinates (format - $lb(X,Y)) in the screen coordinate stsyem to the local (control client area) coordinates.

Method.name: SendToBack
Method.Description: Moves control to the bottom of overlapping controls stack. Can not windowed control (such as edit) below a non-windowed control (such as label). Sent to back control loses focus.

Method.name: ShowHintGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShowHint") q tmp

Method.name: TextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Text") q tmp

Method.name: TopGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Top") q tmp

Method.name: Update
Method.Description:
Processes any pending paint messages immediately.
Call Update to force the control to be repainted before any more, possibly time-consuming, processing takes place. Use Update to provide immediate feedback to the user that cannot wait for the Windows paint message to arrive. Update does not invalidate the control, but simply forces a repaint of any regions that have already been invalidated. Call Repaint instead if you need to invalidate the control as well.

Class.name: %Library.TMControlScrollBar
Class.Description: This class displays and controls scrollbar for scrollable windowed controls.

Property.name: ButtonSize
Property.Description: Determines the scrollbar button size (in pixels).

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Determines the color of scrollbar (in hexadecimal RGB, macros from Const.INC may be used).

Property.name: Increment
Property.Description: Determines the scrolled area shift when end arrow is clicked (in positions).

Property.name: Margin
Property.Description: Determines the minimal distance (in pixels) between each visual control and scrolled area edge to display scrollbar.

Property.name: Position
Property.Description: Contains the scrollbar position. Possible value: from 0 to "Range" value.

Property.name: Range
Property.Description: Contains total size of scrolled area (in pixels).

Property.name: ScrollBarVisible
Property.Description: Indicates, does the scrollbar range fit in the client area. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: ScrollPos
Property.Description: Read-only, contains the "Position" value if the scrollbar is visible, otherwise - 0.

Property.name: Size
Property.Description: Determines the scrollbar size (in pixels).

Property.name: Smooth
Property.Description: If set to "True", the increment of scrolling is automatically calculated according to the size of client area.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines scroobar style. Possible values: "ssRegular" - usual scrollbar;
"ssFlat" - flat scrollbar;
"ssHotTrack" - scrollbar allowing hot tracking.

Property.name: ThumbSize
Property.Description: Determines the thumb tab size (in pixels).

Property.name: Tracking
Property.Description: Determines, should the scrolling area move if thumb tab is moved but not released (if set to "True"), or only when thumb tab is released (if set to "False").

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should the scrollbar appear if necessary (see the "Margin" property description) (if set to "True"), or never (if set to "False").

Class.name: %Library.TMConverter
Class.Description: Class intended for creating text files of special format, that can be imported with File/Import/Import TXT command. This is useful when you need to convert some existing application to SMWrap or automate creation of SMWrap forms. For detailed explanation of usage see example form (in SMWrap\Examples directory).

Method.name: AddStringProp
Method.Implementation: ; PropName:%String,PropValue:%String n str,len,i,InString,char s len=$L(PropValue) i len=0 q "''" s InString=0 s str="" f i=1:1:len d . s char=$E(PropValue,i) . i ($A(char)'<32)&(char'="'") d ; printed and not special pascal case . . i InString s str=str_char . . e s str=str_"'"_char . . s InString=1 . e d ; nonprinted or special pascal case . . i InString s str=str_"'#"_$A(char) . . e s str=str_"#"_$A(char) . . s InString=0 ; terminate string i InString s str=str_"'" d ..WriteIndent() d ..File.Write(PropName_" = "_str) d ..File.Write(..EndLine) q

Method.name: OpenFile
Method.Implementation: ; close current file if open n ret d ..CloseFile() s ..File.Name=FileName d ..File.Open("NW") i ..File.IsOpen s ret=$$$OK e s ret=0 q ret

Method.name: WriteIndent
Method.Implementation: n i i ..Indent<0 s ..Indent=0 i ..Indent'=0 d . f i=1:1:..Indent d . . d ..File.Write(" ") q

Class.name: %Library.TMCustomBarSeries
Class.Description: Base class for %TMBarSeries and %TMHorizBarSeries.

Property.name: AutoMarkPosition
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: BarBrush
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBrush object used for the bar filling.

Property.name: BarPen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object used for the bar outline.

Property.name: BarStyle
Property.Description: Determines the shape of the bar. Possible values: "bsArrow", "bsCilinder", "bsEllipse", "bsInvPyramid", "bsPyramid", "bsRectangle". Default value: "bsRectangle".

Property.name: BarWidthPercent
Property.Description: Determines the bar width in percents of the distance between corresponding edges of adjacent bars.

Property.name: Dark3D
Property.Description: If set to "True", the bar edges will look like shadowed.

Property.name: MultiBar
Property.Description:
Determines, how the multiple series belonging to the same chart should be drawn. Possible values:
"mbNone" - next series behind the previous one;
"mbSide" - next series side-by-side to the previous one;
"mbStacked" - next series on top of the previous one;
"mbStacked100" - next series on top of the previous one, adjusting individual points to the (0-100) scale.

Property.name: OffsetPercent
Property.Description: Determines the distance between adjacent bars in percents of the bar width. May be negative to create overlapping bars.

Property.name: OnGetBarStyle
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the bar style is retrieved.

Property.name: SideMargins
Property.Description: Determines, should margins separate first and last bars from the chart edges (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: UseYOrigin
Property.Description: Determines, should the 'YOrigin' property value (if set to "True") or the minimum of bars values (if set to "False" be used as the bars starting point.

Property.name: YOrigin
Property.Description: Determines the bars starting point when the 'UseYOrigin' property is set to "True".

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMChartSeries") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMChartSeries") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMChartSeries)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMCustomSeries
Class.Description: Base class for %TMAreaSeries, %TMLineSeries and %TMPoinSeries.

Property.name: AreaBrush
Property.Description: Determines pattern used when the area filling. Possible values: "bsSolid", "bsClear", "bsHorizontal", "bsVertical" ,"bsFDiagonal", "bsBDiagonal", "bsCross", "bsDiagCross".

Property.name: AreaColor
Property.Description: Determines color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for the area filling.

Property.name: AreaLinesPen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining attributes of the pen for drawing vertical lines through the area.

Property.name: DrawArea
Property.Description: Determines, should the area between the points connecting line and the chart bottom be filled (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: HorizAxis
Property.Description: Determines, what horizontal axis is associated with this series - "TopAxis" or "BottomAxis".

Property.name: InvertedStairs
Property.Description: Determines, should the stairs (see the 'Stairs' property description) be formed by the horizontal line followed by vertical one (if set to "False"), or by the vertical line followed by horizontal one (if set to "True").

Property.name: LineBrush
Property.Description: Determines pattern used when the %TMLineSeries contents filling. Possible values: "bsSolid", "bsClear", "bsHorizontal", "bsVertical" ,"bsFDiagonal", "bsBDiagonal", "bsCross", "bsDiagCross".

Property.name: LinePen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object determining attributes of the pen for drawing points connecting lines.

Property.name: OnClickPointer
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user clicks on a pointer (see the 'Pointer' property description).

Property.name: OnGetPointerStyle
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a pointer style is retrieved.

Property.name: Pointer
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMSeriesPointer object determining the shape to be painted on each vertical coordinate.

Property.name: SeriesColor
Property.Description: Determines default color for all series points painting.

Property.name: Stairs
Property.Description: Determines, should the adjacent points be connected by direct lines (if set to "False") or by stairs, i.e., pairs of horizontal and vertical lines (if set to "True").

Class.name: %Library.TMDateEdit
Class.Description: This class represents the date-selecting dialog with the popup calendar and the edit field for direct date input.

Property.name: AutoSelect
Property.Description: Determines, should the text in the edit field be automatically selected when the control gets focus.

Property.name: BlanksChar
Property.Description: Determines character to be displayed in the edit field to mark blank places to be filled.

Property.name: ButtonHint
Property.Description: Contains text of hint for the calendar popup button.

Property.name: ButtonWidth
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the button for the calendar popup.

Property.name: CalendarHints
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMStrings object with texts of the popup calendar hints.

Property.name: CalendarStyle
Property.Description: Determines the calendar style. Possible values: "csPopup" (default value) or "csDialog".

Property.name: CheckOnExit
Property.Description: Determines, should 'OnAcceptDate' event occur when the dialog finishes (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: ClickKey
Property.Description: For use in future.

Property.name: Date
Property.Description: Contains entered or selected date in the Cache' horolog format.

Property.name: DefaultToday
Property.Description: Determines, should the today date be considered as default for this dialog (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: DialogTitle
Property.Description: Contains the text string to be displayed as the dialog title.

Property.name: DirectInput
Property.Description: Determines, is the direct input of date allowed (if set to "True") or disabled (if set to "False").

Property.name: Glyph
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBitMap object with the image of custom glyph for the calendar popup button.

Property.name: GlyphKind
Property.Description: Determines appearance of the glyph on the button for the calendar popup. Possible values: "gkDefault", "gkDropDown", "gkEllipsis" or "gkCustom".

Property.name: HideSelection
Property.Description: Determines, should selected text in the edit field remain highlighted when the control looses focus (if set to "False") or not (if set to "True").

Property.name: NumGlyphs
Property.Description: For use in future.

Property.name: OnAcceptDate
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the selected date requires validation.

Property.name: OnButtonClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the calendar popup button is clicked.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the date selected in the popup calendar or typed in the edit field changes.

Property.name: PopupAlign
Property.Description: Determines the popup calendar alignment. Possible values: "epaLeft" or "epaRight".

Property.name: PopupColor
Property.Description: Determines background color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for the popup calendar.

Property.name: StartOfWeek
Property.Description: Determines starting day of a week. Possible values: "Mon" (default value), "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat" or "Sun".

Property.name: WeekendColor
Property.Description: Determines foreground color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for weekends in the popup calendar. To change foreground color for working days, use the inherited 'Font.Color' property.

Property.name: Weekends
Property.Description: Determines days to be marked as weekends. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb()) where only necessary of the following strings are combined: "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat" or "Sun". Default vaue: $lb("Sun").

Property.name: YearDigits
Property.Description: Determines, should years be represented by 2 or 4 digits. Possible values: "dyFour", "dyTwo" or "dyDefault".

Class.name: %Library.TMDock
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of the object used to dock %TMToolBar objects.

Property.name: AllowDrag
Property.Description: Determines, can toolbars on this dock be dragged, and other toolbars be docked at this dock (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Background
Property.Description: Optional, contains oref of %TMBitMap object to use as background tile.

Property.name: BackgroundOnToolbars
Property.Description: If set to "True", docked toolbars are transparent for background tile.

Property.name: BackgroundTransparent
Property.Description: If set to "True", the color of upper-left corner of background image is substituted with the value of the 'Color' property.

Property.name: BoundLines
Property.Description: Determines extra lines to be drawn along the dock sides. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb()) containing only necessary from the following strings: "blTop", "blBottom", "blLeft" and "blRight".

Property.name: FixAlign
Property.Description: If set to "True", one pixel may be added to the control's width or height, if it is necessary to align it correctly.

Property.name: LimitToOneRow
Property.Description: If set to "True", only one row of toolbars can be docked. Recommended value is "False".

Property.name: OnInsertRemoveBar
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a toolbar is docked or undocked.

Property.name: OnRequestDock
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when dragged toolbar moves over the dock.

Property.name: Position
Property.Description: Specifies the position of the dock on a form. Possible values: "dpTop", "dpBottom", "dpLeft" or "dpRight".

Class.name: %Library.TMEdit
Class.Description: This class represents the server-side image of a windows single-line edit control.

Property.name: AutoSelect
Property.Description: Determines, should all the text become selected when the focus set on this control. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines, will the control have a border around the client area. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border
"bsNone" - no border.

Property.name: CanUndo
Property.Description: Indicates, are there changes saved in the Undo buffer. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: CharCase
Property.Description: Determines the case conversion of the text in edit control. Possible values: "ecNormal" (no conversion), "ecUpperCase" and "ecLowerCase". Note that case conversion affects on the actual text, not only on it's appearance.

Property.name: HideSelection
Property.Description: Determines, should the selected text be highlighted when the control is out of focus. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: MaxLength
Property.Description: Limits the length of string the user can input in the edit portion of the drop-down list. 0 means no limitation.

Property.name: Modified
Property.Description: Indicates, is the text modified by the user. Possible values: "True" or "False". The code altering the 'Text' property should set the 'Modified' property to "True".

Property.name: OEMConvert
Property.Description: Determines, should the entered characters be converted from the client charset to OEM and then back. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the text is changed.

Property.name: PasswordChar
Property.Description: If set to something else than $C(0), determines the character displayed instead of characters actually typed in the edit control.

Property.name: ReadOnly
Property.Description: Determines, should the text be protected from being changed by user. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: SelLength
Property.Description: Represents the length of the selected text in the edit control.

Property.name: SelStart
Property.Description: Represents the number of first symbol of selected part of text in the edit control (numbering starts from 0). If no text is selected, represents the cursor position.

Property.name: SelText
Property.Description: Represents the selected text in the edit control. Change of this property replaces the selected text with new value, or inserts it at the cursor if no text is selected.

Method.name: AutoSelectGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AutoSelect") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CharCase") q tmp

Method.name: Clear
Method.Description: Puts an empty string to the Text property, removing all text.

Method.name: ClearSelection
Method.Description: Deletes selected part of text from the edit control.

Method.name: ClearUndo
Method.Description: Makes changes in the Text property irreversible and sets the CanUndo property to "False".

Method.name: CopyToClipboard
Method.Description: Copies the selected text into Windows Clipboard. If no text is selected, ClipBoard remains unchanged.

Method.name: CutToClipboard
Method.Description: Copies the selected text into Windows Clipboard and then deletes it from the edit control. If no text is selected, ClipBoard remains unchanged.

Method.name: PasteFromClipboard
Method.Description: Replaces the selected text with the Windows ClipBoard contents. If no text is selected, inserts the Clipboard contents at the cursor. Does nothing if the Clipboard contains no text.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Creates a new %TMFieldDef instance and adds it to the array. Call Add to create an item in the collection. The new item is placed at the end of the Items array. Add returns the OREF to new collection item.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) s %ZoMRi(2153)="" s tmp=##class(%TMPersistent).GetObjOref(##this.RunMethod("Add",$lb())) s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait q tmp

Method.name: GetItem
Method.Description: Provides indexed access to the items in the collection.

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Creates a new %TMFieldDef instance and adds it to the array. Call Insert to add a new item at a specified position in the collection. Existing items (starting from the specified position) are moved up in the array. Insert returns the OREF to new collection item.

Method.name: Close
Method.Description: Closes current file stream without destroying object and Cache' oref.

Method.name: CopyFile
Method.Description: The CopyFile function copies an existing file (Name) to a new file (NewName). If the function succeeds, the return value is "True", else return value is "False"

Method.name: CreateDir
Method.Description:
CreateDir creates a new directory.
Description
The CreateDir function creates a new directory. The return value is "True" if a new directory was successfully created, or "False" if an error occurred.

Method.name: DeleteDir
Method.Description:
DeleteDir deletes an existing empty directory.
Description
Call DeleteDir to remove the directory specified by the Dir paramter. The return value is "True" if a new directory was successfully deleted, "False" if an error occurred. The directory must be empty before it can be successfully deleted.

Method.name: DeleteFile
Method.Description: DeleteFile deletes a file from disk, and returns "False" if the delete fails.

Method.name: FileExists
Method.Description:
FileExists tests if FileName exists.
Description
The FileExists function returns "True" if the file specified by FileName exists. If the file does not exist, FileExists returns "False".

Method.name: FileGetAttr
Method.Description:
FileGetAttr returns the file attributes of FileName.
Description
The attributes can be examined by AND-ing the attributes with the constants defined in TSearchRec. A return value of -1 indicates that an error occurred.
Constant Description
$$$faReadOnly Read-only files $$$faHidden Hidden files $$$faSysFile System files $$$faVolumeID Volume ID files $$$faDirectory Directory files $$$faArchive Archive files $$$faAnyFile Any file

Method.name: FileSetAttr
Method.Description:
FileSetAttr sets the file attributes of a specified file.
Description
The FileSetAttr function sets the file attributes of the file given by FileName to the value given by Attr. The return value is zero if the function was successful.
Constant Description
$$$faReadOnly Read-only files $$$faHidden Hidden files $$$faSysFile System files $$$faVolumeID Volume ID files $$$faDirectory Directory files $$$faArchive Archive files $$$faAnyFile Any file

Method.name: FindClose
Method.Description:
FindClose releases memory allocated by FindFirst.
Description
FindClose terminates a FindFirst/FindNext sequence. FindClose does nothing in the 16-bit version of Windows, but is required in the 32-bit version, so for maximum portability every FindFirst/FindNext sequence should end with a call to FindClose.

Method.name: FindFirst
Method.Description:
FindFirst searches for the first instance of a file name with a given set of attributes in a specified directory.
Description
FindFirst searches the directory specified by Path for the first file that matches the file name implied by Path and the attributes specified by the Attr parameter. FindFirst returns list build $lb(Time:%Integer, ;Horolog Size:%Integer, ;in bytes Attr:%Integer, ;see file attributes Name:%String, ;filename ExcludeAttr:%Integer) ;ex Arrtibutes if a file was successfully located, otherwise, it returns a empty string ("").
The Path constant parameter is the directory and file name mask, including wildcard characters. For example, 'c:\test\*.*' specifies all files in the C:\TEST directory).
Note The FindFirst function allocates resources (memory) which must be released by calling FindClose.

Method.name: FindNext
Method.Description:
FindNext returns the next entry matching the name and attributes specified in a previous call to FindFirst.
Description
FindNext returns the next entry that matches the name and attributes specified in a previous call to FindFirst. The search record must be one that was passed to FindFirst. FindNext returns list build $lb(Time:%Integer, ;Horolog Size:%Integer, ;in bytes Attr:%Integer, ;see file attributes Name:%String, ;filename ExcludeAttr:%Integer) ;ex Arrtibutes if a file was successfully located, otherwise, it returns a empty string ("").
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("FindNext",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: Read
Method.Description: Reads up to Len bytes, returns as result and offset Position
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Read",$lb(Len)) q tmp

Method.name: RenameFile
Method.Description:
RenameFile changes a file name identified by OldName.
Description
The RenameFile function attempts to change the name of the file specified by OldFile to NewFile. If the operation succeeds, RenameFile returns "True". If it cannot rename the file (for example, if a file called NewName already exists), it returns "False".

Method.Description: Writes up to $L(Str) into file, returns wrote length and offsets current position.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Write",$lb(Str)) q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMFont
Class.Description: This class represents a windows font.

Property.name: Charset
Property.Description: Determines the character set of the font, if specified font face contains several charsets. The list of predefined constants for the standard charsets can be found in the %Const.INC.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Determines the text color. The list of predefined colors can be found in the %Const.INC.

Property.name: Height
Property.Description:
Specifies the font height (in pixels). The negative value means that the top internal leading is not included.
To calculate font height from it's size in points, use the following formula:
Height = -Size*PixelsPerInch/72

Property.name: Name
Property.Description: Determines the font face.

Property.name: Pitch
Property.Description:
Defines, will the characters have fixed or variable (proportional) width. Possible values:
"fpDefault" - default value, depending on the given font face. "fpFixed" - make all characters to have the same width. "fpVariable" - lets the characters to have different widths.

Property.name: Size
Property.Description:
Specifies the font size (in points). Negative value means that the top internal leading is included.
To calculate font size from it's height in pixels, use the following formula:
Size = -Height*72/PixelsPerInch

Property.name: Style
Property.Description: Specifies the font style. Should be a Cache' list where only required from the following values are combined: "fsBold", "fsItalic", "fsUnderline", "fsStrikeout". Set this property to $LB() to obtain the regular style.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text accociated with this font.

Method.name: CharsetGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Charset") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Color") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Name") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Pitch") q tmp

Method.name: SizeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Size") q tmp

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMFontDialog
Class.Description: This class enables font selecting modal dialog. The Execute method activates dialog, after the dialog completed, the Font property contains selected font.

Property.name: Ctl3D
Property.Description: Determines, should the control look three-dimensional (if set to "True") or flat (if set to "False").

Property.name: Device
Property.Description:
Specifies output device to generate list of available fonts. Possible values:
"fdScreen" - the screen;
"fdPrinter" - the printer;
"fdBoth"- both.

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMFont object selected in the dialog box or determines default font when dialog box opens.

Property.name: HelpContext
Property.Description: Contains the context ID of the help system screen related to this dialog.

Property.name: MaxFontSize
Property.Description: Specifies the maximal font size (in points) allowed in the dialog, if the 'Option' property contains "fdLimitSize".

Property.name: MinFontSize
Property.Description: Specifies the minimal font size (in points) allowed in the dialog, if the 'Option' property contains "fdLimitSize".

Property.name: OnApply
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when Apply button is clicked.

Property.name: OnClose
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the dialog is about to be closed.

Property.name: OnShow
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the dialog box is shown as a result of the 'Execute' method.

Property.name: Options
Property.Description:
Determines the diaolg options. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb) where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"fdAnsiOnly" - show fonts with the Windows character set only;
"fdApplyButton" - 'Apply' button is visible;
"fdEffects" - the 'Strikeout' and 'Underline' check boxes and the 'Color' listbox are visible;
"fdFixedPitchOnly" - show fixed-pitch fonts only;
"fdForceFontExist" - forbid the user to enter fonts absent in the 'Font' combobox;
"fdLimitSize" - limit the range of font sizes by values of the 'MinFontSize' and 'MaxFontSize' properties;
"fdNoFaceSel" - no preselected font;
"fdNoOEMFonts" - show non-OEM fonts only;
"fdScalableOnly" - show scalable (not bitmap) fonts only;
"fdNoSimulations" - show directly supported fonts and styles only;
"fdNoSizeSel" - no preselected font size;
"fdNoStyleSel" - no preselected font style;
"fdNoVectorFonts" - show non-vector fonts only;
"fdShowHelp" - 'Help' button is visible;
"fdTrueTypeOnly" - show TrueType fonts only; "fdWysiwyg" - show the fonts, applicable for both the screen and the printer;
Default value: $lb("fdEffects").

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Device") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMForm
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of a screen form.

Property.name: Active
Property.Description: Indicates, does the form have the focus. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: ActiveControl
Property.Description: Contains oref of the active control in the form.

Property.name: AlphaBlend
Property.Description: AlphaBlend specifies that the form represents a layered window that allows a translucent color. Use AlphaBlendValue property to specify the degree of translucency.

Property.name: AlphaBlendValue
Property.Description: Represents the degree of translucency on a translucent form.

Property.name: AutoScroll
Property.Description: Determines, should the scrollbars appear automatically when it is necessary (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: BorderIcons
Property.Description:
Determines the appearance of the title bar. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb) containing only the necessary from the following strings:
"biSystemMenu" - include a control (system) menu.
"biMinimize" - include Minimize button.
"biMaximize" - include Maximize button.
"biHelp" - include question mark (for dialog boxes only).

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the appearance of the form border. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border (not resizeable).
"bsNone" - no border (not resizeable).
"bsDialog" - usual dialog box border (not resizeable).
"bsSizeable" - usual resizeable border.
"bsToolWindow" - single-line border, smaller caption (not resizeable).
"bsSizeToolWin" - usual resizeable border, smaller caption.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas used in this form.

Property.name: DropTarget
Property.Description: Determines, is the form a target for drag-and-drop operations (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: FormStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the form style. Possible values:
"fsNormal" - default value.
"fsMDIChild" - MDI child form.
"fsMDIForm" - MDI parent form.
"fsStayOnTop" - remain on on top of the desktop and of other forms.

Property.name: HelpFile
Property.Description: Determines the name of help file.

Property.name: Icon
Property.Description: Determines the icon to be displayed when the form is minimized.

Property.name: MDIChildCount
Property.Description: Contains the number of running child forms (for MDI parent forms only).

Property.name: Menu
Property.Description: Contains oref of the form main menu (see %TMMainMenu description for details).

Property.name: ModalResult
Property.Description: The value which should be returned by the modal form after its close. By default, contains $$$mrNone. Changing this property to the non-zero value closes the form. The list of the possible values can be found in %Const.INC.

Property.name: OldCreateOrder
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: OnActivate
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the form receives focus.

Property.name: OnClose
Property.Description:
Handler of event occuring when the form is about to be closed. Programmer may set Action:
"caFree" - close form and destroy corresponding objects; Currently does not support. Please, use %TMTimer object to close form. We research how to solve this problem.
"caHide" - hide form preserving corresponding objects, form can be restored with 'Show' method;
"caNone" - do not close form.

Property.name: OnCloseQuery
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the form is about to be closed.

Property.name: OnCreate
Property.Description: Handler of the first event occuring when the form is created. For the visible forms, this event will be followed by the OnShow, OnActivate and OnPaint events.

Property.name: OnDeactivate
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the form loses focus.

Property.name: OnHelp
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the help is requested.

Property.name: OnHide
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the form becomes hidden as a result of setting the Visible property to "False".

Property.name: OnPaint
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the form should be redrawn, i.e., before any control in the form is painted.

Property.name: OnShortCut
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the accelerator key is pressed.

Property.name: OnShow
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the form is shown as a result of setting the Visible property to "True".

Property.name: PixelsPerInch
Property.Description: Determines, how is the form scaled to the current screen resolution. Has effect only if the Scaled property is set to "True".

Property.name: Position
Property.Description:
Determines the form position and size. Possible values:
"poDesigned" - the same position and size as defined at design time.
"poDefault" - position and size determined by Windows.
"poDefaultPosOnly" - the size as defined at design time, the position is determined by Windows.
"poDefaultSizeOnly" - the position as defined at design time, the size is determined by Windows.
"poScreenCenter" - the position is in the centre of the screen, the size as defined at design time, with ajustments for multi-monitor systems.
"poDesktopCenter" - the position is in the centre of the screen, the size as defined at design time.

Property.name: PrintScale
Property.Description:
Determines the scaling of the printed form. Possible values:
"poNone" - no scaling.
"poProportional" - the printed form should have approximately the same size, as onscreen form.
"poPrintToFit" - the printed form has the same proportions as onscreen form, but is resized to fit the printed page.

Property.name: Scaled
Property.Description: Determines, should the form be resized if the PixelPerInch property differs from the actual screen resolution (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: TileMode
Property.Description:
Determines the manner of MDI forms arrangement for the Tile method. Possible values:
"tbHorizontal" - stretch forms to fit the width of the parent form.
"tbVertical" - stretch forms to fit the height of the parent form.

Property.name: TransparentColor
Property.Description: Specifies whether a color on the form appears transparent.

Property.name: TransparentColorValue
Property.Description: Specifies the color on the form that appears transparent when TransparentColor is true.

Property.name: WindowMenu
Property.Description: Contains oref of the Window menu (for MDI parent forms). See %TMMenuItem description for details.

Property.name: WindowState
Property.Description:
Determines the current form state. Possible values:
"wsNormal" - normal state (neither minimized, nor maximized).
"wsMinimized" - minimized state.
"wsMaximized" - maximized state.

Class.name: %Library.TMGanttSeries
Class.Description: Represents chart data as a set of connected horizontal bars (useful for workflow diagrams, etc.).

Property.name: ConnectingPen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object describing properties of line drawn between bars.

Property.name: Dark3D
Property.Description: If set to "True", the bars edges will look like shadowed.

Property.name: EndValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with ending horizontal values of bars.

Property.name: NextTask
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with information allowing to determine index of bar connected to the current bar.

Property.name: StartValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with starting horizontal values of bars.

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPointSeries") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPointSeries") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPointSeries)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: AddGantt
Method.Description: Adds new bar with specified starting and ending horizontal values, vertical value and label to the series. Returns index of added gantt.

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPointSeries") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPointSeries") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMPointSeries)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..ConnectingPen.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..ConnectingPen,""ConnectingPen"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..EndValues.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..EndValues,""EndValues"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..NextTask.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..NextTask,""NextTask"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..StartValues.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..StartValues,""StartValues"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMGaugeAttrs
Class.Description: This class allows to customize the appearance of a %TMProgressBar object.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Specifis the color for filled part of a progressmeter (in hexadecimal RGB format).

Property.name: Position
Property.Description: Specifies the current position (in percents) for the "gsPercent" style. Possible values are numeric from 0 to 100.

Property.name: Speed
Property.Description: Specifies the speed of bouncing image for the "gsIndeterminate" style.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines the progressmeter style. Possible values:
"gsPercent" - regular progressmeter;
"gsIndeterminate" - used when min/max values are unknown, looks like bouncing ball;
"gsIndeterminate2" - used when min/max values are unknown, looks like bouncing gradient image;

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this object.

Property.name: TextColor
Property.Description: Specifies color (in hexadecimal RGB format) of a text in the filled area (for "gsPercent" style).

Method.name: ColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Color") q tmp

Method.name: PositionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Position") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Speed") q tmp

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Method.name: TextColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TextColor") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMGraphic
Class.Description: The base class for icons and bitmaps, contains methods for displaying the graphic images.

Property.name: Empty
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the graphics object contains a graphic, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: Height
Property.Description: Indicates the vertical size (in pixels) of the graphic object.

Property.name: Modified
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the graphics object was changed or edited, othewise - "False".

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a graphic object changes.

Property.name: OnProgress
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring during some slow processes changing the graphic object.

Property.name: Palette
Property.Description: Contains the color palette of the graphic object, or 0 if the object needs no palette.

Property.name: PaletteModified
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the palette was changed, otherwise - "False". Used in the OnChange handler.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this graphic object.

Property.name: Transparent
Property.Description: Determines, should the graphic object be drawn transparently (if set to "True" or the object is an icon) or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Width
Property.Description: Indicates the maximum horizontal size (in pixels) of the graphic object.

Method.Description: Reads the graphic object from the file specified in the FileName parameter.

Method.Description: Writes the graphic object to the file specified by the FileName parameter.

Class.name: %Library.TMGridColumn
Class.Description: Represents a single column in a %TMGridColumns collection.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Determines alignment of the caption text of this column. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify" or "taCenter".

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Determines the text string to be displayed in the column caption (topmost fixed cell).

Property.name: ColumnType
Property.Description: Specifies the type of data in the column. Possible values: "ctString", "ctInteger", "ctDouble" or "ctDate".

Property.name: State
Property.Description: Specifies the column state. Possible values: "csRead", "csWrite".

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should this column be displayed (if set to "True") or hidden (if set to "False").

Property.name: Width
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of this column.

Class.Description: Represents a server-side image of a Windows group box, embedding related controls on a form.

Class.name: %Library.TMIconOptions
Class.Description: Determines the icons arrangement in a %TMListView object. Should be owned by the corresponding %TMListView object.

Property.name: Arrangement
Property.Description:
Determines the direction for icons arrangements. Possible values:
"iaTop" - from left to right in rows from top to bottom;
"iaLeft" - from top to bottom in columns from left to right.

Property.name: AutoArrange
Property.Description: Determines, should the icons be rearranged automatically when changes are made (if set to "True"), or only after the Arrange method call (if set to "False").

Property.name: WrapText
Property.Description: Determines, can icons captions be wrapped (if set to "True") or should be displayed in single line (if set to "False").

Method.name: ArrangementGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Arrangement") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("WrapText") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMImage
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of control for displaying bitmaps, icons, metafiles, etc.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Read only. Contains oref on %TMCanvas object which may be used for the bitmap modifications.

Property.name: Center
Property.Description: Determines, should the image be centered (if set to "True") or it should be positioned at upper left corner of the control (if set to "False").

Property.name: IncrementalDisplay
Property.Description: Determines, should large compressed images be drawn through a sequence of approximations (if set to "True") or displayed only when loading and calculations finished (if set to "False").

Property.name: OnProgress
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a next image approximation (see description of the 'Incremental display' property) is drawn.

Property.name: Picture
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBitMap object containing bitmap image displayed in this control.

Property.name: Stretch
Property.Description: Determines, should the image be stretched to fit the control size (if set to "True"), or it should be unchanged (if set to "False").

Property.name: Transparent
Property.Description: Determines, should the bitmap background be transparent (if set to "True") or opaque (if set to "False").

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMControl)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.Canvas.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.Canvas=##class(%TMCanvas).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""Canvas""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.Picture.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.Picture=##class(%TMBitmap).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""Picture""))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Center") q tmp

Method.name: LoadFromStream
Method.Description:
Reads image in specified format from Cache stream specified by its oref. Image must be byte-to-byte compatible with appropriate file storage. Possible values of the 'FMT' parameter:
"BMP" - for Windows Bitmap (not OS/2 !);
"ICO" - for Windows icon library, used first image from one;
"WMF" - for Windows metafile;
"EMF" - for enhanced Windows metafile;
"GIF" - for Compuserve graphic interchange format;
"JPG", "JPEG" - for JPEG Image group format.

Method.name: OnProgressSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnProgress=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnProgress",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Proportional") q tmp

Method.name: SaveToStream
Method.Description: Saves image into specified Cache stream

Method.name: StretchGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Stretch") q tmp

Method.name: TransparentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Transparent") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMImageList
Class.Description: Represents the indexed collection of icons or bitmaps with the same size.

Property.name: AllocBy
Property.Description: Represents the maximum number of items can be stored in the image list object.

Property.name: Bitmap
Property.Description: Comma delimited list of BLOB names of the images included into this image list. For internal use.

Property.name: BkColor
Property.Description: Determines the background color used for masked regions of the image. If set to $$$clNone, the image will be drawn transparently.

Property.name: BlendColor
Property.Description: Determines the color used for highlighting the images if the DrawingStyle property is set to "dsFocus" or "dsSelected". $$$clDefault means the default system highlighting.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: Represents the number of images contained in the image list.

Property.name: DragCursor
Property.Description: Determines the drag cursor associated with this image list.

Property.name: Dragging
Property.Description: Contains "True" when an image in this image list is being dragged, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: DrawingStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the appearance of images. Possible values:
"dsFocused" - blend 25% with the value of the BlendColor property (only if masking is switched on).
"dsSelected" - blend 50% with the value of the BlendColor property (only if masking is switched on).
"dsNormal" - use the value of the BkColor property (draw transparently if this value is $$$clNone).
"dsTransparent" - draw transparently, ignore the BkColor value.

Property.name: Height
Property.Description: Determines the height of images (in pixels) to be added to the image list. Change of this value cleares the image list.

Property.name: ImageType
Property.Description: Determines, should the image itself to be drawn (if set to "itImage") or its mask (if set to "itMask").

Property.name: Masked
Property.Description: Determines, does the image list include both images and masks (if set to "True") or images only (if set to "False").

Property.name: ShareImages
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: StreamBitmap
Property.Description: OREF of stream which contains ImageList pictures

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this image list.

Property.name: Width
Property.Description: Determines the width of images (in pixels) to be added to the image list. Change of this value cleares the image list.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds a bitmap Image and its Mask to the image list, returns the index of the added item or -1, if adding failed. If the Masked property is set to "False", the Mask parameter is not used.

Method.name: AddIcon
Method.Description: Adds the specified icon to the image list, returns the index of the added item or -1, if adding failed.

Method.name: AddImages
Method.Description: Adds all images contained in specified image list to the current image list.

Method.name: AddMasked
Method.Description: Adds a bitmap Image and its mask generated using the MaskColor parameter to the image list. Returns the 0 if the image added successfully or -1 if adding failed.

Method.name: AllocByGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AllocBy") q tmp

Method.name: BitmapGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Bitmap") q tmp

Method.name: BitmapSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) s %ZoMRi(2153)="" d ##this.SetProperty("Bitmap",Value) s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait q $$$OK

Method.name: BkColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BkColor") q tmp

Method.name: BlendColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BlendColor") q tmp

Method.name: Clear
Method.Description: Cleares the image list, deleting all images from it.

Method.name: CountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Count") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Deletes image specified by its index from the image list.

Method.name: DragCursorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DragCursor") q tmp

Method.name: DraggingGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Dragging") q tmp

Method.name: Draw
Method.Description: Draws the image specified by the Index parameter to the place specified by the X and Y parameters of the specified Canvas. If the Enabled parameter is "False", the image will be grayed.

Method.name: DrawOverlay
Method.Description: Draws specified image and overlay mask to the specified place of specified Canvas.

Method.name: DrawingStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DrawingStyle") q tmp

Method.name: GetBitmap
Method.Description: Retrieves the image specified by its Index into the %TMBitMap object specified by its oref.

Method.name: GetIcon
Method.Description: Retrieves the image specified by its Index into the %TMIcon object specified by its oref.

Method.name: HeightGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Height") q tmp

Method.name: ImageTypeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ImageType") q tmp

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Inserts the bitmap Image and its Mask to the image list after the image specified by Index.

Method.name: InsertIcon
Method.Description: Inserts the icon specified by the Image parameter to the image list after the image specified by Index.

Method.name: InsertMasked
Method.Description: Inserts the bitmap Image to the image list after the image specified by Index and generates the mask using the specified MaskColor.

Method.name: MaskedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Masked") q tmp

Method.name: Move
Method.Description: Changes the position of the specified image.

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: Overlay
Method.Description: Adds the image specified by ImageIndex to the list of images, which can be used as overlay masks. Possible values of the Overlay index are integers from 0 to 3. Returns "True" if successful, "False" if failed.

Method.name: Replace
Method.Description: Inserts the bitmap Image and its Mask to the image list instead of the image specified by Index.

Method.name: ReplaceIcon
Method.Description: Inserts the specified by the Image parameter to the image list instead of the image specified by Index.

Method.name: ReplaceMasked
Method.Description: Inserts the bitmap Image to the image list instead of the image specified by Index and generates the mask using the specified MaskColor.

Method.name: ShareImagesGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShareImages") q tmp

Method.name: StreamBitmapGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("StreamBitmap") q tmp

Method.name: StreamBitmapSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) s %ZoMRi(2153)="" d ##this.SetProperty("StreamBitmap",Value) s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Width") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMLabel
Class.Description: This class represents a window control displaying text on a form.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Detemines horizontal text alignment inside the rectangle aimed for this control. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify", "taCenter".

Property.name: FocusControl
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMWinControl object which will get focus when accelerator key is pressed. Works only if 'ShowAccelChar' property set to "True".

Property.name: Layout
Property.Description: Detemines vertical text alignment inside the rectangle aimed for this control. Possible values: "tlTop", "tlBottom", "tlCenter".

Property.name: ShowAccelChar
Property.Description: Determines, does the ampersand mark the accelerator key (if set to "True", default value), or it should be displayed as ampersand (if set to "False").

Property.name: Transparent
Property.Description: Determines, will the label allow to see controls situated below it (if set to "True").

Property.name: WordWrap
Property.Description: Determines, should the too long text be wrapped and displayed in several lines (if set to "True") or truncated and displayed in single line (if set to "False").

Method.name: AlignmentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Alignment") q tmp

Method.name: FocusControlGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FocusControl") q tmp

Method.name: FocusControlSet
Method.Implementation: i Value'="" d . d ##this.SetProperty("FocusControl",Value.Address) e d . d ##this.SetProperty("FocusControl",Value) q $$$OK

Method.name: LayoutGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Layout") q tmp

Method.name: ShowAccelCharGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShowAccelChar") q tmp

Method.name: TransparentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Transparent") q tmp

Method.name: WordWrapGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("WordWrap") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMLineSeries
Class.Description: Represents chart data as a line connecting chart points. Differs from %TMLineSeries by full set of %TMCustomSeries properties but lower performance.

Class.name: %Library.TMListBox
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of a standard Windows control showing the list of items that can be selected, scrolled, added or deleted.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description: If set to "bsSingle", the list view will have a single-line border. "bsNone" means no border.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas which may be used for drawing on the listbox control from the OnDrawItem events handler.

Property.name: Columns
Property.Description: For multicolumn listboxes, represents the number of columns visible without scrolling.

Property.name: ExtendedSelect
Property.Description: If this property and MultiSelect are both set to "True", a range of items can be selected using 'Shift' key, and a set of separate items can be selected using 'Ctrl' key, otherwise not.

Property.name: IntegralHeight
Property.Description: If this property is set to "True" and the listbox style is "lsOwnerDrawFixed", only integer number of items can be visible, otherwise, some items can be shown partially.

Property.name: ItemHeight
Property.Description: Specifies the height of the listbox items (in pixels). Has sense only for "lsOwnerDrawFixed" and "lsOwnerDrawVariable" values of the Style property. Can be overriden by the value set in OnMeasureItem event handler.

Property.name: ItemIndex
Property.Description: Represents the number of the selected listbox item (numbering starts from 0). Equals to -1 if no items selected.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: Collection of the listbox items. Use %TMString methods (Add, Insert, Move, Delete, IndexOf) to operate with separate items.

Property.name: MultiSelect
Property.Description: If set to "True", multiple items in the listbox can be selected. Otherwise, only one item can be selected in a time, the next selection cancels the previous one.

Property.name: OnDrawItem
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when an item in an owner-draw listbox is to be displayed. Handler may use %TMCanvas methods to add graphic elements to the item or to replace the item text by an image.

Property.name: OnMeasureItem
Property.Description: Contains handler for event occuring when an item in a owner-draw-variable listbox is to be redisplayed. The handler should specify the height (in pixels), necessary to draw an item.

Property.name: Query
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMQuery object used in the ExecuteQuery method. See %TMQuery description for details.

Property.name: SelCount
Property.Description: Read only, contains the number of selected items if multiselect is allowed.

Property.name: Sorted
Property.Description: Determines, should the listbox items be sorted in alphabetic order (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines the style of the listbox. The possible values: "lbStandard" - all items have the same height.
"lbOwnerDrawFixed" - owner-draw listbox, with the OnDrawItem event occuring when an item is to be drawn; all items height is determined by the ItemHeight property.
"lbOwnerDrawVariable" - owner-draw listbox, with the OnDrawItem and OnMeasureItem events occuring when an item is to be drawn; items can have different heights.

Property.name: TabWidth
Property.Description: Determines the tabs size for this listbox. If set to 0, the default Windows setting is used.

Property.name: TopIndex
Property.Description: Represents the index of the topmost visible item in the listbox.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: ExecuteQuery
Method.Description: Executes query and loads information in listbox. Query class, name and other information must be stored in Query property.
Method.Implementation: n query,params,i s query=##class(%ResultSet).%New(..Query.QueryClass_"."_..Query.QueryName) q:query=$$$NULLOREF $$$ERROR("Invalid query name") d ..Items.Clear() s params="" f i=1:1:16 d:$d(@("p"_i)) . i params="" s params="p"_i . e s params=params_",p"_i x "d query.Execute("_params_")" f q:'query.Next() d . d:..Query.IdField'="" ..Items.AddObject(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",")),query.GetDataByName(..Query.IdField)) . d:..Query.IdField="" ..Items.Add(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,","))) q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ExtendedSelect") q tmp
