Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Canvas.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Canvas,""Canvas"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Items.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Items,""Items"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: GetSelected
Method.Description: Returns "True" if the item with specified Index is selected, otherwise - "False".

Method.name: IntegralHeightGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("IntegralHeight") q tmp

Method.name: ItemAtPos
Method.Description: Returns the index of the listbox item at the specified position of the control. The Pos parameter should contain $lb(X,Y), the Existing parameter determines, will the method return -1 (if set to "True") or last item index+1 (if set to "False") when no item found at the specified position.

Method.name: ItemHeightGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ItemHeight") q tmp

Method.name: ItemIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ItemIndex") q tmp

Method.name: ItemRect
Method.Description: Returns the coordinates ($lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) of the item specified by the Item parameter.

Method.name: MultiSelectGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("MultiSelect") q tmp

Method.name: OnDrawItemSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDrawItem=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDrawItem",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnMeasureItemSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnMeasureItem=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnMeasureItem",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: SelCountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SelCount") q tmp

Method.name: SetSelected
Method.Description: Selects (if Value is "True") or deselects (if Value is "False") the item specified by the Index.

Method.name: SortedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Sorted") q tmp

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Method.name: TabWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TabWidth") q tmp

Method.name: TopIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TopIndex") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMListColumn
Class.Description: Represents a column of the list view with the ViewStyle property equal to "vsReport". Provides methods and properties necessary to control a column appearance.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Determines the text alignment in the list column. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify" or "taCenter".

Property.name: AutoSize
Property.Description: If set to "True", the column will be resized automatically accoring to the text width.

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Determines the column caption.

Property.name: MaxWidth
Property.Description: Determines the maximum column width (in pixels).

Property.name: MinWidth
Property.Description: Determines the minimum column width (in pixels).

Property.name: Width
Property.Description: Determines the current column width (in pixels). If set to -1, the column width is determined by the width of the text, if set to -2, the column width corresponds to the caption width.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" s %SMWOrefs(+##this)=##this") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: AlignmentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Alignment") q tmp

Method.name: AutoSizeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AutoSize") q tmp

Method.name: CaptionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Caption") q tmp

Method.name: ImageIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ImageIndex") q tmp

Method.name: MaxWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("MaxWidth") q tmp

Method.name: MinWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("MinWidth") q tmp

Method.name: WidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Width") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMListColumns
Class.Description: Represents a column collection of the list view with the ViewStyle property equal to "vsReport". Provides methods and properties necessary to manupulating with columns.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: Read only, contains the number of columns in the collection.

Property.name: Owner
Property.Description: Read only, contains oref of %TMListView object that is owner of this collection.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds a new column to the collection, returns oref of created column of empty string if creation of the new %TMListColumns instance failed. To delete column just close the %TMListColumn object.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) s %ZoMRi(2153)="" s tmp=##class(%TMPersistent).GetObjOref(##this.RunMethod("Add",$lb())) s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait q tmp

Method.name: CountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Count") q tmp

Method.name: GetItems
Method.Description: Returns oref of the column specified by the Index parameter, of empty string if the column with this index is absent. Possible values of Index: integers from 0 to Count-1.

Class.name: %Library.TMListItem
Class.Description: Represents an item of a list view, its state, data and associated images.

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Specifies the item label.

Property.name: Checked
Property.Description: Represents the state of the associated checkbox, if the CheckBoxes property of the list view is set to "True". Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: Cut
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the item is marked for 'Cut' operation, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: Data
Property.Description: Contains the data associated with the item.

Property.name: DropTarget
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the item is marked as a drag-and-drop target, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: Focused
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the item has a focus, otherwise - "False". If the application sets this property to "True" for one item, it must enable this property to be "False" for all other items in the list view.

Property.name: ImageIndex
Property.Description: Determines the index of the image associated with this item in the list view LargeImages and SmallImages property.

Property.name: Indent
Property.Description: Determines the horizontal shift of the item in the list view.

Property.name: Index
Property.Description: Determines the index of the item in the %TMListItems collection.

Property.name: ListView
Property.Description: Contains oref of the list view containing this item.

Property.name: OverlayIndex
Property.Description: Determines the index of the overlay image associated with this item in the list view StateImages property.

Property.name: Owner
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMListItems object containing this item.

Property.name: Position
Property.Description: Contains Cache' list $lb(X,Y) determiming the coordinates of the upper left corner of the item in the list viiew.

Property.name: Selected
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the item is selected, otherwise - "False". Setting the Selected property of one item to "True" automatically sets this property of all other items in the listview to "False".

Property.name: StateIndex
Property.Description: Determines the index of the image associated with this item in the list view StateImages property.

Property.name: SubItems
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMStrings object containing data to be displayed in cells for this items, if the list view ViewStyle property equals to "vsReport".

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" s %SMWOrefs(+##this)=##this") $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") $$$GENERATE(" n func,addr,strings,cliret,parent") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 $$$GENERATE(" s func=$lg(initvalue,3),parent=$lg(initvalue,1,0)") e $$$GENERATE(" s func=$lg(initvalue,3),parent=##class(%TMPersistent).GetObjOref(+$lg(initvalue,1,0))") $$$GENERATE(" d:(func'="""")&(+parent)") $$$GENERATE(" . s cliret=$$CallBack^%ZMRASD($lb(""rm"",parent.Address,func,$lb(+##this)_$li(initvalue,4,8)))") $$$GENERATE(" . s $li(initvalue,2)=$li(cliret,1),strings=$li(cliret,2)") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ..SubItems.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s:func="""" strings=..GetProperty(""SubItems"")") $$$GENERATE(" s ..SubItems=##class(%TMStrings).%New($lb(..Address,strings))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: CancelEdit
Method.Description: Terminates editing the item caption and cancels all changes.

Method.name: CaptionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Caption") q tmp

Method.name: CheckedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Checked") q tmp

Method.name: CutGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Cut") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Removes the item from the list view.

Method.name: DisplayRect
Method.Description:
Returns the coordinates of the rectangle ($lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) confining the item. The value of the Code parameter determines, what part of the item the rectangle confines. Possible values:
"drBounds" - the item icon, label and cells of report view.
"drIcon" - the item icon.
"drLabel" - the item label.
"drSelectBounds" - the icon and label, without cells of report view.

Method.name: EditCaption
Method.Description: Selects the item, deselects all another items, moves focus to this item and puts it to edit mode.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("EditCaption",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: FocusedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Focused") q tmp

Method.name: GetPosition
Method.Description: Returns the coordinates of the upper left corner of the item as Cache' list $lb(X,Y).
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("GetPosition",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: ImageIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ImageIndex") q tmp

Method.name: IndentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Indent") q tmp

Method.name: IndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Index") q tmp

Method.name: MakeVisible
Method.Description: Scrolls the list view, if it is necessary to make the item visible. If the PartialOK parameter is "True", no actions are performed if the item is partially visible.

Method.name: OverlayIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("OverlayIndex") q tmp

Method.name: PositionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Position") q tmp

Method.name: SelectedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Selected") q tmp

Method.name: SetPosition
Method.Description: Moves the item to the position spectfied by the Value parameter. The Value should be Cache' list $lb(X,Y), where X and Y are desired coordinates of the item upper left corner. Has sense only if the value of ViewStyle property equals to "vsIcon" or "vsSmallIcon".

Method.name: StateIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("StateIndex") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMListItems
Class.Description: Represents the collection of list items included into a list view as its Items property.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: Read only, contains the number of items in the collection.

Property.name: Owner
Property.Description: Read only, contains oref of the %TMListView object that is owner of this collection.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds a new item to the collection, returns its oref or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMListItem failed.
Method.Implementation: n tmp ; s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Add",$lb()) s tmp=##class(%TMListItem).%New($lb(+##this,0,"FastAdd")) q tmp

Method.name: AddItem
Method.Description: Adds a new item to the collection and initializes its Caption, ImageIndex, Data and SubItems (as $lb(SubItem1,...SubItemN)) properties. Returns its oref or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMListItem failed.
Method.Implementation: n tmp ; s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AddItem",$lb(Caption,ImageIndex,Data,SubItems)) s tmp=##class(%TMListItem).%New($lb(+##this,0,"FastAddItem",Caption,ImageIndex,Data,SubItems)) q tmp

Method.name: BeginUpdate
Method.Description: Postpones repainting the item until the EndUpdate method call.

Method.name: Clear
Method.Description: Deletes all items from the collection.

Method.name: CountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Count") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Removes the item specified by the Index parameter from the collection and updates the list view, if necessary.

Method.name: EndUpdate
Method.Description: Allows the changes postponed after the BeginUpdate method call to be reflected on the screen.

Method.name: GetItems
Method.Description: Returns oref of the item specified by the Index parameter, or empty string if there is no such item. Possible values of Index: integers from 0 to Count-1.

Method.name: IndexOf
Method.Description: Returns the index of the item specified by its oref, or -1 if there is no such item.

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Inserts a new item to the collection after the item with specified Index. Returns oref of the new item or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMListItem failed.
Method.Implementation: n tmp ; s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Insert",$lb(Index)) s tmp=##class(%TMListItem).%New($lb(+##this,0,"FastInsert","","","","",Index)) q tmp

Method.name: InsertItem
Method.Description: Adds a new item to the collection after the item with specified Index and initializes its Caption, ImageIndex, Data and SubItems (as $lb(SubItem1,...SubItemN)) properties. Returns oref of new item or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMListItem failed.
Method.Implementation: n tmp ; s tmp=##this.RunMethod("InsertItem",$lb(Index,Caption,ImageIndex,Data,SubItems)) s tmp=##class(%TMListItem).%New($lb(+##this,0,"FastInsertItem",Caption,ImageIndex,Data,SubItems,Index)) q tmp

Method.name: OwnerGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Owner") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMListView
Class.Description: Provides methods and properties necessary for displaying lists of items in various manners.

Property.name: AllocBy
Property.Description: Represents the maximum number of items can be stored in the list view object.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description: If set to "bsSingle", the list view will have a single-line border. "bsNone" means no border.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas which may be used for drawing on the list view control from the OnCustomDraw and OnCustomDrawItem events handlers.

Property.name: Checkboxes
Property.Description: Determines, should check boxes be placed near every item in the list view (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: ColumnClick
Property.Description: Determines, should the OnColumnClick event occur when a column caption is clicked (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Columns
Property.Description: Contains oref of the columns collection associated with this list view.

Property.name: DropTarget
Property.Description: Contains oref of the list item which is a target for drag-and-drop operations.

Property.name: FlatScrollBars
Property.Description: Determines, should scrollbars be flat (if set to "True") or 3D (if set to "False").

Property.name: FullDrag
Property.Description: Determines, should headers be repainted when dragged (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: GridLines
Property.Description: Determines, should lines separated items in the list be drawn (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False"). The value of the ViewStyle property equal to "vsList" or "vsReport" overrides this property value.

Property.name: HideSelection
Property.Description: Determines, does selected item remain marked as selected when the control loses focus (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: HotTrack
Property.Description: Determines, should the items be highlighted when mouse cursor moves over them (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: HotTrackStyles
Property.Description:
Contains Cache' list where only actual from the following hottracking styles are combined:
"htHandPoint" - turn the mouse cursor into a hand image.
"htUnderlineCold" - underline all untracked items.
"htUnderlineHot" - underline the tracked item.

Property.name: IconOptions
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMIconOptions object specifying the icons arrangement in this control.

Property.name: ItemFocused
Property.Description: Contains oref of the list item having focus or empty string if no item has focus.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: Contains oref of the items collection associated with this list view.

Property.name: LargeImages
Property.Description: Contains oref of the image list with bitmaps to be displayed near every item in the list view if the value of the ViewStyle property is "vsIcon". Items and images are associated by the values of the ImageIndex properties of items.

Property.name: MultiSelect
Property.Description: Determines, can more than one item be selected simultaneously (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when any item in the listview has been changed.

Property.name: OnChanging
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when any item in the listview is being changed.

Property.name: OnColumnClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when any column caption is clicked and the ColumnClick property is set to "True".

Property.name: OnCompare
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the AlphaSort method compares two items.

Property.name: OnCustomDraw
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before the list view items are to be painted.

Property.name: OnCustomDrawItem
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before an item is to be painted, giving opportunity to draw something on the list view canvas.

Property.name: OnData
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before an item is to be displayed, giving the opportunity to customize this item.

Property.name: OnDataFind
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a search request is received from the FindCaption method.

Property.name: OnDataHint
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the contents of the list view is changed or the list view is scrolled, giving opportunity to update all items to be repainted in one method call.

Property.name: OnDeletion
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when an item is about to be removed from the list view.

Property.name: OnDrawItem
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when an item should be drawn, giving opportunity to draw this item manually.

Property.name: OnEdited
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the caption of an item has been edited.

Property.name: OnEditing
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the caption of an item is being edited.

Property.name: OnGetImageIndex
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before an item is to be displayed, giving the opportunity to assign ImageIndex to this item. The ImageIndex will be used to associate images and items.

Property.name: OnSelectItem
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when an item has been selected.

Property.name: OwnerData
Property.Description: If contains "True", the list view is virtual. A virtual list view can have up to 2**32 items, but contains only focus and selection information.

Property.name: OwnerDraw
Property.Description: If set to "True", the OnCustomDraw and OnCustomDrawItem handlers can override default items painting.

Property.name: Query
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMQuery object used in the ExecuteQuery method. See %TMQuery description for details.

Property.name: ReadOnly
Property.Description: Determines, can the list view contents be edited by user (if set to "False") or not (if set to "True").

Property.name: RowSelect
Property.Description: Determines, can the entire row be selected (if set to "True") or the first cell only (if set to "False"). Has sense if the value of the ViewStyle property is "vsReport".

Property.name: SelCount
Property.Description: Indicates the number of selected items.

Property.name: Selected
Property.Description: Contains oref of the first selected item, or empty string if no item is selected.

Property.name: ShowColumnHeaders
Property.Description: Determines, should the column headers be shown (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: ShowHint
Property.Description: Determines, should the hint be shown when the mouse cursor stops for a short time on the control (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: SmallImages
Property.Description: Contains oref of the image list with bitmaps to be displayed near every item in the list view if the value of the ViewStyle property is other than "vsIcon". Items and images are associated by the values of the ImageIndex properties of items.

Property.name: SortType
Property.Description:
Detemines the sorting mode for the AlphaSort method. Possible values:
"stNone" - no sorting.
"stData" - sort in accordance with the values of items Data property (only if OnCompare handler is assigned).
"stText" - sort in accordance with the items captions.
"stBoth" - combines two previous modes.

Property.name: StateImages
Property.Description: Contains oref of the additional image list with bitmaps to be displayed near every item in the list view. Items and images are associated by the values of the StateIndex properties of items.

Property.name: TopItem
Property.Description: Determines the topmost visible item of the list view (only if the ViewStyle property contains "vsReport" or "vsList").

Property.name: ViewOrigin
Property.Description: Contains $lb(X,Y), where X is the number of pixels the view is scrolled in horizontal direction, and Y - in vertical one. (Only if the value of the ViewStyle property is "vsIcon" or "vsSmallIcon").

Property.name: ViewStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the list view appearance. Possible values:
"vsIcon" - items are represented by full-sized icons with labels below them.
"vsSmallIcon" - items are represented by small icons with labels below them.
"vsList" - items are represented by small icons with labels to right of them, arranged as a list.
"vsReport" - every item is represented as row consisting of cells, leftmost of them contains an icon with label.

Property.name: VisibleRowCount
Property.Description: Contains the maximum number of rows (for "vsList" anf "vsReport" ViewStyles) that can be placed in the visible area of the list view.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Canvas.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Canvas=##class(%TMCanvas).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Canvas""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Columns.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Columns=##class(%TMListColumns).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Columns""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..IconOptions.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..IconOptions=##class(%TMIconOptions).%New($lb(..Address,0,""IconOptions""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Items.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Items=##class(%TMListItems).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Items""))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: AllocByGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AllocBy") q tmp

Method.name: AlphaSort
Method.Description: Sorts the items in the list view according to the value of SortType property and OnCompare event handler. See descriptions of these properties for details. By default, sorting order is alphabetical ascending. Returns "True" if successful.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AlphaSort",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: Arrange
Method.Description: Arranges icons in a list view if the value of the ViewStyle property is "vslcon" or "vsSmallIcon", along the window edge or in nearest grid cells, as specified by the Code parameter. Possible values: "arAlignBottom", "arAlignLeft", "arAlignRight", "arAlignTop", "arDefault" or "arSnapToGrid".

Method.name: BorderStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BorderStyle") q tmp

Method.name: CheckboxesGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Checkboxes") q tmp

Method.name: ColumnClickGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ColumnClick") q tmp

Method.name: ExecuteQuery
Method.Description: Executes query and loads information into the list. Query class, name and other information must be stored in Query property.
Method.Implementation: n query,params,i,str s query=##class(%ResultSet).%New(..Query.QueryClass_"."_..Query.QueryName) q:query=$$$NULLOREF $$$ERROR("Invalid query name") d ..Items.BeginUpdate() d ..Items.Clear() s params="" f i=1:1:16 d . i $d(@("p"_i)) d . . i params="" s params="p"_i . . e s params=params_",p"_i x "d query.Execute("_params_")" f q:'query.Next() d . s str="" . f i=2:1:$l(..Query.QueryFields,",") d . . s str=str_$lb(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",",i))) . d:..Query.IdField'="" ..Items.AddItem(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",",1)),0,query.GetDataByName(..Query.IdField),str) . d:..Query.IdField="" ..Items.AddItem(query.GetDataByName($p(..Query.QueryFields,",",1)),0,0,str) d ..Items.EndUpdate() q $$$OK

Method.name: FindCaption
Method.Description: Returns oref of the list view item with the caption specified by the Value parameter, or empty string if required item does not exist. Search starts from the StartIndex value, if Inclusive is "True", or from the next index, if Inclusive is "False" and may continue from the first index if Wrap is "True". The value of the Partial equal to "True" means that the item caption should starts with the Value to match, othewise it should be equal to the Value.

Method.name: FlatScrollBarsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FlatScrollBars") q tmp

Method.name: FullDragGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FullDrag") q tmp

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Canvas.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Canvas,""Canvas"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Columns.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Columns,""Columns"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..IconOptions.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..IconOptions,""IconOptions"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Items.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Items,""Items"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: GetHitTestInfoAt
Method.Description:
Returns Cache' list ($lb) where only strings actual for the specified point are combined. Possible strings:
"htAbove" - to top from the control.
"htBelow" - to bottom the control.
"htNowhere" - not on any item, though inside the control.
"htOnItem" - on an item.
"htOnButton" - on a button.
"htOnIcon" - on an icon.
"htOnIndent" - on an indent.
"htOnLabel" - on a label.
"htOnRight" - on the right side.
"htOnStateIcon" - on a state icon.
"htToLeft" - to left from the control.
"htToRight" - to right from the control.

Method.name: GetItemAt
Method.Description: Returns oref of the list item at the position specified by X and Y parameters, or empty string if there is nothing at this location.

Method.name: GetNearestItem
Method.Description: Returns oref of the list item at the position specified by X and Y parameters, or of nearest item in spectified direction, or empty string if there are no items in this direction. Possible values of the Direction parameter: "sdLeft", "sdRight", "sdAbove", "sdBelow" or "sdAll".

Method.name: GetNextItem
Method.Description:
Returns oref of the next list item after the StartItem in the spectified direction, or empty string if there are no items in this direction. Possible values of the Direction parameter: "sdLeft", "sdRight", "sdAbove", "sdBelow" or "sdAll". Only items in the state matching the States parameter are considered. Possible value of the State parameter: Cache' list where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"isNone" - default state.
"isCut" - cut item.
"isDropHilited" - item highlighted as a drag-and-drop target.
"isFocused" - focused item.
"isSelected" - selected item.
"isActivating" - active item.

Method.name: GetSearchString
Method.Description: Returns the search string typed by the user when the focus is at the list view.

Class.name: %Library.TMLocator
Class.Description:
Represents invisible component enabling incremental search in a %TMButtonGrid. Appication should not call its methods and touch its properties directly. All necessary settings are made at design time. Just create Locator, ComboBox and single-line editor and specify the following properties for the Locator:
Grid: select the name of ButtonGrid where Locator must search information.
Edit: select the name of edit control where search substring will be typed.
Combobox: select the name of drop-down list to select a grid column where search will be performed.
All settings for the editor and combobox will be made automatically.
Note 1: the Grid property must be set first.
Note 2: the Alignment property of the ButtonGrid must be "alNone".

Property.name: ComboBox
Property.Description: Oref of the associated drop-down list, for internal use.

Property.name: Edit
Property.Description: Oref of the associated single-line editor, for internal use.

Property.name: Grid
Property.Description: Oref of the ButtonGrid, where this locator must search information, for internal use.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the locator's combobox changed.

Property.name: OnFixedCellClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the fixed cell of controlled ButtonGrid is clicked and the 'FixedButtons' property is set to "True".

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnFixedCellClickSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnFixedCellClick=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnFixedCellClick",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: UpdateLocator
Method.Description: Updates locator state. Should be used if locator's combobox item is selected programatically.

Class.Description: Represents a main menu bar with corresponding drop-down menus.

Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMImageList object with images for the menu items.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the menu is loaded into memory and when its structure is changed.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Class.name: %Library.TMMemo
Class.Description: This class represents the server-side image of a windows multi-line edit control.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Detemines horizontal text alignment inside the rectangle aimed for this control. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify", "taCenter".

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines, will the control have a border around the client area. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border
"bsNone" - no border.

Property.name: CanUndo
Property.Description: Indicates, are there changes saved in the Undo buffer. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: CaretPos
Property.Description: Determines the coordinates of the cursor (in pixels) relative to the client area.

Property.name: HideSelection
Property.Description: Determines, should the selected text be highlighted when the control is out of focus. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: Lines
Property.Description: Collection of the text lines in this control. Use %TMString methods (Add, Insert, Move, Delete, IndexOf, Count) to operate with separate items.

Property.name: MaxLength
Property.Description: Limits the length of string the user can input in the edit portion of the drop-down list. 0 means no limitation.

Property.name: Modified
Property.Description: Indicates, is the text modified by the user. Possible values: "True" or "False". The code altering the 'Lines' property should set the 'Modified' property to "True".

Property.name: OEMConvert
Property.Description:
Determines whether characters typed in the edit control are converted from ANSI to OEM and then back to ANSI.
Description
To ensure that any characters typed in the edit control can be unambiguously converted to the OEM character set, set OEMconvert to True. This causes all characters to be converted from ANSI to OEM and then back to ANSI as they are typed. Set OEMconvert to False to avoid the overhead of this conversion when it does not matter whether the text can be unambiguously mapped to an OEM string.
OEMConvert is most useful for edit controls used to enter file names when the application does not use Unicode file names.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the text is changed.

Property.name: ReadOnly
Property.Description: Determines, should the text be protected from being changed by user. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: ScrollBars
Property.Description:
Determines, can this control have scrollbars. Possible values:
"ssNone" - no scrollbars
"ssHorizontal" - a horizontal scrollbar on the bottom edge
"ssVertical" - a vertical scrollbar on the right edge
"ssBoth" - both horizontal and vertical scrollbars.

Property.name: SelLength
Property.Description: Represents the length of the selected text in the memo control.

Property.name: SelStart
Property.Description: Represents the number of first symbol of selected part of text in the memo control (numbering starts from 0). If no text is selected, represents the cursor position.

Property.name: SelText
Property.Description: Represents the selected text in the edit control. Change of this property replaces the selected text with new value, or inserts it at the cursor if no text is selected.

Property.name: WantReturns
Property.Description: Determines, should the Enter keystrokes insert CRLF characters into the text (if set to "True") or be handled by the form, allowing, however, user to insert CRLF typing Ctrl-Enter (if set to "False").

Property.name: WantTabs
Property.Description: Determines, should the Tab keystrokes insert tab characters into the text (if set to "True") or move the focus to the next control (if set to "False").

Property.name: WordWrap
Property.Description: Determines, should the too long text be wrapped and displayed in several lines (if set to "True") or displayed in single line with scrolling (if set to "False"). Affects only on the appearance rather than actual contents of the 'Lines' property.

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.Description: Removes all the text from the control.

Method.Description: Makes changes in the Lines property irreversible and sets the CanUndo property to "False".

Method.name: CopyToClipboard
Method.Description: Copies the selected text into Windows Clipboard. If no text is selected, ClipBoard remains unchanged.

Method.name: CutToClipboard
Method.Description: Copies the selected text into Windows Clipboard and then deletes it from the memo control. If no text is selected, ClipBoard remains unchanged.

Class.name: %Library.TMMenuItem
Class.Description: Represents an item of %TMMainMenu or %TMPopupMenu object.

Property.name: Break
Property.Description:
Determines, should the item break the menu into coumns or not, and how should the item do this. Possible values:
"mbNone" - the item does not break menu (default value).
"mbBarBreak" - the item starts a new menu column, separated from the old one by bar.
"mbBreak" - the item starts a new menu column, separated the old one by space.

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Determines the text of the menu item. The text characters marked by ampersand are considered as accelerators, i.e., the menu item can be selected by pressing Alt with marked character. If the value of this property is "-", the item serves as separator.

Property.name: Checked
Property.Description: Determines the state of the menu item as of a checkbox. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: Default
Property.Description: If set to "True", this menu item is called on the parent item double-click.

Property.name: Enabled
Property.Description: If set to "True" (default value), the menu item can be selected and the Click method is called on selection, otherwise the menu item is disabled.

Property.name: GroupIndex
Property.Description: Contains the integer identifier of the logical group containig this item.

Property.name: HelpContext
Property.Description: Contains the context ID of the help system screen related to this menu item.

Property.name: Hint
Property.Description: Contains the text string appearing when the mouse cursor moves over this item.

Property.name: ImageIndex
Property.Description: Determines the index of the image associated with this item in the main menu Images property.

Property.name: MenuIndex
Property.Description: Indicates the index of the menu item within its parent menu. Use MenuIndex to locate the menu item in the Items property of its parent menu item. Changing this value moves the menu item within its menu. MenuIndex may not correspond to the position of the item in the menu the user sees. The menu can include items that are not visible.

Property.name: Name
Property.Description: Determines the name of the control as of the Cache' object. Can be changed at design time only.

Property.name: OnClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the menu item is selected or the Click method is called directly.

Property.name: ParentMenu
Property.Description: Read ParentMenu to determine the menu item that represents the dropdown menu that contains this menu item. If the menu item is a top level menu item in a main menu or pop-up menu, ParentMenu is the value of that menus Items property.

Property.name: RadioItem
Property.Description: If set to "True", the menu items with the same GroupIndex acts as a radiogroup, i.e., checking one item unchecks all other items automatically. The top-level main menu items can not belong to a radiogroup.

Property.name: ShortCut
Property.Description: Determines the shortcut to quickly call this menu item. Can be set only at design time.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text corresponding to this item.

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description:
If set to "True" (default value), the item appears in the menu, if set to "False", the item is hidden.
Description
Use Visible to prevent the user from seeing an item in the menu. For example, remove menu items that do not apply to the current component of a pop-up menu in an OnPopup event handler.
If Visible is True, the menu item appears. If Visible is False, the menu item is hidden.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds the subitem specified by its oref to this menu item.

Method.name: BreakGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Break") q tmp

Method.name: CaptionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Caption") q tmp

Method.name: CheckedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Checked") q tmp

Method.name: Click
Method.Description: Arises the OnClick event for the menu item.

Method.name: Command
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Command",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: Count
Method.Description: Returns the number of subitems of this item.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Count",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: DefaultGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Default") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Deletes the item specified by its Index (with all its subitems) from menu. Index may be an integer from 0 to Count()-1.

Method.name: EnabledGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Enabled") q tmp

Method.name: GetItem
Method.Description: Returns oref of the subitem specified by its Index. Index may be an integer from 0 to Count()-1.

Method.name: GroupIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("GroupIndex") q tmp

Method.name: HasParent
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("HasParent",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: HelpContextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HelpContext") q tmp

Method.name: HintGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Hint") q tmp

Method.name: IndexOf
Method.Description: Returns index of the menu item specified by its oref.

Method.name: InitiateAction
Method.Description: If the menu item has an association with an action link, updates this link, otherwise does nothing.

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Inserts the subitem specified by its oref to the menu item after the item with specified Index.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnClick=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnClick",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: RadioItemGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("RadioItem") q tmp

Method.name: Remove
Method.Description: Deletes the item specified by its oref (with all its subitems) from menu.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShortCut") q tmp

Method.name: VisibleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Visible") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMOleContainer
Class.Description: %TMOleContainer is not an OLE object. It just contains such an object and gives OLE server interface of allocation and executes mediatory functions for OLE object transmission between server and form where it is allocated.

Property.name: AllowActiveDoc
Property.Description: If set to "True", OLE container supports both 'IOleDocumentSite' and 'IOleClientSite' interfaces. If set to "False", 'IOleDocumentSite' interface is not supported.

Property.name: AllowInPlace
Property.Description: Determines, should the object be activated in place (if set to "True") or in a new window (if set to "False").

Property.name: AutoActivate
Property.Description:
Determines the possible way of object activation. Possible values:
"aaManual" - by calling the 'DoVerb' method (verb "ovShow");
"aaGetFocus" - by getting focus by the container;
"aaDoubleClick" - by double click on the container or pressing 'Enter' key when the container has focus;
Default value: ""aaDoubleClick".

Property.name: AutoVerbMenu
Property.Description: Determines, should the OLE container automatically create popup menu with allowed verbs (if set to "True") or leave popup menu unchanged (if set to "False").

Property.name: BLOB
Property.Description: Setting this property results in loading OLE object from the global ^BLOB with given index. See description of the 'SaveToBLOB' method.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description: Determines, should a single-line border be drawn around the container (if set to "bsSingle") or not (if set to "bsNone").

Property.name: CanPaste
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the clipboard contains OLE object which can be pasted to the container, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: CopyOnSave
Property.Description: Determines, should the object be saved directly to the target (if set to "False"), or through temporary copy, compressing redundant information (if set to "True"). Default value is "True".

Property.name: Iconic
Property.Description: Determines, should the object be displayed as icon (if set to "True"), or as in the corresponding application (if set to "False").

Property.name: Linked
Property.Description: Indicates, is the loaded object linked (if set to "True") or embedded (if set to "False").

Property.name: Modified
Property.Description: Contains "True" if OLE object has been modified since it was loaded or this property set to "False", otherwise - "False".

Property.name: NewInserted
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the OLE object is created in this container, otherwise (if it was pasted or linked) - "False".

Property.name: ObjectVerbs
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMString object with verbs allowed for current state of loaded OLE object.

Property.name: OldStreamFormat
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: OleClassName
Property.Description: Read only, contains the class name of loaded OLE object.

Property.name: OnActivate
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when loaded OLE object is activated.

Property.name: OnDeactivate
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when loaded OLE object is deactivated.

Property.name: OnObjectMove
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when loaded OLE object is resized or moved.

Property.name: PrimaryVerb
Property.Description: Determines the index of default verb for loaded OLE object.

Property.name: SizeMode
Property.Description:
Determines the mode of OLE object sizing. Possible values:
"smClip" - use original size, clip all that don't fit the container area;
"smCenter" - center OLE object in the container, use original size;
"smScale" - stretch OLE object proportionally to fit the container area;
"smStretch" - stretch without keeping proportions;
"smAutoSize" - resize container to display OLE object at original size;
Default value: "smClip".

Property.name: SourceDoc
Property.Description: Contains the name of source document for linked OLE object, or empty string for embedded.

Property.name: State
Property.Description:
Indicates state of object in the OLE container. Possible values:
"osEmpty" - container is empty;
"osLoaded" - object is loaded, corresponding application is not running;
"osRunning" - object is loaded, corresponding application is running;
"osOpen" - object is activated in a new window;
"osInPlaceActive" - intermediate state while inplace activating;
"osUIActive" - object is activated in place.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: ChangeIconDialog
Method.Description: Enables icon selecting modal dialog for already loaded OLE object. Returns "True" if the dialog box was successfully displayed and user clicked 'OK' button, otherwise - "False".

Method.name: CloseObject
Method.Description: Deactivates loaded OLE object, saves changes and terminates corresponding application.

Method.name: Copy
Method.Description: Copies loaded OLE object to the clipboard.

Method.name: CopyOnSaveGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CopyOnSave") q tmp

Method.name: CreateObject
Method.Description: Creates embedded OLE object with specified OleClassName. The 'Iconic' parameter determines, should the object be displayed as icon (if set to "True"), or as in the corresponding application (if set to "False"). Previously loaded OLE object, if any, will be destroyed without saving changes.

Method.name: DestroyObject
Method.Description: Destroys OLE object without saving changes.

Method.name: DoVerb
Method.Description: Performs action specified by the index of string in 'ObjectVerbs' property with the OLE object.

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..ObjectVerbs.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..ObjectVerbs,""ObjectVerbs"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Iconic") q tmp

Method.name: InsertObjectDialog
Method.Description: Enables modal dialog selecting OLE object to be inserted into the container. Returns "True" if the dialog box was successfully displayed and user clicked 'OK' button, otherwise - "False". Previously loaded OLE object, if any, will be destroyed without saving changes.

Method.name: LinkedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Linked") q tmp

Method.name: LoadFromStream
Method.Description: Loads OLE object from Cache stream specified by its oref. Previously loaded OLE object, if any, will be destroyed without saving changes.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Modified") q tmp

Method.name: NewInsertedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("NewInserted") q tmp

Method.name: ObjectPropertiesDialog
Method.Description: Enables modal dialog to view and edit properties of loaded OLE object. Returns "True" if the dialog box was successfully displayed and user clicked 'OK' button, otherwise - "False".

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("OldStreamFormat") q tmp

Method.name: OleClassNameGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("OleClassName") q tmp

Method.name: OnActivateSet

Method.name: OnDeactivateSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDeactivate=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDeactivate",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnObjectMoveSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnObjectMove=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnObjectMove",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: Paste
Method.Description: Pastes OLE object from the clipboard to container as an embedded object. Previously loaded OLE object, if any, will be destroyed without saving changes.

Method.name: PasteSpecialDialog
Method.Description: Enables modal dialog selecting parameters of OLE object to be pasted: format, embedded or linked, iconized or displayed as in corresponding application and pastes it to container. Returns "True" if the dialog box was successfully displayed and user clicked 'OK' button, otherwise - "False". Previously loaded OLE object, if any, will be destroyed without saving changes.

Method.name: PrimaryVerbGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("PrimaryVerb") q tmp

Method.name: SaveToBLOB
Method.Description: Saves the OLE object in the global ^BLOB with specified index.

Method.name: SaveToStream
Method.Description: Saves OLE object into specified Cache stream.

Method.name: SizeModeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SizeMode") q tmp

Method.name: SourceDocGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SourceDoc") q tmp

Method.name: StateGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("State") q tmp

Method.name: UpdateVerbs
Method.Description: Refreshes the alllowed verbs list for the loaded OLE object. Called automatically while first read of 'ObjectVerbs' property. Should be called when the verbs list may change due to change of the OLE object state.

Class.name: %Library.TMOleObject
Class.Description: Provides interface to a client's OLE objects.

Property.name: Locale
Property.Description: Represents client's locale identifier.

Property.name: Value
Property.Description: Buffer variable for some methods.

Method.name: AssignIDispatch
Method.Description: Assigns a class instance to the specified embedded OLE object. Parameter of this method may be obtained as a result of 'GetOleProperty' method call. Sets $li(..Value,2) to $$$varDispatch if successful.

Method.name: CallOleFunction
Method.Description: Calls OLE function with specified name and parameters. Params is $LB() of function parameters. Each function parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX.

Method.name: CallOleFunctionByID
Method.Description: Calls OLE function by Index with specified parameters. Params is $LB() of function parameters. Each function parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX.

Method.name: CallOleFunctionNamedParams
Method.Description: Calls OLE function with specified name and parameters. Params is $LB() of function parameters. Each function parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX. Names is $LB() of corresponding parameter names.

Method.name: CallOleFunctionNoParams
Method.Description: Calls OLE function with specified name without parameters.

Method.name: CallOleFunctionNoParamsByID
Method.Description: Calls OLE function with specified index without parameters.

Method.name: CallOleProcedure
Method.Description: Executes OLE procedure with specified name and parameters. Params is $LB() of procedure parameters. Each procedure parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX.

Method.name: CallOleProcedureByID
Method.Description: Executes OLE procedure with specified index and parameters. Params is $LB() of procedure parameters. Each procedure parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX.

Method.name: CallOleProcedureNamedParams
Method.Description: Calls OLE procedure with specified name and parameters. Params is $LB() of function parameters. Each function parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX. Names is $LB() of corresponding parameter names.

Method.name: CallOleProcedureNoParamsByID
Method.Description: Executes OLE procedure with specified index without parameters.

Method.name: CreateObject
Method.Description: Creates new OLE object using specified OLE class name. Sets $li(..Value,2) to $$$varDispatch if successful.

Method.name: GetActiveObject
Method.Description: Searches available active OLE object with specified OLE class name and attaches to it. Sets $li(..Value,2) to $$$varDispatch if successful.

Method.name: GetOleProperty
Method.Description:
Returns the value of specified property. Params is $LB() of optional parameters. Each parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX. For example, the value of Excel cell may be obtained as:
..GetOleProperty("Cells",$lb($lb((col,$$$varInteger),$lb((row,$$$varInteger)))

Method.name: GetOlePropertyByID
Method.Description: Returns the value of property specified by index.

Method.name: LocaleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Locale") q tmp

Method.name: SetOleProperty
Method.Description:
Assigns the value of specified property. Params is $LB() of optional parameters. Each parameter is $LB(ParamValue,ParamType), where possible values of ParamType are specified in %Const.INC as $$$varXXX. For example, to put text string into Excel cell use:
..SetOleProperty("Cells",$lb(text,$$$varOleStr),$lb($lb((col,$$$varInteger),$lb((row,$$$varInteger)))

Method.name: SetOlePropertyByID
Method.Description: Assigns the value of property specified by index.

Method.name: ValueGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Value") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMPage
Class.Description: For internal use. Necessary for %TMNoteBook methods.

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Contains the text of the page caption.

Method.name: CaptionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Caption") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMPageControl
Class.Description: Represents the client-side image of a Windows multipage dialog. Every page of this dialog is a %TMTabSheet object. To include existing page to a %TMPageControl object just set the page Parent property to the %TMPageControl oref.

Property.name: ActivePage
Property.Description: Contains oref of the currenly active page.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas which methods can be used to draw customized tabs and pages.

Property.name: HotTrack
Property.Description: If set to "True", the tabs under the mouse cursor will be highlighted, otherwise - not.

Property.name: Images
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMImageList object with the images to be displayed on the tabs.

Property.name: MultiLine
Property.Description: If set to "True", the tabs may be displayed in more than one row if necessary. Otherwise, the all tabs may occupy a single row only.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when another page has been selected.

Property.name: OnChanging
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the currenlty active page is about to be switched, giving opportunity to protect page from unwanted switching by setting the AllowChange handler parameter to "False".

Property.name: OnDrawTab
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the tab is about to be displayed and the OwnerDraw property is set to "True", giving opportunity to draw customized tabs.

Property.name: OnGetImageIndex
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the image corresponding to a tab is about to be displayed.

Property.name: OwnerDraw
Property.Description: If set to "True", allows the OnDrawTab event to be raised when a tab is about to be drawn.

Property.name: PageCount
Property.Description: Contains the number of pages in this control.

Property.name: RaggedRight
Property.Description: Determines, should the tabs rows to be stretched correspondingly with the control width. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: ScrollOpposite
Property.Description: If set to "True", the value of the TabPosistion property determines the direction in which deselected tabs row must be moved. Otherwise, the deselected row moves to the back of all other rows.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines the tabs appearance. Possible values:
"tsTabs" - usual tabs.
"tsButtons" - 3D buttons.
"tsFlatButtons" - flat buttons.

Property.name: TabHeight
Property.Description: Determines the tabs vertical size (in pixels). If set to 0, the tabs height corresponds to there text height.

Property.name: TabPosition
Property.Description: Determines the control edge where the tabs will be drawn. Possible values: "tpTop", "tpBottom", "tpLeft" or "tpRight".

Property.name: TabWidth
Property.Description: Determines the tabs horizontal size (in pixels). If set to 0, the tabs height corresponds to there text width.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: FindNextPage
Method.Description: Returns oref of the next (if the GoForward parameter is set to "True") or previous (if the GoForward value is "False") page of the page control relative to the current page specified by its oref.page. The set of pages in considered as cyclic, i.e., the fist page is the next after the last one. If the CheckTabVisible is set to "True", pages with the TabVisible property set to "False" will be skipped.

Class.name: %Library.TMPanel
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of a generic panel control. Contains methods and properties for manupulations with child controls embedded in the panel.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Determines the caption alignment within the panel. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify" or "taCenter".

Property.name: FullRepaint
Property.Description: If set to "True", the entire panel together with all embedded controls will be repainted when the panel is resized.

Property.name: Locked
Property.Description: If set to "True", prevents the panel from being replaced by a toolbar submitted by OLE server.

Method.name: AlignmentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Alignment") q tmp

Method.name: FullRepaintGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FullRepaint") q tmp

Method.name: LockedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Locked") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMParaAttributes
Class.Description: The set of properties and methods dealing with rich text paragraphs formatting.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Detemines horizontal text alignment inside this paragraph. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify", "taCenter".

Property.name: FirstIndent
Property.Description: Determines indent of the paragraph first line from the left margin (in pixels).

Property.name: LeftIndent
Property.Description: Determines indent of the paragraph from the left margin (in pixels).

Property.name: Numbering
Property.Description:
Determines the numbering option for the paragraph. Possible values:
"nsNone" - no numbering;
"nsBullet" - place bullets on the left from the paragraph.

Property.name: RightIndent
Property.Description: Determines indent of the paragraph from the right margin (in pixels).

Property.name: TabCount
Property.Description: Contains number of tab stops in this paragraph.

Method.name: AlignmentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Alignment") q tmp

Method.name: FirstIndentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FirstIndent") q tmp

Method.name: GetTabs
Method.Description: Returns position of tab stop specified by Index (in pixels).

Method.name: LeftIndentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("LeftIndent") q tmp

Method.name: NumberingGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Numbering") q tmp

Method.name: RightIndentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("RightIndent") q tmp

Method.name: SetTabs
Method.Description: Sets position of tab stop specified by its index (in pixels).

Method.name: TabCountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TabCount") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMPen
Class.Description: Represents the parameters of a pen used to draw lines and outline shapes.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Determines the color used for drawing.

Property.name: Mode
Property.Description:
Determines the interference between the pen color and the canvas color. Possible values:
"pmBlack" - only black.
"pmWhite" - only white.
"pmNop" - no action.
"pmNot" - use inverted canvas background color.
"pmCopy" - use color specified in Color property.
"pmNotCopy" - use inverted pen color.
"pmMergePenNot" - combine the pen color and inverted canvas background color.
"pmMaskPenNot" - combine the colors common to both pen and inverted canvas background..
"pmMergeNotPen" - combine the canvas background color and inverted pen color.
"pmMaskNotPen" - combine colors common to both canvas background and inverted pen color.
"pmMerge" - combine the pen color and canvas background color.
"pmNotMerge" - inverted pmMerge.
"pmMask" - combine colors common to both pen and canvas background.
"pmNotMask" - inverted pmMask..
"pmXor" - combine colors in the pen or canvas background, but not both..
"pmNotXor" - inverted pmXor.

Property.name: Name
Property.Description: For interrnal use.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the pen properties change.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines the drawn lines style. Possible values:
"psSolid" - solid line.
"psDash" - dashed line.
"psDot" - dotted line.
"psDashDot" - alternating dashes and dots.
"psDashDotDot" - a sequence of dash-dot-dot combinations.
"psClear" - no drawing.
"psInsideFrame" - solid line of dithered color.

Property.name: Width
Property.Description: Determines the width drawn lines (in pixels).

Method.name: ColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Color") q tmp

Method.name: ModeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Mode") q tmp

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Method.name: StyleSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp ; s i%Style=Value d ##this.SetProperty("Style",Value) q $$$OK

Method.name: WidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Width") q tmp

Class.Description: The base class for all SMWrap objects. Its methods should not be called directly from applications.

Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: CloseFromClient
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Parent
Property.Description: For internal use.

Method.Implementation: ; initvalue=$lb(Parent,ClientAddress) n bd i initvalue="" q $$$OK s ##this.Parent=$lg(initvalue,1,0) i $lg(initvalue,2,0)=0 d . i $lg(initvalue,3,"")'="" d . . s ..PropName=$lg(initvalue,3,"") . e d . . s ..Address=$$CallBack^%ZMRASD($lb("no",##this.ClassName(),+##this.Parent,+##this)) e d . s ..Address=$lg(initvalue,2,0) . s bd=$$CallBack^%ZMRASD($lb("so",##this.Address,+##this)) q $$$OK

Method.name: SetMultiProperty
Method.Implementation: n tmp,i,send,Addr s Addr=..Address s i%Address="no" s send=$lb("cb",$ll(Names)) f i=1:1:$ll(Names) d . n Value,ValueToSend . s Value=$s(($lg($g(References,""),i,0)=1):..GetObjOref($lg(Values,i)),1:$lg(Values,i)) . s ValueToSend=Value . s:($lg($g(References,""),i,0)=1) ValueToSend=$S(+Value:Value.Address,1:0) . s $zObjProperty(##this,$lg(Names,i))=Value . s send=send_$lb($lb("sp",Addr,$lg(Names,i),ValueToSend)) . k Value s i%Address=Addr s tmp=$$CallBack^%ZMRASD(send) q

Class.name: %Library.TMPieOtherSlice
Class.Description: Allows to group small slices from the %TMPieSeries collection in single 'Other' slice.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description: Determines, should the values or percentage limit slices to be grouped. Possible values: "poNone", "poBelowPercent", "poBelowValue".

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Determines text label for the 'Other' slice.

Property.name: Value
Property.Description: Determines the maximal value of slice to be grouped into the 'Other' slice.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Text") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMPieSeries
Class.Description: Represents chart data as a set of pie slices.

Property.name: CircleBackColor
Property.Description: Determines the pie background color (in hexadecimal RGB format).

Property.name: CircleHeight
Property.Description: Indicates the pie height (in pixels).

Property.name: CircleWidth
Property.Description: Indicates the pie width (in pixels).

Property.name: CircleXCenter
Property.Description: Indicates the horizontal screen coordinate of the pie center.

Property.name: CircleYCenter
Property.Description: Indicates the vertical screen coordinate of the pie center.

Property.name: Circled
Property.Description: Determines, should the pie be ellipse (if set to "False") or circle.

Property.name: CustomXRadius
Property.Description: Determines horizontal pie radius (in pixels). If set to 0 (default value), the radius will be calculated automatically.

Property.name: CustomYRadius
Property.Description: Determines vertical pie radius (in pixels). If set to 0 (default value), the radius will be calculated automatically.

Property.name: Dark3D
Property.Description: If set to "True", the pie and slices edges will look like shadowed.

Property.name: ExplodeBiggest
Property.Description: Allowes to explode biggest slice out from the pie.

Property.name: OtherSlice
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMPieOtherSlice object where small slices are united as "Other".

Property.name: PiePen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object used for the pie and slices outline.

Property.name: PieValues
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartValueList object with slices sizes.

Property.name: RotationAngle
Property.Description: Determines the offset angle (in degrees).

Property.name: UsePatterns
Property.Description: Determines, should the pie slices be filled using 6 different brush styles (if set to "True") or have the same brush style (if set to "False", default value).

Property.name: XRadius
Property.Description: Readonly, indicates horizontal pie radius (in pixels).

Property.name: YRadius
Property.Description: Readonly, indicates vertical pie radius (in pixels).

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMChartSeries") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMChartSeries") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMChartSeries)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMPopupMenu
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of a menu, appearing when a control with assigned PopupMenu property is right-clicked.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description:
Determines the position of the popup menu relative to the mouse cusror. Possible values:
"paLeft" - top left corner of menu at the mouse cursor position (default value).
"paCenter" - center of menu at the mouse cursor position.
"paRight" - top right corner of menu at the mouse cursor position.

Property.name: AutoPopup
Property.Description: If set to "True", the menu brings up when the corresponding control is right-clicked. Otherwise the direct call of the Popup method is necessary to make menu visible.

Property.name: HelpContext
Property.Description: Contains the context ID of the help system screen related to this menu.

Property.name: Images
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMImageList object with images for the menu items.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: Contains oref of the abstract root menu item, providing access to %TMMenuItem methods necessary to add, insert or delete top-level menu items.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the menu structure is changed.

Property.name: OnPopup
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the popup menu is to appear.

Property.name: PopupComponent
Property.Description: Contains oref of the control last called the popup menu.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMPrintDialog
Class.Description: This class enables modal dialog selecting parameters of printing. The Execute method activates dialog, after the dialog completed, the class properties contains values of corresponding parameters.

Property.name: Collate
Property.Description: Indicates state of the 'Collate' checkbox: contains "True", if it is checked, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: Copies
Property.Description: Contains number of copies entered in the dialog.

Property.name: Ctl3D
Property.Description: Determines, should the control look three-dimensional (if set to "True") or flat (if set to "False").

Property.name: FromPage
Property.Description: Contains number of page from which printing should begin.

Property.name: HelpContext
Property.Description: Contains the context ID of the help system screen related to this dialog.

Property.name: MaxPage
Property.Description: Contains maximal page number which can be entered in 'From page' and 'To page' edit fields.

Property.name: MinPage
Property.Description: Contains minimal page number which can be entered in 'From page' and 'To page' edit fields.

Property.name: OnClose
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the dialog is about to be closed.

Property.name: OnShow
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the dialog box is shown as a result of the 'Execute' method.

Property.name: Options
Property.Description:
Determines the diaolg options. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb) where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"poDisablePrintToFile" - disable the 'Print To File' check box;
"poHelp" - enable 'Help' button;
"poPageNums" - allow user to specify range of pages to be printed;
"poPrintToFile" - enable the 'Print To File' checkbox;
"poSelection" - allow selected text printing;
"poWarning" - warn about uninstalled printer;
Default value: $lb().

Property.name: PrintRange
Property.Description: Indicates state of the 'Print Range' radiobutton: contains "True", if it is checked, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: PrintToFile
Property.Description: Indicates state of the 'Print To File' checkbox: contains "True", if it is checked, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Property.name: ToPage
Property.Description: Contains number of page on which printing should finish.

Class.name: %Library.TMPrinterSetupDialog

Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the dialog box is shown as a result of the 'Execute' method.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Method.name: Ctl3DGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Ctl3D") q tmp

Method.name: Execute
Method.Description: Activates dialog. Returns "True" if dialog finished successfully, or "False" if dialog was canceled.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Execute",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: HelpContextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HelpContext") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMProgressBar
Class.Description: This class represents server-side image of Windows progress bar.

Property.name: Max
Property.Description: Maximal possible value of 'Position' property. Default value is 100.

Property.name: Min
Property.Description: Minimal possible value of 'Position' property. Default value is 0.

Property.name: Position
Property.Description: Determines current position of the progress bar. If 'Min' value is 0, and 'Max' value is 100, corresponds to percentage of completed.

Property.name: Step
Property.Description: Specifies the 'Position' increment, corresponding to one logical step.

Method.name: MaxGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Max") q tmp

Method.name: MinGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Min") q tmp

Method.name: PositionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Position") q tmp

Method.name: StepBy
Method.Description: Advances progress bar by a specified delta, increasing the value of 'Position' property.

Method.name: StepGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Step") q tmp

Method.name: StepIt
Method.Description: Advances progress bar by one logical step, adding the value of 'Step' property to the 'Position' property.

Class.name: %Library.TMQuery
Class.Description: Describes all information necessary for executing queries. SMWrap controls which can be filled with data from query must supply information in their Query property.

Property.name: IdField
Property.Description: Name of Id field in %ResultSet. If it is set, value of this field is stored in Data or Object part of values.

Property.name: QueryClass
Property.Description: Class of query.

Property.name: QueryFields
Property.Description: List of fields (delimited with comma), that must be loaded to control. List must contain fields names.

Property.name: QueryName
Property.Description: Name of query.

Method.name: SetMultiProperty
Method.Implementation: n i f i=1:1:$ll(Names) d . s $zObjProperty(##this,$lg(Names,i))=$lg(Values,i) q

Class.name: %Library.TMRadioButton
Class.Description: This class represents the server-side image of a windows radio button. Only one from radio buttons placed in the same container (%TMPanel, %TMGroupBox, %TMRadioGroup) can be checked in a time.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Determines the radio button caption alignment. Possible values: "taLeftJustify" or "taRightJustify", default is "taLeftJustify".

Property.name: Checked
Property.Description: Represents, is the radio button checked or not. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Method.name: AlignmentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Alignment") q tmp

Method.name: CheckedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Checked") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMRadioGroup
Class.Description: Represents a special group box embedding radio buttons only.

Property.name: Columns
Property.Description: Contains number of columns in which radio buttons should be arranged.

Property.name: ItemIndex
Property.Description: Contains index of checked radio button (indexing starts from 0) or -1, if no radio button is checked.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMString object containing list of radio buttons names.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK
