Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Items.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Items=##class(%TMStrings).%New($lb(..Address,..GetProperty(""Items"")))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: ColumnsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Columns") q tmp

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Items.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Items,""Items"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: ItemIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ItemIndex") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMRichEdit
Class.Description: This class represents the server-side image of a windows rich text edit control.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Detemines horizontal text alignment inside the rectangle aimed for this control. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify", "taCenter".

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines, should the control have a border around the client area. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border
"bsNone" - no border.

Property.name: CanUndo
Property.Description: Indicates, are there changes saved in the Undo buffer. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: CaretPos
Property.Description: Determines the coordinates of the cursor (in pixels) relative to the client area.

Property.name: HideScrollBars
Property.Description: If set to "True", scrollbars disappear if the entire text has room in the edit window.

Property.name: HideSelection
Property.Description: Determines, should the selected text be highlighted when the control is out of focus. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: Lines
Property.Description: Collection of the text lines in this control. Use %TMString methods (Add, Insert, Move, Delete, IndexOf, Count) to operate with separate items.

Property.name: MaxLength
Property.Description: Limits the length of string the user can input in the edit window. 0 means no limitation.

Property.name: Modified
Property.Description: Indicates, is the text modified by the user. Possible values: "True" or "False". The code altering the 'Lines' property should set the 'Modified' property to "True".

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the text is changed.

Property.name: OnProtectChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when an attempt to change protected text has been done.

Property.name: OnResizeRequest
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the text becomes smaller or larger than the edit window.

Property.name: OnSaveClipboard
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control is about to be destroyed, but the text copying to the clipboard is not finished yet.

Property.name: OnSelectionChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when selection is changed.

Property.name: PageRect
Property.Description: Determines the size of logical page ($lb(X,Y), where X and Y are horizontal and vertical sizes in 1/20 of point) for text formatting before printing.

Property.name: Paragraph
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMParaAttributes object with parameters of the current paragraph formatting.

Property.name: PlainText
Property.Description: If set to "True", the 'SaveToFile', 'SaveToBLOB', 'LoadFromFile' and 'LoadFromBLOB' methods of the 'Lines' property consider the control contents as plain text, otherwise - as rich text.

Property.name: ReadOnly
Property.Description: Determines, should the text be protected from being changed by user. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: ScrollBars
Property.Description:
Determines, can this control have scrollbars. Possible values:
"ssNone" - no scrollbars
"ssHorizontal" - a horizontal scrollbar on the bottom edge
"ssVertical" - a vertical scrollbar on the right edge
"ssBoth" - both horizontal and vertical scrollbars.

Property.name: SelAttributes
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMTextAttributes object with font characteristics of selected text.

Property.name: SelLength
Property.Description: Represents the length of the selected text in the control.

Property.name: SelStart
Property.Description: Represents the number of first symbol of selected part of text in the control (numbering starts from 0). If no text is selected, represents the cursor position.

Property.name: SelText
Property.Description: Represents the selected text in the edit control. Change of this property replaces the selected text with new value, or inserts it at the cursor if no text is selected.

Property.name: TextAttributes
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMTextAttributes object with font characteristics of cursor position.

Property.name: WantReturns
Property.Description: Determines, should the Enter keystrokes insert CRLF characters into the text (if set to "True") or be handled by the form, allowing, however, user to insert CRLF typing Ctrl-Enter (if set to "False").

Property.name: WantTabs
Property.Description: Determines, should the Tab keystrokes insert tab characters into the text (if set to "True") or move the focus to the next control (if set to "False").

Property.name: WordWrap
Property.Description: Determines, should the too long text be wrapped and displayed in several lines (if set to "True") or displayed in single line with scrolling (if set to "False"). Affects only on the appearance rather than actual contents of the 'Lines' property.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.Lines.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.Lines=##class(%TMStrings).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""Lines""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.Paragraph.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.Paragraph=##class(%TMParaAttributes).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""Paragraph""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.SelAttributes.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.SelAttributes=##class(%TMTextAttributes).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""SelAttributes""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ##this.TextAttributes.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ##this.TextAttributes=##class(%TMTextAttributes).%New($lb(##this.Address,0,""TextAttributes""))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: AlignmentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Alignment") q tmp

Method.name: BorderStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BorderStyle") q tmp

Method.name: CanUndoGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CanUndo") q tmp

Method.name: CaretPosGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CaretPos") q tmp

Method.name: Clear
Method.Description: Removes all the text from the control.

Method.name: ClearSelection
Method.Description: Deletes selected part of text from the control.

Method.name: ClearUndo
Method.Description: Makes changes irreversible and sets the CanUndo property to "False".

Method.name: CopyToClipboard
Method.Description: Copies the selected text into Windows Clipboard. If no text is selected, Clipboard remains unchanged.

Method.name: CutToClipboard
Method.Description: Copies the selected text into Windows Clipboard and then deletes it from the control. If no text is selected, Clipboard remains unchanged.

Method.name: FindText
Method.Description: Searches SearchStr in the range of the text specified by StartPos and Length. Possible value of 'Options' parameter: Cache list ($lb()) containing only necessary strings from the following: "stWholeWord" and "stMatchCase", their meaning is obvious. Returns the position of the found string (numbering of characters starts from 0), or -1, if the string is not found.

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Lines.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Lines,""Lines"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Paragraph.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Paragraph,""Paragraph"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..SelAttributes.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..SelAttributes,""SelAttributes"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..TextAttributes.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..TextAttributes,""TextAttributes"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HideScrollBars") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HideSelection") q tmp

Method.name: MaxLengthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("MaxLength") q tmp

Method.name: ModifiedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Modified") q tmp

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnProtectChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnProtectChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnResizeRequestSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnResizeRequest=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnResizeRequest",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnSaveClipboardSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnSaveClipboard=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnSaveClipboard",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnSelectionChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnSelectionChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnSelectionChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: PageRectGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("PageRect") q tmp

Method.name: PasteFromClipboard
Method.Description: Replaces the selected text with the Windows Clipboard contents. If no text is selected, inserts the Clipboard contents at the cursor. Does nothing if the Clipboard contains no rich text.

Method.name: PlainTextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("PlainText") q tmp

Method.name: Print
Method.Description: Prints contents of the rich edit control. The 'Caption' parameter determines the printed document header.

Method.name: ReadOnlyGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ReadOnly") q tmp

Method.name: ScrollBarsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ScrollBars") q tmp

Method.name: SelLengthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SelLength") q tmp

Method.name: SelStartGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SelStart") q tmp

Method.name: SelTextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SelText") q tmp

Method.name: SelectAll
Method.Description: Marks all the text in the control as selected.

Method.name: Undo
Method.Description: Cancels changes of the control contents made since the last ClearUndo call or all changes, if ClearUndo was never called.

Method.name: WantReturnsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("WantReturns") q tmp

Method.name: WantTabsGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("WantTabs") q tmp

Method.name: WordWrapGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("WordWrap") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMRxDrawGrid
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of control allowing to display information in tabular form.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the appearance of the grid border. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border (not resizeable).
"bsNone" - no border (not resizeable).
"bsDialog" - usual dialog box border (not resizeable).
"bsSizeable" - usual resizeable border.
"bsToolWindow" - single-line border, smaller caption (not resizeable).
"bsSizeToolWin" - usual resizeable border, smaller caption.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMCanvas object to be used to display owner-drawn items.

Property.name: Col
Property.Description: Determines the index of column containing selected cell. Possible values: integers from 0 to ColCount-1.

Property.name: ColCount
Property.Description: Represents the total number of the grid columns.

Property.name: ColWidths
Property.Description: Contains Cache' list ($lb()) built from widths of columns (in pixels).

Property.name: DefaultColWidth
Property.Description: Determines horizontal size (in pixels) for all columns before they are resized.

Property.name: DefaultDrawing
Property.Description: Determines, should the cells be painted automatically (if set to "True") or manually, using the 'DrawCell' method (if set to "False").

Property.name: DefaultRowHeight
Property.Description: Determines vertical size (in pixels) for all rows before they are resized.

Property.name: EditorMode
Property.Description: Determines, is the grid is in the edit mode (user can edit cells values) (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False". Setting this property has no effect if the 'Options' property disables the edit mode toggle.

Property.name: FixedButtons
Property.Description: Determines, should the 'OnFixedCellClick' event occur when the fixed cell is clicked (if set to "True"), or double clicks only are detectable (if set to "False").

Property.name: FixedColor
Property.Description: Determines background color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for the fixed cells.

Property.name: FixedCols
Property.Description: Determines the number of fixed (leftmost and non-scrollable) columns in the grid.

Property.name: FixedRows
Property.Description: Determines the number of fixed (topmost and non-scrollable) rows in the grid.

Property.name: GridLineWidth
Property.Description: Determines the thickness (in pixels) of the line separating the grid cells. 0 is allowed, more than 3 is not recommended.

Property.name: IniStorage
Property.Description: For use in future.

Property.name: InplaceEditorText
Property.Description:
Text string contained in the inplace editor when it is active. Inplace editor can be assigned in the 'OnGetEditStyle' event handler. Possible styles are:
"ieSimple" - simplest one-string editor;
"ieEllipsis" - simplest one-string editor and ellispsis button;
"iePickList" - drop-down list with an edit region for custom text input. Options of this dropdown list can be assigned in the 'OnGetPicklist' event handler.

Property.name: LeftCol
Property.Description: Represents index of the leftmost visible scrollable column.

Property.name: OnAcceptEditKey
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a key is entered in edit mode. Allows to accept or reject keys.

Property.name: OnCancelEdit
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a cell editor is terminated.

Property.name: OnChangeFocus
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the grid gets focus or becomes blur.

Property.name: OnCheckButton
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when 'Enable' status of a fixed cell is retrieved.

Property.name: OnColumnSized
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a column has been 1st time resized.

Property.name: OnDrawCell
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a cell needs to be repainted.

Property.name: OnEditButtonClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the ellipsis button in the ellipsis-style inplace editor is clicked.

Property.name: OnEditChange
Property.Description: Handler for event occuring when the text the edit region changes.

Property.name: OnFixedCellClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the fixed cell is clicked and the 'FixedButtons' property is set to "True".

Property.name: OnGetEditAlign
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when inplace editor alignment is retrieved.

Property.name: OnGetEditLimit
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the maximum text length for inplace editor is retrieved.

Property.name: OnGetEditStyle
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when inplace editor style is retrieved. Possible styles are listed in the 'InplaceEditorText' property description.

Property.name: OnGetPicklist
Property.Description: Handler of event ocuring when options for inplace dropdown list are retrieved. The 'PickList' parameter must contain CRLF-delimited options.

Property.name: OnRowSized
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a row has been 1st time resized.

Property.name: OnShowEditor
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately before inplace editor start.

Property.name: Options
Property.Description:
Determines the grid appearance and capabilities. Possible value: Cache list ($lb()) where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"goFixedVertLine" - draw vertical lines between the fixed (non-scrolling) columns;
"goFixedHorzLine" - draw horizontal lines between the fixed (non-scrolling) rows;
"goVertLine" - draw vertical lines between usual (scrollable) columns;
"goHorzLine" - draw horizontal lines between usual (scrollable) rows;
"goRangeSelect" - allow to select ranges of cells (for read-only grids);
"goDrawFocusSelected" - highlight cells with input focus;
"goRowSizing" - allow to resize separate scrollable rows;
"goColSizing" - allow to resize separate scrollable columns;
"goRowMoving" - allow to move scrollable rows by the mouse;
"goColMoving" - allow to move scrollable columns by the mouse;
"goEditing" - allows to enter edit mode for the cells;
"goTabs" - the 'Tab' and 'Shift-Tab' keys moves focus between the columns;
"goRowSelect" - select entire row rather than single cell;
"goAlwaysShowEditor" - the edit mode is always on;
"goThumbTracking" - update the grid image while the scrollbar thumb is being dragged, do not wait for the thumb release.

Property.name: Row
Property.Description: Determines the index of row containing selected cell. Possible values: integers from 0 to RowCount-1.

Property.name: RowCount
Property.Description: Represents the total number of the grid rows.

Property.name: ScrollBars
Property.Description: Determines, what scrollbars should be shown if there are invisible rows or columns. Possible values: "ssNone", "ssHorizontal", "ssVertical" or "ssBoth".

Property.name: Selection
Property.Description: Represents the range of selected cells (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)).

Property.name: TopRow
Property.Description: Represents index of the topmost visible scrollable row.

Property.name: VisibleColCount
Property.Description: Indicates the number of visible columns (excluding fixed columns).

Property.name: VisibleRowCount
Property.Description: Indicates the number of visible rows (excluding fixed rows).

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: DrawStr

Method.name: GetColWidths
Method.Description: Returns the width (in pixels) of the column specified by its index.

Method.name: GetRowHeights
Method.Description: Returns the height (in pixels) of the row specified by its index.

Method.name: GetTabStops
Method.Description: Returns "True" if the focus can be moved to the specified column by the 'Tab' key, otherwise - "False".

Method.name: GridLineWidthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("GridLineWidth") q tmp

Method.name: IniStorageGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("IniStorage") q tmp

Method.name: LeftColGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("LeftCol") q tmp

Method.name: MouseCoord
Method.Description: Converts the specified screen coordinate into corresponding cell indices ($lb(Column,Row)).

Method.name: OnChangeFocusSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChangeFocus=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChangeFocus",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnCheckButtonSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnCheckButton=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnCheckButton",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMScrollBar
Class.Description: Represents a Windows scroll bar for manipulations with scrollable controls and windows.

Property.name: Kind
Property.Description:
Determines, is the scroll bar horizontal (if set to "sbHorizontal") or vertical (if set to "sbVertical").
Set Kind to indicate the orientation of the scrollbar. These are the possible values: "sbHorizontal" "sbVertical"

Property.name: LargeChange
Property.Description: Contains value of the 'Position' property increment or decrement for per-page scrolling.

Property.name: Max
Property.Description: Contains the maximal value of the 'Position' property.

Property.name: Min
Property.Description: Contains the maximal value of the 'Position' property.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the 'Position' property changes.

Property.name: OnScroll
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the scrollbar is scrolled with mouse or keyboard.

Property.name: PageSize
Property.Description: Determines the size of the thumb tab (in pixels).

Property.name: Position
Property.Description: Contains the current scrollbar position.

Property.name: SmallChange
Property.Description: Contains value of the 'Position' property increment or decrement for per-line scrolling.

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Kind") q tmp

Method.name: LargeChangeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("LargeChange") q tmp

Method.name: MaxGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Max") q tmp

Method.name: MinGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Min") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMScrollBox
Class.Description: Represents scrolling area, which may contain other controls, in a window.

Property.name: AutoScroll
Property.Description: Determines, should scrollbars appear automatically when necessary (if set to "True"), or they should be displayed or hidden by setting 'HorzScrollBar' and/or 'VertScrollBar' properties (if set to "False").

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines, should the scrollbox have a border around it. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border
"bsNone" - no border.

Property.name: HorzScrollBar
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMControlScrollBar object used for manipulations with the horizontal scrollbar.

Property.name: VertScrollBar
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMControlScrollBar object used for manipulations with the vertical scrollbar.

Class.name: %Library.TMSeriesMarks
Class.Description: This class allows to control the series marks (text annotations for each series point) appearance.

Property.name: Arrow
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object used to draw lines between the marks and corresponding points.

Property.name: ArrowLength
Property.Description: Determines the length (in pixels) of the lines between the marks and corresponding points. Default value is 16.

Property.name: BackColor
Property.Description: Determines color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for filling marks background.

Property.name: Clip
Property.Description: Determines, should the marks outside the chart region be displayed (if set to "False") or not (if set to "True").

Property.name: Font
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMFont object used to display text annotations.

Property.name: Frame
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object used to draw rectangle around the marks.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines, what information should be displayed in the marks. Possible values:
"smsValue" - the point value (usually vertical, for %TMHorizBarSeries - horizontal);
"smsPercent" - the point value in percent format;
"smsLabel" - the point label;
"smsLabelValue" - the point label followed by the value;
"smsLabelPercent" - the point label followed by the value in percent format;
"smsLegend" - the same information as in the series legend;
"smsPercentTotal" - the point value as percents of total;
"smsLabelPercentTotal" - the point label followed by the value as percents of total;
"smsXValue" - the point horizontal value.

Property.name: Transparent
Property.Description: Determines, should the mark background be filled (if set to "False", default value) or transparent (if set to "True").

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should the marks be shown (if set to "True") or hidden (if set to "False").

Class.name: %Library.TMSeriesPointer
Class.Description: This class allows to control the series pointers (shapes drawn near vertical coordinates of each series points) appearance.

Property.name: Brush
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBrush object used for pointers filling.

Property.name: Draw3D
Property.Description: Determines, should the pointers edges look like shadowed (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: HorizSize
Property.Description: Determines the pointers width (in logical pixels), default value - 4.

Property.name: InflateMargins
Property.Description: Determines, should the axis limits be expanded to display full pointers (if set to "True") or remain unchanged so that pointers near the chart edges will be cut (if set to "False").

Property.name: Pen
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMChartPen object used for drawing shapes outlines.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description: Determines the shape of the pointers. Possible values: "psRectangle" (default value), "psCircle", "psTriangle", "psDownTriangle", "psCross", "psDiagCross" or "psStar".

Property.name: VertSize
Property.Description: Determines the pointers height (in logical pixels), default value - 4.

Property.name: Visible
Property.Description: Determines, should the pointers be shown (if set to "True") or hidden (if set to "False").

Class.name: %Library.TMShape
Class.Description: %TMShape represents a geometric shape that can be drawn on a form.

Property.name: Brush
Property.Description: Specifies the color and pattern used for filling the shape control.

Property.name: Pen
Property.Description: Specifies the pen used to outline the shape control.

Property.name: Shape
Property.Description:
Specifies the shape of the control.
Set Shape to the geometric shape that should be drawn on the form. The Shape property has these possible values:
Value Meaning
stCircle - The shape is a circle.
stEllipse - The shape is an ellipse.
stRectangle - The shape is a rectangle.
stRoundRect - The shape is a rectangle with rounded corners.
stRoundSquare - The shape is a square with rounded corners.
stSquare - The shape is a square.

Class.name: %Library.TMSpeedButton
Class.Description: Represents a button on which graphic images and texts can be arranged and dynamically changed.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description:
Alignment can be one of the following values:
taLeftJustify
Text is left-justified: Lines all begin at the left edge of the control.
taCenter
Text is centered in the control.
taRightJustify
Text is right-justified: Lines all end at the right edge of the control.

Property.name: AllowAllUp
Property.Description: Determines, can all speedbuttons belongind to one radiogroup (having the same 'GroupIndex' property) be unselected (if set to ""True""), or one of the button must be selected (if set to ""False"").

Property.name: Cancel
Property.Description: Determines, should the OnClick event for this button occur when the Escape key is pressed. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: Default
Property.Description: Determines, should the OnClick event for this button occur when the Enter key is pressed and focus is not set on another button. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: DisplayMode
Property.Description: Determines, should the glyph, text caption, or both be displayed at the button face. Possible values: "dmGlyphOnly", "dmTextOnly", or "dmBoth".

Property.name: Down
Property.Description: Contains ""True"" if the button is selected (pressed down), otherwise - ""False""."

Property.name: DropdownAlways
Property.Description: If set to "True", the button always functions in dropdown mode. If set to "False", the mode depends on the 'DropDownMenu' property.

Property.name: DropdownArrow
Property.Description: Determines, should the arrow be displayed when the button is in dropdown mode (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: DropdownArrowWidth
Property.Description: Contains the number of pixels reserved for displaying dropdown arrow (default value is 9).

Property.name: DropdownCombo
Property.Description: If set to "True", the button is splitted into 2 parts: the left part acts like button, the right one - like dropdown list.

Property.name: DropdownMenu
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMPopupMenu object to popup when the button is clicked. If unassigned, the OnClick event occurs.

Property.name: Flat
Property.Description: If set to "False", a 3D border is displayed around the control, so the control looks like lowered or raised. If set to "False", the button looks like flat.

Property.name: Glyph
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBitMap object with one or upto five (according to the value of 'NumGlyphs' property') images to be drawn at the button face. The 1st image corresponds to unselected button state, the 2nd one - to disabled button, the 3rd one - to clicked state, the 4th - to selected (pressed down) state, and the 5th is displayed on mouse over.

Property.name: GlyphMask
Property.Description: Optional, contains oref of %TMBitMap object with monochrome image used as the transparent mask.

Property.name: GroupIndex
Property.Description: Determines, is the button independent (if set to 0), or forms radiogroup together with other buttons with the same value of this property.

Property.name: HelpContext
Property.Description: Contains the context ID of the help system screen related to this speedbutton.

Property.name: HighlightWhenDown
Property.Description: Determines, should the button image be dithered when the button is down (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: ImageIndex
Property.Description: Specifies index of the image in the imagelist, oref of which is contained in the 'Image' property, to be painted at the button face.

Property.name: Images
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMImageList object with collection of images for the button face.

Property.name: Layout
Property.Description:
Specifies the glyph or text caption layout on the button. Possible values:
"blGlyphLeft", "blGlyphRight", "blGlyphTop" or "blGlyphBottom".

Property.name: Margin
Property.Description: Determines the distance (in pixels) between the button edge and glyph or text caption.

Property.name: ModalResult
Property.Description: For modal forms, if the value of this property is not empty, clicking the button closes the form and sets the ModalResult property of the parent form to this value.

Property.name: NoBorder
Property.Description: If set to "True", the value of the 'Flat' property is ignored and border is not displayed.

Property.name: NumGlyphs
Property.Description: Contains number of images in the 'Glyph' bitmap. Possible values are integers from 1 to 5.

Property.name: OldDisabledStyle
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: OnDropdown
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the button in dropdown mode is clicked.

Property.name: OnMouseEnter
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the mouse cursor enters inside the button.

Property.name: OnMouseExit
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the mouse cursor leaves the button.

Property.name: Opaque
Property.Description: Determines, is the button opaque (if set to "True"), or transparent (if set to "False").

Property.name: RepeatDelay
Property.Description: Specifies delay (in milliseconds) between button click and repeating OnClick event.

Property.name: RepeatInterval
Property.Description: Specifies interval (in milliseconds) between sequential OnClick events when the button is pressed and held down longer, than the time specified in the 'RepeatDelay' property.

Property.name: Repeating
Property.Description: If set to "True", the sequence of OnClick events occurs when the button is pressed and held down longer, than the time specified in the 'RepeatDelay' property.

Property.name: ShowBorderWhenInactive
Property.Description: Determines, should the borders of flat buttons be displayed when the application is inactive (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Spacing
Property.Description: Determines the distance (in pixels) between the glyph and the text caption.

Property.name: WordWrap
Property.Description: Determines, should the long text caption be wrapped and displayed in several lines (if set to "True") or displayed in single line (if set to "False").

Class.name: %Library.TMSplitter
Class.Description: Represents a splitter dividing the entire form of panel into 2 resizeable frames. Each frame should contain a single control or panel, one of which (together with splitter itself) must be anchored to the edge, and the second will occupy the rest of the client area.

Property.name: Beveled
Property.Description: Determines, should the splitter to have beveled edges when moved. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas which methods can be used to draw customized graphic control.

Property.name: MinSize
Property.Description: Determines the miminum size (in pixels) which the splitter must leave for neighboring resizeable controls.

Property.name: OnCanResize
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the splitter is about to be moved by mouse.

Property.name: OnMoved
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the splitter dragging is finished.

Property.name: OnPaint
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when it is necessary to paint the splitter, giving opportunity to customize the splitter appearance with methods available through the Canvas property.

Property.name: ResizeStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the action made by moving splitter. Possible values:
"rsNone" - no actions.
"rsLine" - a line simulating the moving splitter is drawn, without actual splitter moving.
"rsUpdate" - default behaviour: the splitter can be dragged by mouse and corresponding controls can be resized.
"rsPattern" - similar to "rsLine", but a pattern is shown instead of line.

Class.name: %Library.TMStatusBar
Class.Description: Represents a row of panels or single panel for output information about the application state.

Property.name: AutoHint
Property.Description: Determines, should the text on the status bar be automatically set to the current hint (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Panels
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMStatusPanels object with collection of panels to be arranged on the status bar.

Property.name: SimplePanel
Property.Description: If set to "True", the status bar consists of a signge panel with text from the 'SimpleText' property. If set to "False", the "Panels" property is used.

Property.name: SimpleText
Property.Description: Specifies the text to be displayed on the status bar if the 'SimplePanel' is set to "True".

Property.name: SizeGrip
Property.Description: Determines, can the status bar be resized by user (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: UseSystemFont
Property.Description: Determines, should the system font be used for text on the status bar (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Class.name: %Library.TMStatusPanel
Class.Description: Represents a single panel of the Windows status bar.

Property.name: Alignment
Property.Description: Detemines horizontal text alignment inside the rectangle aimed for this control. Possible values: "taLeftJustify", "taRightJustify", "taCenter".

Property.name: AutoFit
Property.Description: Determines, should the width of the panel to be increased automatically to display entire text (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Bevel
Property.Description: Determines edges of the control to be bevelled. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb) where only necessary from these strings: ""beLeft"", ""beTop"", ""beRight"" and ""beBottom"" are combined, or $lb() to cancel bevelling.

Property.name: BiDiMode
Property.Description: Specifies the bi-directional mode, controlling the direction in which text appears (left-to-right or right-to-left) and (optional) the default text alignment.

Property.name: DateFormat
Property.Description:
Contains a date format string for panels of "sptDate" and "sptDateTime" types. May contain the following specifiers:
"d" - the day as a number without leading zero;
"dd" - the day as a number with leading zero;
"ddd" - the day of week as 3-characters abbreviation;
"dddd" - the day of week;
"ddddd" - the date in short format;
"dddddd" - the date in long format;
"m" - the month as a number without leading zero;
"mm" - the month as a number with leading zero;
"mmm" - the month as 3-characters abbreviation;
"mmmm" - the full month name;
"yy" - the year as 2-digit number;
"yyyy" - the year as 4-digit number;
"/" - the date separator;
Quoted characters are shown as is.

Property.name: Enabled
Property.Description: Determines, should the panel be enabled (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False"). The only way to output something to disabled panel is 'OnOwnerDraw' handler.

Property.name: GaugeAttrs
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMGaugeAttrs object, allowing the progressmeter customization.

Property.name: Glyph
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMBitMap object with image to be painted on a panel of "sptGlyph" type.

Property.name: Hint
Property.Description: Determines hint text to be shown on this panel.

Property.name: OnClick
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the user clicks on the panel.

Property.name: OnDrawPanel
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a panel of "sptOwnerDraw" type is to be redrawn.

Property.name: OnHintText
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a hint text is retrieved.

Property.name: PanelType
Property.Description:
Determines the type of the panel. Possible values:
"sptNormal" - regular status panel;
"sptCapsLoc" - indicator of caps lock status;
"sptNumLock" - indicator of num lock status;
"sptScrollLock" - indicator of scroll lock status;
"sptDate" - displays current date;
"sptTime" - displays current time;
"sptDateTime" - displays both date and time;
"sptEllipsisText" - replaces end of too long text by '...';
"sptEllipsisPath" - relpaces beginning of too long by '...';
"sptGlyph" - paints "%TMBitMap" image;
"sptGauge" - displays a progressmeter;
"sptOwnerDraw" - draw the panel contents by %TMStatusBar canvas mehtods.

Property.name: ParentBiDiMode
Property.Description: If set to "True", the panel uses its parent Bi-Directional mode, if set to "False" - not.

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Determines a text string to be displayed at the panel.

Property.name: TimeFormat
Property.Description:
Contains a time format string for panels of "sptDate" and "sptDateTime" types. May contain the following specifiers:
"h" - the hours without leading zero;
"hh" - the hours with leading zero;
"n" - the minutes without leading zero (0-59);
"nn" - the minutes with leading zero;
"s" - the seconds without leading zero;
. "ss" - the seconds with leading zero;
"t" - the time in short format;
"tt" - the time in long format;
"am/pm" or "a/p" - use the 12-hour clock;
":" - the time separator;
Quoted characters are shown as is.

Property.name: Width
Property.Description: Specifies the horizontal size of the panel (in pixels).

Class.name: %Library.TMStatusPanels
Class.Description: Represents collection of %TMStatusPanel objects to be displayed as status bar.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: Contains number of items in the collection.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Creates a new %TMStatusPanel instance and adds it to the end of array, returns oref of created item.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,wait s wait=$G(%ZoMRi(2153)) s %ZoMRi(2153)="" s tmp=##class(%TMPersistent).GetObjOref(##this.RunMethod("Add",$lb())) s %ZoMRi(2153)=wait q tmp

Method.name: CountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Count") q tmp

Method.name: GetItem
Method.Description: Returns oref of the collection item specified by its index.

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Creates a new %TMStatusPanel instance and inserts it to specified place of the array, returns oref of the created collection item.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Insert",$lb(Index)) q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMStringGrid
Class.Description: Strings-oriented variation of %TMButtonGrid with slightly reduced set of properties and events.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines the appearance of the grid border. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border (not resizeable).
"bsNone" - no border (not resizeable).
"bsDialog" - usual dialog box border (not resizeable).
"bsSizeable" - usual resizeable border.
"bsToolWindow" - single-line border, smaller caption (not resizeable).
"bsSizeToolWin" - usual resizeable border, smaller caption.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMCanvas object to be used to display owner-drawn items.

Property.name: Col
Property.Description: Determines the index of column containing selected cell. Possible values: integers from 0 to ColCount-1.

Property.name: ColCount
Property.Description: Represents the total number of the grid columns.

Property.name: ColWidths
Property.Description: Contains Cache' list ($lb()) of widths (in pixels) of each grid column.

Property.name: DefaultColWidth
Property.Description: Determines horizontal size (in pixels) for all columns before they are resized.

Property.name: DefaultDrawing
Property.Description: Determines, should the cells be painted automatically (if set to "True") or manually, using the 'DrawCell' method (if set to "False").

Property.name: DefaultRowHeight
Property.Description: Determines vertical size (in pixels) for all rows before they are resized.

Property.name: EditorMode
Property.Description: Determines, is the grid is in the edit mode (user can edit cells values) (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False". Setting this property has no effect if the 'Options' property disables the edit mode toggle.

Property.name: FixedColor
Property.Description: Determines background color (in hexadecimal RGB format) for the fixed cells.

Property.name: FixedCols
Property.Description: Determines the number of fixed (leftmost and non-scrollable) columns in the grid.

Property.name: FixedRows
Property.Description: Determines the number of fixed (topmost and non-scrollable) rows in the grid.

Property.name: GridHeight
Property.Description: Represents the grid client area height (in pixels).

Property.name: GridLineWidth
Property.Description: Determines the thickness of grid line (in pixels, default value is 1).

Property.name: GridWidth
Property.Description: Represents the grid client area width (in pixels).

Property.name: LeftCol
Property.Description: Represents the number of the leftmost visible column of the grid. The columns numeration starts from 0.

Property.name: OnColumnMoved
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the user moved a grid column.

Property.name: OnDrawCell
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a cell needs to be repainted.

Property.name: OnGetEditMask
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the text pattern for inplace editor is retrieved.

Property.name: OnGetEditText
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user starts the cell text editing. Allows to prepare initial text for editing.

Property.name: OnRowMoved
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the user moved a grid row.

Property.name: OnSelectCell
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when another cell has been selected.

Property.name: OnSetEditText
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when user finishes the cell text editing.

Property.name: OnTopLeftChanged
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the grid has been scrolled.

Property.name: Options
Property.Description:
Determines the grid appearance and capabilities. Possible value: Cache list ($lb()) where only necessary from the following strings are combined:
"goFixedVertLine" - draw vertical lines between the fixed (non-scrolling) columns;
"goFixedHorzLine" - draw horizontal lines between the fixed (non-scrolling) rows;
"goVertLine" - draw vertical lines between usual (scrollable) columns;
"goHorzLine" - draw horizontal lines between usual (scrollable) rows;
"goRangeSelect" - allow to select ranges of cells (for read-only grids);
"goDrawFocusSelected" - highlight cells with input focus;
"goRowSizing" - allow to resize separate scrollable rows;
"goColSizing" - allow to resize separate scrollable columns;
"goRowMoving" - allow to move scrollable rows by the mouse;
"goColMoving" - allow to move scrollable columns by the mouse;
"goEditing" - allows to enter edit mode for the cells;
"goTabs" - the 'Tab' and 'Shift-Tab' keys moves focus between the columns;
"goRowSelect" - select entire row rather than single cell;
"goAlwaysShowEditor" - the edit mode is always on;
"goThumbTracking" - update the grid image while the scrollbar thumb is being dragged, do not wait for the thumb release.

Property.name: Row
Property.Description: Determines the index of row containing selected cell. Possible values: integers from 0 to RowCount-1.

Property.name: RowCount
Property.Description: Represents the total number of the grid rows.

Property.name: ScrollBars
Property.Description: Determines, what scrollbars should be shown if there are invisible rows or columns. Possible values: "ssNone", "ssHorizontal", "ssVertical" or "ssBoth".

Property.name: TopRow
Property.Description: Represents index of the topmost visible scrollable row.

Property.name: VisibleColCount
Property.Description: Indicates the number of visible columns (excluding fixed columns).

Property.name: VisibleRowCount
Property.Description: Indicates the number of visible rows (excluding fixed rows).

Method.name: BorderStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BorderStyle") q tmp

Method.name: CellRect
Method.Description: Returns the screen coordinates of the specified cell (in format $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)).

Method.name: GetObjects

Method.name: GetRowHeight

Class.name: %Library.TMStringList
Class.Description: Represents a list of strings. This class is derived from %TMStrings and provides events handlers allowing to respond to strings adding, deleting or modifying.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the contents of the string list has been changed.

Property.name: OnChanging
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately before changing the contents of the string list.

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMStrings
Class.Description: Datatype class representing a collection of text strings and methods to operate with these strings.

Property.name: Capacity
Property.Description: On read: the same as the Count property. On write: no sense.

Property.name: CommaText
Property.Description: Contains all strings in the collection delimited by commas. Inadequate if the total strings size exceeds 32K.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: Represents the number of strings in the collection.

Property.name: Strings
Property.Description: Alias of the Text property.

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Contains all strings in the collection delimited by CRLFs. Inadequate if the total strings size exceeds 32K.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds the specified text string to the end of the collection, returns the index of added string.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Add",$lb(S)) q tmp

Method.name: AddObject
Method.Description: Adds the specified text string with associated object specified by its oref to the end of the collection. Returns the index of added string.

Method.name: AddStrings
Method.Description: Adds all strings (with associated objects, if present) from the specified %TMStrings collection to the end of the current collection.

Method.name: Append
Method.Description: Similar to the Add method, but returns nothing.

Method.name: BeginUpdate
Method.Description: This method is called automatically every time when some method starts to change the strings collection.

Method.name: CapacityGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Capacity") q tmp

Method.name: Clear
Method.Description: Removes all strings from the collection.

Method.name: CommaTextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CommaText") q tmp

Method.name: CountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Count") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Deletes the string specified by its index from the collection. Indexing starts from 0.

Method.name: EndUpdate
Method.Description: This method is called automatically every time when some method completes changing the strings collection.

Method.name: Equals
Method.Description: Returns "True" if the current and specified by its oref collections are identical (disregarding associated objects), or "False" if the collections differ in length, in at least one string, or in the strings order.

Method.name: GetNames
Method.Description: Returns the name part of the string specified by its index, if the string contains a substring like "Name=Value", otherwise - empty string.

Method.name: GetObjects
Method.Description: Returns oref of the object associated with the string specified by its index, if present, otherwise - empty string.

Method.name: GetStrings
Method.Description: Returns the string specified by its index. Possible values of index are integers from 0 to Count-1.

Method.name: GetText
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("GetText",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: GetValues
Method.Description: Returns the value part of the string specified by its index, if the string contains a substring like "Name=Value", otherwise - empty string.

Method.name: IndexOf
Method.Description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified string (case-insencitive!), or -1 if the string not found.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("IndexOf",$lb(S)) q tmp

Method.name: IndexOfName
Method.Description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the string containing a substring like "Name=Value" with specified name part, or -1 if such string not found.

Method.name: IndexOfObject
Method.Description: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the string containing the associated object specified by its oref, or -1 if such string not found.

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Inserts the specified text string at the specified position in the collection.

Method.name: InsertObject
Method.Description: Inserts the specified text string with associated object specified by its oref at the specified position in the collection.

Method.name: LoadFromFile
Method.Description: Adds all strings containg in the specified file to the end of the collection.

Method.name: Move
Method.Description: Changes the position of the specified string (with associated object, if present).

Method.name: SaveToFile
Method.Description: Saves all strings from the collection in the specified file.

Method.name: SetText
Method.Description: Removes all strings from the collection and adds strings from the Text parameter (delimited by CRLF).

Class.name: %Library.TMTabControl
Class.Description: Represents a control with dynamic contents depending on the tab selected.

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas which methods can be used to draw customized tabs and to repaint the page.

Property.name: DisplayRect
Property.Description: Determines rectangle confining client area of the control. Format: $lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom).

Property.name: HotTrack
Property.Description: If set to "True", the tabs under the mouse cursor will be highlighted, otherwise - not.

Property.name: Images
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMImageList object with the images to be displayed on the tabs.

Property.name: MultiLine
Property.Description: If set to "True", the tabs may be displayed in more than one row if necessary. Otherwise, the all tabs may occupy a single row only.

Property.name: MultiSelect
Property.Description: If set to "True" and the Style property contains "tsButtons" or "tsFlatButtons", multiple tabs can be selected, otherwise only one tab can be selected in a time.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when another tab has been selected, giving opportunity to update the control contents.

Property.name: OnChanging
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the currenlty selected tab is about to be switched, giving opportunity to protect it from unwanted switching by setting the AllowChange handler parameter to "False".

Property.name: OnDrawTab
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the tab is about to be displayed and the OwnerDraw property is set to "True", giving opportunity to draw customized tabs.

Property.name: OnGetImageIndex
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the image corresponding to a tab is about to be displayed.

Property.name: OwnerDraw
Property.Description: If set to "True", allows the OnDrawTab event to be raised when a tab is about to be drawn.

Property.name: RaggedRight
Property.Description: Determines, should the tabs rows to be stretched correspondingly with the control width. Possible values: "True" or "False".

Property.name: ScrollOpposite
Property.Description: If set to "True", the value of the TabPosistion property determines the direction in which deselected tabs row must be moved. Otherwise, the deselected row moves to the back of all other rows.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description:
Determines the tabs appearance. Possible values:
"tsTabs" - usual tabs.
"tsButtons" - 3D buttons.
"tsFlatButtons" - flat buttons.

Property.name: TabHeight
Property.Description: Determines the tabs vertical size (in pixels). If set to 0, the tabs height corresponds to there text height.

Property.name: TabIndex
Property.Description: Contains index of selected tab (indexing starts from 0) or -1, if no tab is selected.

Property.name: TabWidth
Property.Description: Determines the tabs horizontal size (in pixels). If set to 0, the tabs height corresponds to there text width.

Property.name: Tabs
Property.Description: Contains oref of the collection of tabs captions as of %TMStrings object.

Class.name: %Library.TMTabSheet
Class.Description: Represents a page of a Windows multipage dialog (see description of the %TMPageControl class).

Property.name: Caption
Property.Description: Represents the label of this page.

Property.name: ClientHeight
Property.Description: Determines the height (in pixels) of the client area.

Property.name: ClientWidth
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels) of the client area.

Property.name: ImageIndex
Property.Description: Contains the index of the tab image in the Images property of the corresponding %TMPageControl class.

Property.name: OnHide
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the page becomes invisible.

Property.name: OnShow
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the page becomes visible again.

Property.name: PageControl
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMPageControl object embedding this page.

Property.name: PageIndex
Property.Description: Determines the index of the page in the corresponging %TMPageControl object. Indexing starts from 0.

Property.name: TabIndex
Property.Description: Determines the position of the page tab in the row of visible tabs in the corresponging %TMPageControl object. Indexing starts from 0.

Property.name: TabVisible
Property.Description: If set to "True", the tab of this page is visible and the page can be selected. Otherwise, the tab is invisible and the TabIndex property contains -1.

Method.name: CaptionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Caption") q tmp
