Class.name: %Library.TMTextAttributes
Class.Description: The set of properties and methods dealing with rich text styles and attributes.

Property.name: Charset
Property.Description: Contains identifier of font character set. Possible values are listed in the %Const.INC.

Property.name: Color
Property.Description: Contains foreground text color (in hexadecimal RGB format).

Property.name: ConsistentAttributes
Property.Description:
Represents the set of text attributes which are the same for all selected text. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb()) where only vaild of the following strings are combined:
"caBold" - all characters are either bold, either regular;
"caColor" - all characters have the same color;
"caFace" - all characters have the same font face;
"caItalic" - all characters are either italic, either non-italic;
"caSize" - all characters have the same size;
"caStrikeout" - all characters have the same or absent strikeout style;
"caUnderline" - all characters are either underlined or not underlined;
"caProtected" - all selected text is either protected or not protected.

Property.name: FontName
Property.Description: Contains name of the font face.

Property.name: Height
Property.Description: Contains the font size in pixels.

Property.name: Pitch
Property.Description:
Specifies the font pitch (fixed or proportional). Possible values:
"fpDefault" - default value for the given font face;
"fpFixed" - fixed characters width;
"fpVariable" - proportional characters widths.

Property.name: Protected
Property.Description: Indicates, may user change the text (if set to "False") or it is protected (if set to "True").

Property.name: Size
Property.Description: Contains the font size in points.

Property.name: Style
Property.Description: Represents the text style (for selection or for cursor position). Possible value: Cache' list ($lb()) where only vaild of the following strings are combined: "fsBold", "fsItalic", "fsUnderline", and "fsStrikeout".

Method.name: CharsetGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Charset") q tmp

Method.name: ColorGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Color") q tmp

Method.name: FontNameGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FontName") q tmp

Method.name: HeightGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Height") q tmp

Method.name: PitchGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Pitch") q tmp

Method.name: ProtectedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Protected") q tmp

Method.name: SizeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Size") q tmp

Method.name: StyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Style") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMTimer
Class.Description: Represents an invisible control enabling timer functions.

Property.name: Enabled
Property.Description: If set to "True" (default value"), the OnTimer event is handled, otherwise ignored.

Property.name: Interval
Property.Description: Determines the time period (in milliseconds) of OnTimer event occuring.

Property.name: OnTimer
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring every time when the period specified in the Interval property elapses.

Property.name: Tag
Property.Description: Arbitrary text associated with this control.

Method.name: EnabledGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Enabled") q tmp

Method.name: IntervalGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Interval") q tmp

Method.name: OnTimerSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnTimer=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnTimer",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMToolbar
Class.Description: Represents server-side image of a Windows toolbar (dockable row of buttons with glyphs).

Property.name: ActivateParent
Property.Description: If set to "True", the parent form is activated when user clicks on the toolbar.

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description:
Determines, will the control have a border around the client area. Possible values:
"bsSingle" - single-line border
"bsNone" - no border.

Property.name: CloseButton
Property.Description: If set to "True", enables 'Close' button ot the floating toolbar, if set to "False" - disables it.

Property.name: CloseButtonWhenDocked
Property.Description: If set to "True", enables 'Close' button ot the docked toolbar, if set to "False" - disables it.

Property.name: DefaultDock
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMDock object to dock the floating toolbar if the 'LastDock' property is not assigned.

Property.name: DockMode
Property.Description:
Possible values:
"dmCanFloat" - toolbar can float or be docked to any dock meeting the 'DockingTo' value. "dmCannotFloat" - toolbar cannot float but can be docked to any dock meeting the 'DockingTo' value. "dmCannotFloatOrChangeDocks" - toolbar cannot leave its current dock.

Property.name: DockPos
Property.Description: If the toolbar is docked, contains the position of toolbar (horizontal or vertical) in pixels.

Property.name: DockRow
Property.Description: Contains the number of row where the toolbar is docked.

Property.name: DockableTo
Property.Description: Contains Cache' list ($lb()) where the possible positions for docking from the following are included: "dpTop", "dpBottom", "dpLeft" and "dpRight".

Property.name: Docked
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the toolbar is docked, or "False" if it floats.

Property.name: DockedTo
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMDock object at which the toolbar is docked.

Property.name: DragHandleStyle
Property.Description: Specifies style for the drag handle og docked toolbar. Possible values: "dhSingle", "dhDouble" or "dhNone".

Property.name: FloatingMode
Property.Description: Determines, should the floating toolbar be on top of tis parent form only (if set to "fmOnTopOfParentForm"), or of all forms of the project (if set to "fmOnTopOfAllForms").

Property.name: FullSize
Property.Description: If set to "True", the toolbar will be automatically expanded to entire width (if docked horizontally) or height (if docked vertically) of the dock.

Property.name: HideWhenInactive
Property.Description: Determines, should the toolbar disappear when application becomes inactive (if set to "True"), or remain visible (if set to "False").

Property.name: LastDock
Property.Description: Contains oref of %TMDock object last used for docking or where the toolbar is currently docked. Overrides value of 'DefaultDock' property.

Property.name: OnClose
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the toolbar is about to be closed.

Property.name: OnCloseQuery
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the 'Close' button is clicked.

Property.name: OnDockChanged
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the dock or floating state change.

Property.name: OnDockChanging
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately before the dock or floating state change.

Property.name: OnDockChangingEx
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the dock, floating state, or 'DockedTo' property change.

Property.name: OnDockChangingHidden
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the toolbar becomes invisible in the process dock changing.

Property.name: OnMove
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the toolbar position is changed.

Property.name: OnRecreated
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the toobar recreation.

Property.name: OnRecreating
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately before the toobar recreation.

Property.name: OnVisibleChanged
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the toobar becomes visible or invisible.

Property.name: ShowCaption
Property.Description: Determines, should the caption bar be displayed for floating toolbar (if set to "True"), or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: UseLastDock
Property.Description: If set to "False", the 'LastDock' property is not work. Default value is "True".

Method.name: ActivateParentGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ActivateParent") q tmp

Method.name: AddDockForm
Method.Description: Adds %TMForm object specified by its oref to the list of forms where the toolbar can be docked to in addition to its parent form.

Method.name: BeginUpdate
Method.Description: Disables controls arrangements, recommended to use before multiple controls moving to avoid flickering.

Method.name: BorderStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("BorderStyle") q tmp

Method.name: CloseButtonGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("CloseButton") q tmp

Method.name: DefaultDockSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%DefaultDock=Value s tmp=$s(Value:Value.Address,1:0) d ##this.SetProperty("DefaultDock",tmp) q $$$OK

Method.name: DockModeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DockMode") q tmp

Method.name: DockPosGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DockPos") q tmp

Method.name: DockRowGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DockRow") q tmp

Method.name: DockableToGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DockableTo") q tmp

Method.name: DockedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Docked") q tmp

Method.name: DockedToSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%DockedTo=Value s tmp=$s(Value'=$$$NULLOREF:Value.Address,1:0) d ##this.SetProperty("DockedTo",tmp) q $$$OK

Method.name: DragHandleStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("DragHandleStyle") q tmp

Method.name: EndUpdate
Method.Description: Re-enables controls arrangements after BeginUpdate call.

Method.name: FloatingModeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FloatingMode") q tmp

Method.name: FullSizeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("FullSize") q tmp

Method.name: OnCloseQuerySet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnCloseQuery=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnCloseQuery",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnCloseSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnClose=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnClose",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnDockChangedSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDockChanged=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDockChanged",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnDockChangingExSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDockChangingEx=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDockChangingEx",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnDockChangingHiddenSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDockChangingHidden=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDockChangingHidden",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnDockChangingSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnDockChanging=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnDockChanging",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnMoveSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnMove=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnMove",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnRecreatedSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnRecreated=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnRecreated",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnRecreatingSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnRecreating=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnRecreating",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OnVisibleChangedSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnVisibleChanged=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnVisibleChanged",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: RemoveDockForm
Method.Description: Removes %TMForm object specified by its oref from the list of forms where the toolbar can be docked to.

Method.name: SetSlaveControl
Method.Description: Assigns the top/bottom-docked and the left/right-docked version of a control on the toolbar.

Method.name: ShowCaptionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ShowCaption") q tmp

Method.name: UseLastDockGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("UseLastDock") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMToolbarSep
Class.Description: Enables a separator between groups of buttons on the parent toolbar.

Property.name: Blank
Property.Description: Determines, should the separator be beveled (if set to "False") or look like blank space (if set to "True").

Property.name: SizeHorz
Property.Description: The width (in pixels) of separator for horizontally docked toolbar. Default value is 6.

Property.name: SizeVert
Property.Description: The height (in pixels) of separator for vertically docked toolbar. Default value is 6.

Method.name: BlankGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Blank") q tmp

Method.name: SizeHorzGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SizeHorz") q tmp

Method.name: SizeVertGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SizeVert") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMTrackBar
Class.Description: Represents the server-side image of a Windows trackbar (bar with moving slider).

Property.name: Frequency
Property.Description: Determines the distance between tick marks (in logical units).

Property.name: LineSize
Property.Description: Contains the slider shift (in ticks) for left and right arrows keystrokes. Up and down keystrikes increment and decrement this property value.

Property.name: Max
Property.Description: Contain the maximal value of the 'Position' property.

Property.name: Min
Property.Description: Contain the minimal value of the 'Position' property.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a user has moved the slider.

Property.name: Orientation
Property.Description: Determines, should be the trackbar be horizontal (if set to "trHorizontal") or vertical (if set to "trVertical").

Property.name: PageSize
Property.Description: Contains the slider shift (in ticks) for PgUp and PgDn keystrokes.

Property.name: Position
Property.Description: Contains the current value represented by the trackbar, this value corresponds to the slider position.

Property.name: SelEnd
Property.Description: Contains the ending point of selected range. The value of 'Position' must belong to the selected range.

Property.name: SelStart
Property.Description: Contains the starting point of selected range. The value of 'Position' must belong to the selected range.

Property.name: SliderVisible
Property.Description: Determines, should the slider be visible (if set to "True") or hidden (if set to "False").

Property.name: ThumbLength
Property.Description: Represents the size of the slider (in pixels).

Property.name: TickMarks
Property.Description:
Specifies the place for tick marks. Possible values:
"tmBottomRight" - bottom (for horizontal trackbar) or right (for vertical trackbar) side of the trackbar;
"tmTopLeft" - top (for horizontal trackbar) or left (for vertical trackbar) side of the trackbar;
"tmBoth" - both sides of the trackbar.

Property.name: TickStyle
Property.Description:
Specifies, how should be tick marks set. Possible values:
"tsAuto" - automatically, according to the value of 'Frequncy' property.
"tsManual" - at the 'Min' and 'Max' values - automatically, other - from the 'SetTick' method. "tsNone" - no tick marks.

Method.name: FrequencyGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Frequency") q tmp

Method.name: LineSizeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("LineSize") q tmp

Method.name: MaxGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Max") q tmp

Method.name: MinGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Min") q tmp

Method.name: OnChangeSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%OnChange=Value d ##this.SetEvent("OnChange",$lg(Value,1),$lg(Value,2)) q $$$OK

Method.name: OrientationGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Orientation") q tmp

Method.name: PageSizeGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("PageSize") q tmp

Method.name: PositionGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Position") q tmp

Method.name: SelEndGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SelEnd") q tmp

Method.name: SelStartGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SelStart") q tmp

Method.name: SetTick
Method.Description: Creates a tick mark at a specified position of the trackbar.

Method.name: SliderVisibleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SliderVisible") q tmp

Method.name: ThumbLengthGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ThumbLength") q tmp

Method.name: TickMarksGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TickMarks") q tmp

Method.name: TickStyleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("TickStyle") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMTreeNode
Class.Description: Represents a single element of a hierarchical items collection (%TMTreeNodes).

Property.name: AbsoluteIndex
Property.Description: Determines the absolute node position in the tree view.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: Contains the number of next-level subnodes for this node.

Property.name: Cut
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the node is marked for 'Cut' operation, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: Data
Property.Description: Contains the data associated with the node.

Property.name: Deleting
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the Delete method for this node has been invoked, put the node has not been actually deleted yet.

Property.name: DropTarget
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the node is marked as a drag-and-drop target, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: Expanded
Property.Description: Containes "True" if the node is expanded or "False" if it is collapsed.

Property.name: Focused
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the node has a focus, otherwise - "False". If the application sets this property to "True" for one node, it must enable this property to be "False" for all other nodes in the tree view.

Property.name: HasChildren
Property.Description: Containes "True" if the node has at least one subnode, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: ImageIndex
Property.Description: Determines the index of the image associated with this item in the tree view Images property.

Property.name: Index
Property.Description: Determines the index of the node in the %TMTreeNodes collection.

Property.name: IsVisible
Property.Description: Contains "True" if the node has no parent or all its parents are expanded, or "False" if some of its parents is collapsed, so the node is invisible.

Property.name: Level
Property.Description: Contains the level of the node. The top-level nodes have Level equal to 0.

Property.name: Owner
Property.Description: Contains oref of the %TMTreeNodes collection embedding this node.

Property.name: ParentNode
Property.Description: Contains oref of the parent for this node.

Property.name: Selected
Property.Description: Contains "True" if this node is selected, otherwise - "False".

Property.name: SelectedIndex
Property.Description: Contains the index of the selected node. Indexing starts from 0.

Property.name: StateIndex
Property.Description: Determines the index of the overlay image associated with this item in the tree view StateImages property.

Property.name: Text
Property.Description: Contains the text label of the node.

Property.name: TreeView
Property.Description: Contains oref of the tree view containing this node.

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" s %SMWOrefs(+##this)=##this") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMPersistent") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMPersistent") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMPersistent)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: AbsoluteIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AbsoluteIndex") q tmp

Method.name: AlphaSort
Method.Description: Sorts the subnodes of this node in accordance with the value of the SortType property and OnCompare event handler. Returns "True" if successful, or "False" if failed.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AlphaSort",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: Collapse
Method.Description: Collapses a node, hiding all its subnodes and displaying the '+' button (if ShowButtons property is set to "True").

Method.name: CountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Count") q tmp

Method.name: CutGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Cut") q tmp

Method.name: DataGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Data") q tmp

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Deletes the node with all its subnodes.

Method.name: DeleteChildren
Method.Description: Deletes all subnodes of this node.

Method.name: DeletingGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Deleting") q tmp

Method.name: DisplayRect
Method.Description:
Returns the coordinates of the rectangle ($lb(Left,Top,Right,Bottom)) confining the item. The value of the TextOnly parameter determines, what part of the item the rectangle confines. Possible values:
"True" - the node label only.
"False" - entire line occupied by the node in the tree view.

Method.name: EditText
Method.Description: Puts a single-line editor at the place of the node label and raises the OnEditing event.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("EditText",$lb()) q tmp

Method.name: EndEdit
Method.Description: Terminates the mode turned on by the EditText method call, saving changes and arising the OnEdited event if the Cancel parameter is "False", or discarding changes if Cancel equals to "True".

Method.name: Expand
Method.Description: Expands the node, showing the next-level subnodes and displaying the '-' button (if ShowButtons property is set to "True").

Method.name: ExpandedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Expanded") q tmp

Method.name: FocusedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Focused") q tmp

Method.name: GetFirstChild
Method.Description: Returns oref of the first subnode of the item, or empty string, if the item has no subnodes.

Method.name: GetLastChild
Method.Description: Returns oref of the last next-level subnode of the item, or empty string, if the item has no subnodes.

Method.name: GetNext
Method.Description: Returns oref of the next node after the current one (including invisible), or empty string if the current node is the last node in the tree view.

Method.name: GetNextChild
Method.Description: Returns oref of the next subnode after the specified one (including invisible), or empty string if the specified subnode is the last child of the current node.

Method.name: GetNextSibling
Method.Description: Returns oref of the next node after the current one (including invisible) from the same level as the current node belongs, or empty string if the current node is the last node in this level.

Method.name: GetNextVisible
Method.Description: Returns oref of the next node after the current one (excluding invisible), or empty string if the current node is the last visible node in the tree view.

Method.name: GetPrev
Method.Description: Returns oref of the previous node before the current one (including invisible), or empty string if the current node is the first node in the tree view.

Method.name: GetPrevChild
Method.Description: Returns oref of the previous subnode before the specified one (including invisible), or empty string if the specified subnode is the first child of the current node.

Method.name: GetPrevSibling
Method.Description: Returns oref of the previous node before the current one (including invisible) from the same level as the current node belongs, or empty string if the current node is the first node in this level.

Method.name: GetPrevVisible
Method.Description: Returns oref of the previous node before the current one (excluding invisible), or empty string if the current node is the first node in the tree view.

Method.name: HasAsParent
Method.Description: Returns "True" if the node specified by the Value parameter is a parent node for the current node, otherwise - "False"

Method.name: HasChildrenGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HasChildren") q tmp

Method.name: ImageIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ImageIndex") q tmp

Method.name: IndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Index") q tmp

Method.name: IndexOf
Method.Description: Returns the index of the next-level subnode specified by its oref, or -1 if the parameter value is not oref of immediate subnode.

Method.name: IsVisibleGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("IsVisible") q tmp

Method.name: LevelGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Level") q tmp

Method.name: MakeVisible
Method.Description: Expands all parents of the node, making the node visible.

Method.name: MoveTo
Method.Description:
Moves the current node to the Destination node specified by its oref. The possible values of the Mode parameter:
"naAdd" - the moved node becomes the last node in the collection.
"naAddFirst" - the moved node becomes the first node in the collection.
"naAddChild" - the moved node becomes the last subnode of the Destination.
"naAddChildFirst" - the moved node becomes the first subnode of the Destination.
"naInsert" - the moved node becomes the next node after the Destination.

Method.name: OverlayIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("OverlayIndex") q tmp

Method.name: SelectedGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Selected") q tmp

Method.name: SelectedIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("SelectedIndex") q tmp

Method.name: StateIndexGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("StateIndex") q tmp

Method.name: TextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Text") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMTreeNodes
Class.Description: Represents the collection of nodes included into a tree view as its Items property.

Property.name: Count
Property.Description: Read only, contains the number of items in the collection.

Property.name: Owner
Property.Description: Read only, contains oref of the %TMTreeView object that is owner of this collection.

Method.name: Add
Method.Description: Adds a new node to the collection at the same level as the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("Add",$lb(tmp,S,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: AddChild
Method.Description: Adds a new node to the collection at a subnode of the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("AddChild",$lb(tmp,S,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: AddChildFirst
Method.Description: Adds a new node to the collection at the first subnode of the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s tmp.Address=##this.RunMethod("AddChildFirst",$lb(tmp,S,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: AddChildObject
Method.Description: Adds a new node with data to the collection at a subnode of the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter. The data are determined by the value of Ptr.Data.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("AddChildObject",$lb(tmp,S,Ptr,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: AddChildObjectFirst
Method.Description: Adds a new node with data to the collection at the first subnode of the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter. The data are determined by the value of Ptr.Data.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("AddChildObjectFirst",$lb(tmp,S,Ptr,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: AddFirst
Method.Description: Adds a new node to the collection as the first node at the same level as the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("AddFirst",$lb(tmp,S,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: AddObject
Method.Description: Adds a new node with data to the collection at the same level as the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter. The data are determined by the value of Ptr.Data.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("AddObject",$lb(tmp,S,Ptr,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: AddObjectFirst
Method.Description: Adds a new node with data to the collection as the first node at the same level as the Node specified by its oref. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter. The data are determined by the value of Ptr.Data.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("AddObjectFirst",$lb(tmp,S,Ptr,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: BeginUpdate
Method.Description: Postpones repainting the node until the EndUpdate method call.

Method.name: Clear
Method.Description: Deletes all nodes from the collection.

Method.name: CountGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Count") q tmp

Method.name: CountSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%Count=Value d ##this.SetProperty("Count",Value) q $$$OK

Method.name: Delete
Method.Description: Removes the node specified by its oref from the collection and updates the list view, if necessary.Removes a node from the tree view. Delete removes a tree node in the tree view specified by the Node parameter.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp="" i Node'="" s tmp=Node.Address s tmp=##this.RunMethod("Delete",$lb(tmp)) q

Method.name: EndUpdate
Method.Description: Allows the changes postponed after the BeginUpdate method call to be reflected on the screen.

Method.name: GetFirstNode
Method.Description: Returns oref of the first node in the collection.

Method.name: GetItems
Method.Description: Returns oref of the node specified by the Index parameter, or empty string if there is no such node. Possible values of Index: integers from 0 to Count-1.

Method.name: Insert
Method.Description: Inserts a new node to the collection before the Node specified by its oref, at the same level as it. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("Insert",$lb(tmp,S,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: InsertObject
Method.Description: Inserts a new node with data to the collection before the Node specified by its oref, at the same level as it. Returns oref of added node or empty string, if creation of new instance of %TMTreeNode failed. The text label of the new node is determined by the S parameter. The data are determined by the value of Ptr.Data.
Method.Implementation: n tmp,ret s tmp="" i +Node'=0 s tmp=Node.Address s ret=##class(%TMTreeNode).%New($lb(##this,1)) s ret.Address=##this.RunMethod("InsertObject",$lb(tmp,S,Ptr,+ret)) q ret

Method.name: OwnerSet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s i%Owner=Value d ##this.SetProperty("Owner",+Value) q $$$OK

Class.name: %Library.TMTreeView
Class.Description: Represents a hierarchical list of items, showing them as nodes which may be expanded and collapsed.

Property.name: AutoExpand
Property.Description: If set to "True", the selected nodes will be automatically expanded, and deselected nodes be collapsed. If set to "False", selection will not affect on the nodes expanding and collapsing.

Property.name: AutoSize
Property.Description: If set to "True", the control may size itself automatically. Default value is "False".

Property.name: BorderStyle
Property.Description: Determines, should the control have a single-line border (if set to "bsSingle") or not (if set to "bsNone").

Property.name: Canvas
Property.Description: Contains oref of canvas which may be used for drawing on the tree view control from the OnCustomDraw and OnCustomDrawItem events handlers.

Property.name: ChangeDelay
Property.Description: Determines the time when the OnChange event should occur (in milliseconds after the node selection).

Property.name: DropTarget
Property.Description: Determines oref of the node serving as a drag-and-drop target.

Property.name: HideSelection
Property.Description: Determines, does selected node remain marked as selected when the control loses focus (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: HotTrack
Property.Description: Determines, should the nodes be highlighted when mouse cursor moves over them (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: Images
Property.Description: Contains oref of the image list with bitmaps to be displayed near every node in the tree view. Nodes and images are associated by the values of the ImageIndex properties of nodes.

Property.name: Indent
Property.Description: Determines the horizontal shift (in pixels) between parent and child nodes when expanding.

Property.name: Items
Property.Description: Contains oref of the tree nodes collection associated with this tree view.

Property.name: OnChange
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when any node in the tree view has been changed.

Property.name: OnChanging
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when any node in the tree view is being changed.

Property.name: OnCollapsed
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the node in the tree view has been collapsed.

Property.name: OnCollapsing
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the node in the tree view is being collapsed.

Property.name: OnCompare
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the AlphaSort method compares two nodes.

Property.name: OnCustomDraw
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before the tree view nodes are to be painted.

Property.name: OnCustomDrawItem
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before a node is to be painted, giving opportunity to draw something on the tree view canvas.

Property.name: OnDeletion
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when a node is about to be removed from the tree view.

Property.name: OnEdited
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring immediately after the label of a node has been edited.

Property.name: OnEditing
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the label of a node is being edited.

Property.name: OnExpanded
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the node in the tree view has been expanded.

Property.name: OnExpanding
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the node in the tree view is being expanded.

Property.name: OnGetImageIndex
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring just before a node is to be displayed, giving the opportunity to assign ImageIndex to this node. The ImageIndex will be used to associate images and nodes.

Property.name: OnGetSelectedIndex
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the SelectedIndex property of a node is retrieved, giving opportunity to change the selected image index.

Property.name: ReadOnly
Property.Description: Determines, can the tree view contents be edited by user (if set to "False") or not (if set to "True").

Property.name: RightClickSelect
Property.Description:
If set to "True", both left and right mouse click select nodes, otherwise, only left mouse click selects nodes.
Note: the nodes selected by the right mouse click will not be highlighted automatically.

Property.name: RowSelect
Property.Description: Determines, will the entire row containing selected node be highlighted (if set to "True") or the node itself only (if set to "False").

Property.name: ScalingFlags
Property.Description: For internal use.

Property.name: Selected
Property.Description: Contains oref of the first selected node, or empty string if no nodes are selected.

Property.name: ShowButtons
Property.Description: Determines, should the '+' and '-' buttons allowing to expand/collapse nodes be displayed near every node (if set to "True") of not (if set to "False").

Property.name: ShowLines
Property.Description: Determines, should the lines connecting parent nodes with their child nodes (if set to "True") be shown or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: ShowRoot
Property.Description: Determines, should the lines connecting first-level nodes with the common root be displayed (if both this property and ShowLines are set to "True") or not (if any of them is set to "False").

Property.name: SortType
Property.Description:
Detemines the sorting mode for the AlphaSort method. Possible values:
"stNone" - no sorting.
"stData" - sort in accordance with the values of nodes Data property (only if OnCompare handler is assigned).
"stText" - sort in accordance with the nodes labels.
"stBoth" - combines two previous modes.

Property.name: StateImages
Property.Description: Contains oref of the additional image list with bitmaps to be displayed near every node in the tree view. Nodes and images are associated by the values of the StateIndex properties of nodes.

Property.name: ToolTips
Property.Description: Determines, should nodes have tooltips with text specified by the value of their Hint properties (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: TopItem
Property.Description: Represents the topmost visible node of the tree view.

Method.name: %OnClose
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnClose()") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnClose()") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" q:initvalue="""" $$$OK") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" d ..%OnNew(initvalue)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" d ##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.%OnNew(initvalue)") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Canvas.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Canvas=##class(%TMCanvas).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Canvas""))") $$$GENERATE(" d ..Items.%Close()") $$$GENERATE(" s ..Items=##class(%TMTreeNodes).%New($lb(..Address,0,""Items""))") $$$GENERATE(" q $$$OK") q $$$OK

Method.name: AlphaSort
Method.Description: Sorts the nodes in the tree view, in accordance with the value of the SortType property and OnCompare event handler. Returns "True" if successful, or "False" if failed.
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("AlphaSort",$lb()) q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AutoExpand") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("AutoSize") q tmp

Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ChangeDelay") q tmp

Method.name: FullCollapse
Method.Description: Hides all nodes at the levels higher than the first one.

Method.name: GetBindString
Method.Implementation: s %code=0 $$$GENERATE(" n result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=""""") i $p($$GetVersion^%apiOBJ()," ",4)<4 d . $$$GENERATE(" #classcontext %TMWinControl") . $$$GENERATE(" s result=..GetBindString(Parent)") . $$$GENERATE(" #endclasscontext %TMWinControl") e $$$GENERATE(" s result=##class(=%TMWinControl)##this.GetBindString(Parent)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Canvas.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Canvas,""Canvas"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" s result=result_..Items.GetBindString(##this)") $$$GENERATE(" s result=$lb(+##this,+..Items,""Items"","""")_result") $$$GENERATE(" q result") q $$$OK

Method.name: GetHitTestInfoAt
Method.Description:
Returns Cache' list ($lb) where only strings actual for the specified point are combined. Possible strings:
"htAbove" - to top from the control.
"htBelow" - to bottom the control.
"htNowhere" - not on any item, though inside the control.
"htOnItem" - on an item.
"htOnButton" - on a button.
"htOnIcon" - on an icon.
"htOnIndent" - on an indent.
"htOnLabel" - on a label.
"htOnRight" - on the right side.
"htOnStateIcon" - on a state icon.
"htToLeft" - to left from the control.
"htToRight" - to right from the control.

Method.name: GetNodeAt
Method.Description: Returns oref of the node at the specified position, or empty string if there are no nodes at this position.

Method.Description: Returns "True" if any node label is being edited, otherwise "False".
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.RunMethod("IsEditing",$lb()) q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMView3DOptions
Class.Description: This class allows to control the 3D series images appearance.

Property.name: Elevation
Property.Description: Determines angle of rotation (in degrees) turning the top of the chart toward the viewer.

Property.name: HorizOffset
Property.Description: Determines the horizontal offset of the chart (positive - to right, negative - to left).

Property.name: Orthogonal
Property.Description: Determines, should the 3D canvas be used (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False"). If set to "False", the 'Elevation' and 'Rotation' properties do nothing.

Property.name: Rotation
Property.Description: Determines angle of rotation (in degrees) turning the right side of the chart toward the viewer.

Property.name: Tilt
Property.Description: Determines angle of rotation (in degrees) in the chart plane.

Property.name: VertOffset
Property.Description: Determines the vertical offset of the chart (positive - downward, negative - upward).

Property.name: Zoom
Property.Description: Determines the zooming factor for the chart (in percents, default value is 100).

Method.name: ElevationGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Elevation") q tmp

Method.name: HorizOffsetGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("HorizOffset") q tmp

Method.name: OrthogonalGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Orthogonal") q tmp

Method.name: PerspectiveGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Perspective") q tmp

Method.name: RotationGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Rotation") q tmp

Method.name: TiltGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Tilt") q tmp

Method.name: VertOffsetGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("VertOffset") q tmp

Method.name: ZoomGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("Zoom") q tmp

Method.name: ZoomTextGet
Method.Implementation: n tmp s tmp=##this.GetProperty("ZoomText") q tmp

Class.name: %Library.TMWinControl
Class.Description: The base class for all windowed (able to have focus) controls.

Property.name: BevelEdges
Property.Description: Determines edges of the control to be bevelled. Possible value: Cache' list ($lb) where only necessary from these strings: "beLeft", "beTop", "beRight" and "beBottom" are combined, or $lb() to cancel bevelling.

Property.name: BevelInner
Property.Description: Determines the appearance of inner bevel. Possible values: "bvNone", "bvLowered", "bvRaised" or "bvSpace".

Property.name: BevelKind
Property.Description: Determines the sharpness of the bevel. Possible values: "bkNone", "bkTile", "bkSoft" or "bkFlat".

Property.name: BevelOuter
Property.Description: Determines the appearance of outer bevel. Possible values: "bvNone", "bvLowered", "bvRaised" or "bvSpace".

Property.name: BevelWidth
Property.Description: Determines the width (in pixels), of the bevels.

Property.name: BorderWidth
Property.Description: Determines the border width (in pixels) of the control. No other controls can overlap the border.

Property.name: Brush
Property.Description: Oref of the %TMBrush object describing the color and style of the control background. Read only.

Property.name: ControlCount
Property.Description: Represents the number of child controls of this control. Read only.

Property.name: Ctl3D
Property.Description: Determines, has the control 3-D (if set to "True", default value) or flat (if set to "False") appearance. Direct change of this property sets the ParentCtl3D property to "False" automatically.

Property.name: DockSite
Property.Description: Determines, can the control be a target for drag-and-drop operations (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: HelpContext
Property.Description: Determines the context number of the screen in the help system, corresponding to the control. If set to 0, parent's HelpContext will be used.

Property.name: ImeMode
Property.Description: Represents the current mode of an Input Method Editor (IME).

Parameter.name: VALUELIST
Parameter.value: ,imDisable,imClose,imOpen, imDontCare, imSAlpha, imAlpha, imHira, imSKata, imKata, imChinese, imSHanguel, imHanguel

Property.name: ImeName
Property.Description: Specifies the input method editor (IME) to use for converting keyboard input to Asian language characters.

Property.name: OnDockDrop
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when another control is docked to the control.

Property.name: OnDockOver
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring whether control acceptable for docking is dragged over the current control.

Property.name: OnEnter
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control becomes active.

Property.name: OnExit
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the control loses focus.

Property.name: OnGetSiteInfo
Property.Description: Currently not supported.

Property.name: OnKeyDown
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring if the key is pressed when the control is active.

Property.name: OnKeyPress
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring if the single-character key is pressed when the control is active.

Property.name: OnKeyUp
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring if the key pressed when the control was active, is released.

Property.name: OnMouseWheel
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the mouse wheel is rotated when the control is active.

Property.name: OnMouseWheelDown
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the mouse wheel is rotated downward when the control is active.

Property.name: OnMouseWheelUp
Property.Description: Handler of event occuring when the mouse wheel is rotated upward when the control is active.

Property.name: ParentCtl3D
Property.Description: Determines, does the parents Ctl3D property affect on the control appearance (if set to "True") or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: TabOrder
Property.Description: Determines the position of the control in the tab sequence.

Property.name: TabStop
Property.Description: Determines, is it possible to set focus on this control using the Tab key (if set to "True", default value) or not (if set to "False").

Property.name: UseDockManager
Property.Description: Currently not supported.

Property.name: WheelAccumulator
Property.Description: Indicates, how much the mouse wheel has been rotated.

Export.Routine:
; Color constants (Some duplications) using RGB color scheme. Three byte constant, each byte value range 0-FF. First byte is Blue value, second is Green value third is Red value. ; These bytes are swapped by the $ZH function to give RGB. The total number of available colors is 16777216. #define STARTBINDING ##continue n SMWCStr,SMWCLParentAddress,SMWCIndex ##continue s SMWCStr="",SMWCIndex=1 ##continue s SMWCLParentAddress=$s(initvalue="":0,1:$lg(initvalue,2,0))
#define CREATECONTROL(%classname,%controlname,%parentname,%parentaddress,%createcontrol) ##continue #if %createcontrol=1 ##continue s %controlname=##class(%classname).%New("") ##continue #endif ##continue s:($l($g(SMWCStr(SMWCIndex)))>=32000) SMWCIndex=$I(SMWCIndex) ##continue s SMWCStr(SMWCIndex)=$g(SMWCStr(SMWCIndex))_##class(%TMPersistent).CreateControl(%controlname,%parentname,%parentaddress)
#define FINISHBINDING ##continue n i,k,SMWCCommand,SMWCClearList,SMWCControl ##continue f k=1:1:SMWCIndex d ##continue . s SMWCClearList=(k=1) ##continue . s SMWCCommand=$$CallBack^%ZMRASD($lb("cac",SMWCClearList,SMWCStr(k))) ##continue . f i=1:3:$ll(SMWCCommand) d ##continue . . s SMWCControl=##class(%TMPersistent).GetObjOref($lg(SMWCCommand,i)) ##continue . . d SMWCControl.Bind($lg(SMWCCommand,i+1,0),$lg(SMWCCommand,i+2,0))

; ZMRPMD simple (or sample) user authentification routines ; Write your own if you wish! ; Use the following command to start ZMRPMD with this package: ; d START^%ZMRPMD(60,"CHKUSR^%ZMRAUTH") ; CHKUSR(user,pass,nspace,appl) ; -------------------------- s I=$ZU(111,0) s ip=$p($A(I,1)_"."_$A(I,2)_"."_$A(I,3)_"."_$A(I,4)_"_"_($A(I,5)*256+$A(I,6)),":",1) s HashPwd="" if pass'="" F ix489=1:1:7 S HashPwd=HashPwd_$ZCRC(pass,ix489) s ^%ZMRSysUser(ip)=$LB(user,HashPwd,nspace,appl,ip,$p($h,",",1),$p($h,",",2)) ; -------------------------- n str,u,p,c,n,a,res,passfile s passfile=$$GetPassF() o passfile:("R"):5 e q 0 ; can not open password file s $ZT="eof",res=-1 u passfile:0 f d q:res'<0 . r str s u=$P(str,":"),p=$P(str,":",2),n=$P(str,":",3),a=$P(str,":",4) . i u=user s res=0 d:p=$$crypt(pass,+p) q . . i n="" s res=1 . . e f c=1:1:$L(n,";") i $P(n,";",c)=nspace s res=1 q . . q:(a="")!'res . . s res=0 f c=1:1:$L(a,";") i $P(a,";",c)=appl s res=1 q eof c passfile q res>0 ; ; Use this routine to create and update password file ; ADDUSR n bakf,str,fr,user,pass,nspace,apps,passfile r "Username: ",user f d q:pass=str . w !,"Password: " s pass="",str="" . f r *fr q:(fr=10)!(fr=13) w *8,"*" s pass=pass_$C(fr) . w !,"Repeat password: " . f r *fr q:(fr=10)!(fr=13) w *8,"*" s str=str_$C(fr) . w:pass'=str !,"Sorry, passwords do not match...",! w !,"Enter Namespace (or Namespaces delimited by semicolons)" w !," or just press ""Enter"" to allow any namespace: " r nspace w !,"Enter Application (or Applications delimited by semicolons)" w !," or just press ""Enter"" to allow any application: " r apps s passfile=$$GetPassF(),bakf=passfile_"-b" o passfile:("R"):2 e o passfile:("WN"):2 g:$T eof2 e w "Can not create password file",! q o bakf:("WN"):2 e w "Can not create backup file",! q s $ZT="eof1",fr=1 f d . i fr u passfile:0 ; first read from 0 position . e u passfile ; subsequent reads from current position . r str i fr u bakf:0 s fr=0 . e u bakf . w str,! eof1 u 0 c passfile,bakf o passfile:("WN"):5 e w "Can not write in password file",! q o bakf:("R"):5 e w "Backup file lost",! q s $ZT="eof2",fr=1 f d . i fr u bakf:0 . e u bakf . r str i fr u passfile:0 s fr=0 . e u passfile . w:user'=$P(str,":") str,! eof2 u passfile w user,":",$$crypt(pass),":",$ZCVT(nspace,"U"),":",apps,! u 0 c passfile,bakf q ; GetPassF(fname) ; Not write-protected, but portable default place for password file q $G(fname,$ZU(12)_"passwd") ; crypt(pass,salt) ; It is not DES crypt, it is much worse :-( n URANDm,URANDm2,URANDia,URANDic,URANDmc,k,ss,pp,str,i,j,lp,ls,rc s URANDm=0,URANDm2=0,URANDia=0,URANDic=0,URANDmc=0 s:$G(pass,"")="" pass=$C(255) s salt=$G(salt,$R(4096)+1024),ss=2048+salt,pp=ss+128,lp=$L(pass) f i=1:1:lp s pp=pp*96+$A($E(pass,i,i))-31 f i=1:1:ss s pp=$$urand(pp,31) s str="MAKOVACONSUL",k=salt_"$",ls=$L(str) f i=1:1:ls d . s rc=pp\256+$A($E(str,i,i))#62 . i rc<10 s ss=48+rc . e i rc<36 s ss=55+rc . e s ss=61+rc . s k=k_$C(ss) . f j=1:1:rc+$A($E(pass,ss#lp+1,ss#lp+1)) s pp=$$urand(pp,31) q k ; urand(y,p) ; Random numbers from 0 to 2**p-1 generator ; For proper work define URANDm,URANDm2,URANDia,URANDic,URANDmc ; in the calling routine and initialize URANDm with 0. d:+URANDm=0 . s URANDm=2**p,URANDm2=URANDm/2 . s URANDia=8*(URANDm2*$ZPI\32)+5,URANDic=2*(URANDm2*(1-($ZSQR(3)/3))\2)+1 . s URANDmc=URANDm-URANDic s y=y*URANDia+URANDic s:y'<URANDm y=y#URANDm q y

ZMREVENT(ServID) ; ZMRPMD events handlers q:'$D(ServID) ; ServID - index variable with information about event ; ServID=1 - ZMRPMD started i ServID=1 k $$$DBINF d GarbColl s $$$PORTS(0)=0 ; ServID=2 - ZMRPMD halted e i ServID=2 s $ET="" d GarbColl ; ServID=3 - JOB started ; ServID(1) - TCP port used by JOB e i ServID=3 d . h:('$D($$$PORTS))!$D($$$PORTS(-1)) ; shutdown in progress, no new jobs . d MarkPort(ServID(1)) ; ServID=4 - JOB finished e i ServID=4 d FreePort() s $ET="" h ; ServID>4 - reserved for extensions q:$Q "" q ; GarbColl n i,ix,iy,ns,c,nn,host,l,nethard k $$$PORTS,$$$AS,$$$MSGS ; remove our ZMRINS* routines from all namespaces s l=$L("ZMRINS"),host=$ZCVT($ZU(110),"U") s host=$TR(host,$TR(host,"ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789")) s ns=$ZU(5),nethard=$ZU(68,27) f i=1:1:$ZU(90,0) s:$l($ZU(90,2,0,i))>0 ns($ZU(90,2,0,i))="" s i="" f s i=$O(ns(i)) q:i="" d . s $ZT="GColErr" . d $ZU(68,27,0) zn i s ix="ZMRINS" . f s ix=$O(^rOBJ(ix)) q:$E(ix,1,l)'="ZMRINS" d . . s iy=l,nn=0 f s c=$E(ix,$I(iy)) q:c'=+c s nn=nn+1 . . k:$E(ix,l+1+nn,$L(ix))=$E(host,1,25-nn) ^ROUTINE(ix),^rOBJ(ix),^rINDEX(ix) GColErr . s $ZT="" zn ns d $ZU(68,27,nethard) q ; MarkPort(port) ; Mark port as listened by $J s:port>1 $$$PORTS(port)=+$J q ; FreePort(port) ; Mark port as unused since now i '$D(port) n port s port=0 f s port=$O($$$PORTS(port)) q:port="" q:$$$PORTS(port)=+$J s:port>1 $$$PORTS(port)=-$$$TM q ; StDebInf(msg) ; Store debugging information in $$$DBINF n ix,str,l,a,c s l=$L(msg),str=$ZTIMESTAMP_": " f ix=1:1:l d . s c=$E(msg,ix,ix),a=$A(c) s:(a<32)!((a>126)&(a<192)) c="<$C("_a_")>" . s str=str_c s $$$DBINF($I($$$DBINF))=str q ; ShDebInf ; Show debugging information collected by StDebInf n ix,c,sp q:($D($$$DBINF)'=11) s nix=1,sp=24 ; screen_portion f d q:(nix>$$$DBINF) . s c=1 f ix=nix:1:$$$DBINF d q:c=0 . . w $$$DBINF(ix),! restore license mark k $$$AS(sid,-1),$$$AS(sid,0) q sid ; Store(sid) n ix,sl,v,vn q:sid="" s sl=$ZU(41)-3,ix=0,(v,vn)="" f s v=$ZU(42,sl,v) q:v="" i $P(v,"(")'=vn s vn=$P(v,"("),$$$AS(sid,0,$I(ix),0)=vn m $$$AS(sid,0,ix,1)=@vn s $$$AS(sid,0,0)=ix,$$$AS(sid)=$$$TM s $$$AS(sid,0,"ETRAP")=$ET s $$$AS(sid,-1)=$ZNSPACE s $$$AS(sid,-1,4)=$LB($G($$$USERLN),$ZWASCII($G($$$KEY))-8192) m $$$AS(sid,-1,-5)=$$$AS(sid,-5) ; move license mark k $$$AS(sid,-2),$$$AS(sid,-3),$$$AS(sid,-4),$$$AS(sid,-5) q ; Audit n ix,ct,at s at=$G($$$Ini($$$ieSesAuditTO),$$$dfSesAuditTO)*86400 s ix="",ct=$$$TM f s ix=$O($$$AS(ix)) q:ix="" k:$$$AS(ix)&((ct-$$$AS(ix))>at) $$$AS(ix),$$$MSGS(ix) q ;

Method.Implementation: q:SrcCode="" q:Beg="" q:End="" for ind=1:1:$l(SrcCode,End){ s tmp=$p(SrcCode,End,ind) s Html=$p(tmp,Beg,1) s Code=$p(tmp,Beg,2) w Html D $SYSTEM.Process.NullSubscripts(0) s MacName=$Replace(##THIS,".","") s MacName=$Replace(MacName,"%","") s MacName="mtempXDataHTML"_MacName_"Fragment"_$JOB_"" s routine =##class(%Routine).%New(MacName) if routine="" { w MacName,! w Code } else { D routine.Write($c(13,10)_" ; d ^"_MacName_$c(13,10)) d routine.WriteLine(Code) k ^SPOOL($job) O 2:($job) U 2:($job) Do routine.Compile() ; c 2:($job) Do routine.%Close() k ^SPOOL($job) u 0 TRY { x " d ^"_MacName } CATCH ErrorHandle { } Do routine.Delete(MacName_".MAC") } }

Node.Data: Can be stored in a database

Node.Sub: Castum: Empty class without super classes

Node.Data: An empty class with any set of inheritance.

Node.DataCrLf:
CSP class template with attached library %ZHTML.CacheLib
1) An example of writing a JS method 2) Synchronous and Asynchronous call of the class method Cache`

HTML element class template
1) You must rename the constructor method. The name of the constructor method must match the class name
Example of use: <html> <head> <title> Cache Server Page </title> </head> <body> <script src='%25ZHTML.CacheLib.cls' type='text/javascript' ></script> <script src='User.Prototyp3.cls' type='text/javascript' ></script> <my-input>222222</my-input> </body> </html>

Export.Routine: Convert2012 q #; #; d ConvertClasses^Convert2012() ConvertClasses() public { d $system.OBJ.Upgrade() s ClassName="" f s ClassName=$o(^oddDEF(ClassName)) q:ClassName="" i $e(ClassName)'="%" d k Class w !,ClassName,Text . s Text="" . s Class=##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%OpenId(ClassName) . s needSave=$$RepairMethods(Class) . i needSave s Text=" replace" . i Class.ClassType="serial",$$RepairSerial(Class) s needSave=1,Text=Text_" storage" . i needSave d Class.%Save(1) d CompileAll^%apiOBJ("brd") q 1 } #; Storage.Data.Structure - list nodelist ( ) #; list Makova Developer . RepairSerial(Class) public { s needSave=0 f i=1:1:Class.Storages.Count() s Storage=Class.Storages.GetAt(i) d . f j=1:1:Storage.Data.Count() s Data=Storage.Data.GetAt(j) d .. i Data.Structure="list" s Data.Structure="",needSave=1 q needSave } RepairMethods(Class) public { s needSave=0 s PackName=$p(Class.Name,".",1,$l(Class.Name,".")-1) f i=1:1:Class.Methods.Count() i $$RepairOneMethod(Class.Methods.GetAt(i),PackName) s needSave=1 q needSave } RepairOneMethod(Method,PackName) public { s needSave=0 i $zcvt(Method.CodeMode,"L")["generator" q needSave s Stream=##class(%GlobalCharacterStream).%New() f q:Method.Implementation.AtEnd s Text=Method.Implementation.Read(30000) d d Stream.Write(Text) . i $$ReplaceText(.Text,PackName) s needSave=1 i needSave d Method.Implementation.Clear() d . d Stream.Rewind() . f q:Stream.AtEnd d Method.Implementation.Write(Stream.Read(30000)) d Stream.Clear() q needSave } ReplaceText(Text,PackName) public { s (needSave,Pos)=0 f s Pos=$find(Text,"##class(",Pos) q:'Pos d . s className=$p($e(Text,Pos,$l(Text)),")") . i className["." q ; . i className["_" q ; x "d ##class("_Type_").%New()" . i className["=" q ; d ##class(=eOrderString)####this... . i $e(className)="%" q . i ##class(%ClassDefinition).%ExistsId(PackName_"."_className) q ; . s $e(Text,Pos,Pos+$l(className)-1)="User."_className . s needSave=1 q needSave }
